Load Calculations: Perform heat load calculations to determine the cooling and heating requirements for each project.      Equipment Selection: Select appropriate Daikin HVAC equipment, including air conditioners, heat pumps, and ventilation systems, to ensure optimal performance and energy efficiency.      Ductwork and Piping Design: Design ductwork and piping layouts to distribute air and refrigerant effectively throughout the building.      Energy Efficiency: Optimize HVAC system designs for energy efficiency and sustainability, in accordance with industry standards and regulations.      Technical Documentation: Prepare detailed engineering drawings, schematics, and specifications for HVAC systems.      Quality Assurance: Ensure that all designs adhere to safety standards, industry codes, and manufacturer guidelines, with a focus on Daikin products.      Collaboration: Work closely with installation teams to provide guidance during system installation and commissioning phases.      Client Support: Offer technical support and expertise to clients, addressing their inquiries and concerns regarding HVAC system designs.      Continuous Learning: Stay updated on the latest HVAC technologies, industry trends, and Daikin product innovations. column2: This role plays a vital part in Arcadiss Global Excellence Centre (GEC), which serves as the centralized and fully integrated project delivery group. With over 3,000 skilled professionals stationed across offices in India, Romania, and the Philippines, our GEC offers Capability, Capacity, and a Competitive Advantage across diverse projects and services, collaborating closely with our global businesses. Within the GEC, the APM (Advanced Process Manufacturing) teams comprise cross-functional groups dedicated to designing and developing innovative process engineering solutions for Pharmaceutical and Process industries.          Effective project management, client needs assessment, and technical guidance are pivotal for delivering successful outcomes, employing cutting-edge computational design methodologies.            Role accountabilities:          Perform pipe stress analysis using Caesar II software for evaluating piping systems under various operating conditions, including thermal expansion, sustained loads, and occasional loads.      Collaborate with design and engineering teams to review and interpret piping specifications, isometric drawings, and relevant documents to conduct accurate stress analysis.      Assess piping support requirements and provide recommendations to ensure compliance with industry codes, standards, and project-specific requirements.      Generate comprehensive stress analysis reports detailing findings, recommendations, and necessary design modifications to ensure structural integrity and safety.      Work closely with piping designers and engineers to optimize piping layouts and support configurations based on stress analysis results.      Provide technical guidance and support to project teams regarding pipe stress analysis, including interpretation of analysis results and implementation of design changes.      Collaborate with third-party stakeholders, including clients and regulatory authorities, to address stress analysis-related inquiries and requirements.      Attend relevant design and client meetings to gain insight into project requirements and conduct training sessions for project team members to ensure proficiency in interpreting stress analysis results and implementing design changes.          Qualifications & Experience:            Bachelors degree in mechanical engineering      with a certified course in Stress analysis.          A minimum of 5+ years experience in pipe stress analysis using Caesar II software in the field of engineering and design is required.          Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex stress analysis results and provide practical engineering solutions.          Proficiency in CAD software and related tools, with the ability to integrate Ceaser II into project-specific design workflows.          Good knowledge of national, international, and local codes and standards.          They should be adept at problem-solving and have a track record of implementing new technologies, techniques, or design methodologies to improve project system performance and efficiency.          Implementation of quality procedures to ensure a good design deliverable.          Comprehensive leadership skills and previous experience in managing large-scale projects.          Candidate to show out-of-the box thinking in order to identify any opportunities for automation or innovation.          In-depth knowledge of industry codes and standards such as ASME B31.3, ASME B31.1, EN-13480-3, and API 579 for the design and analysis of piping systems.            Nice to have:            Experience in Piping Design in any Plant design software like CADWorx, Plant 3D, etc.          Integration of 3D design software such as CADWorx with Caesar II          Working knowledge of other stress analysis software packages

Analyse existing manufacturing processes to identify areas for improvement in efficiency, quality, and cost-effectiveness. Develop and implement process enhancements and optimizations to streamline production operations and reduce waste. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including production, engineering, quality assurance, and maintenance, to address process-related issues and drive continuous improvement initiatives. Lead or participate in root cause analysis investigations to address production issues and prevent recurrence. Design and implement manufacturing process documentation, including standard operating procedures (SOPs) and work instructions. Evaluate new technologies and equipment to improve processes and capabilities. Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards related to manufacturing processes and product quality. Work in partnership with suppliers and vendors to procure necessary materials and equipment for the manufacturing process. At least 4 years of experience in a manufacturing environment and have worked in a process engineering role.  Proficiency in SolidWorks.  A good command of English is essential.  Proficiency in Microsoft Office skills is required.  Strong communication and interpersonal skills are necessary, as the candidate will need to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.  Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and project management skills.

column2: Job Summary:   The Machine Design Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, and improving heavy machinery used in various industrial applications. With a focus on innovation, efficiency, and safety, the engineer will collaborate with cross-functional teams to conceptualize, design, and bring to market cutting-edge heavy machinery solutions. The role requires a deep understanding of mechanical engineering principles, CAD software proficiency, and practical experience in designing heavy machinery components and systems. Key Responsibilities: Conceptualization and Design:  Lead the conceptualization and design of heavy machinery components and systems, ensuring adherence to industry standards and regulatory requirements. CAD Modeling and Simulation:  Utilize CAD software to create detailed 3D models and simulations of machine components and assemblies, optimizing for performance, reliability, and manufacturability. Mechanical Analysis:  Conduct structural, thermal, and dynamic analysis to validate design concepts and ensure robustness under various operating conditions. Material Selection and Specifications:  Collaborate with materials engineers to select appropriate materials and specifications for components, considering factors such as strength, durability, and cost-effectiveness. Prototype Development:  Oversee the prototyping and testing of machine components and assemblies, iterating designs based on test results and feedback. Collaboration and Communication:  Work closely with cross-functional teams, including manufacturing, quality assurance, and project management, to ensure seamless integration of design solutions into production processes. Continuous Improvement:  Identify opportunities for design optimization, cost reduction, and performance enhancement through continuous research, benchmarking, and innovation. Documentation and Reporting:  Maintain accurate documentation of design specifications, test results, and project progress, providing regular reports to stakeholders. Qualifications and Experience: Bachelors degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field; Master?? degree preferred. Minimum of 5 years of experience in machine design, preferably in the heavy machinery industry. Proficiency in CAD software (e.g., SolidWorks, AutoCAD) and simulation tools (e.g., ANSYS, Abaqus). Strong understanding of mechanical engineering principles, including mechanics, thermodynamics, and materials science. Experience with design for manufacturability (DFM) and design for assembly (DFA) principles. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Effective communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work in cross-functional teams. Knowledge of relevant industry standards and regulations (e.g., ISO, ANSI, ASME). Familiarity with project management methodologies and tools is a plus. Additional Requirements: Willingness to travel occasionally for customer meetings, supplier visits, and industry conferences. Ability to adapt to fast-paced, dynamic work environments and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Commitment to continuous learning and professional development in the field of machine design and engineering.
column11: SPM Design, Machine Design, Special Purpose Machine Design, Mechanical Design, heavy machinery, Design Calculation, Heavy Engineering, Solid Works, Machine Building

column2: Job Summary: We are seeking a skilled and experienced Drone Engineer to join our dynamic team. The Drone Engineer will be responsible for the design, development, testing, and optimization of drone systems and components. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in aerospace engineering, electrical engineering, or a related field, with a passion for innovation and problem-solving. This role requires expertise in drone technology, unmanned aerial systems (UAS), and a deep understanding of aerodynamics, propulsion, and control systems. Responsibilities : Design and Development : Lead the design and development of drone systems and components from concept to production. Conduct research and analysis to identify innovative solutions and improvements in drone performance, efficiency, and reliability. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including mechanical engineers, electrical engineers, and software developers to integrate subsystems and ensure compatibility and functionality. Prototyping and Testing: Create prototypes and perform testing to evaluate the performance and functionality of drone systems and subsystems. Design and conduct experiments to validate aerodynamic performance, structural integrity, and system stability under various conditions. Analyze test data and iterate designs to optimize performance and meet project requirements. System Integration and Optimization : Integrate hardware and software components to develop fully functional drone systems, including propulsion systems, flight controllers, sensors, and communication systems. Optimize system performance through tuning and calibration of control algorithms, motor configurations, and sensor fusion techniques. Conduct system-level testing and validation to ensure compliance with safety, reliability, and regulatory standards. Documentation and Reporting: Prepare technical documentation, including design specifications, test plans, and reports to communicate findings, recommendations, and progress to stakeholders. Maintain accurate records of design iterations, test results, and project milestones. Collaborate with project managers to track project schedules, budgets, and resource requirements. Preference will be given to candidates who have track record of DGCA type approval and other required certifications such as BIS, WPC and others, required for drones Continuous Learning and Innovation: Stay updated with emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in drone engineering and aerospace technology. Participate in professional development activities, training programs, and knowledge sharing sessions to enhance skills and expertise. Qualifications: Bachelors degree or higher in Aerospace Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience in the design, development, and testing of drone systems or unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs). Strong proficiency in CAD software (e.g., SolidWorks, Autodesk Inventor) for 3D modeling and design. Knowledge of aerodynamics, flight dynamics, and control theory. Familiarity with embedded systems, microcontrollers, and firmware development. Experience with simulation tools (e.g., MATLAB/Simulink, ANSYS) for modeling and analysis. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Effective communication and collaboration skills to work in a multidisciplinary team environment. Ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize tasks effectively. Understanding of regulatory requirements and safety standards for drone operations is a plus. Preferred Qualifications: Masters degree or PhD in Aerospace Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field. Professional certifications related to drone technology or aviation. Experience with commercial drone platforms and payloads. Familiarity with software development languages (e.g., C/C++, Python) for embedded systems and control algorithms. Knowledge of sensor technologies such as GPS, IMUs, LiDAR, and cameras for navigation and perception. Benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience Opportunities for professional development and career advancement Collaborative and innovative work environment with a focus on creativity and excellence
column11: Drone Engineer, UAS, Aerospace Engineering, CAD, electrical engineering, Drone, UAV, Aerospace Standards, 3D Modeling

column2: Job Title: 3D Piping Design Engineer : CADworx Job Overview: The 3D Piping Design Engineer plays a critical role in the edible oil and gas industry by creating detailed designs and layouts for piping systems within processing facilities. This role involves collaborating with other engineering disciplines and ensuring that the piping systems meet safety, regulatory, and operational requirements. Responsibilities:Piping System Design: Develop detailed 3D models and designs for piping systems within edible oil and gas processing facilities. Ensure the designs comply with industry standards, codes, and regulatory requirements. Collaboration:Collaborate with process engineers, mechanical engineers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and incorporate them into the piping design. Material Selection: Select appropriate materials for piping components, considering factors such as fluid characteristics, temperature, and corrosion resistance. Safety Compliance: Ensure that piping designs adhere to safety standards and regulations, and implement safety features in the layout where necessary. Optimization: Optimize piping layouts for efficiency, minimizing pressure drops, and ensuring ease of maintenance and operation. Integration with Equipment: Coordinate the placement and integration of piping systems with various equipment such as pumps, tanks, heat exchangers, and other processing units. 3D Modeling: Utilize 3D modeling software to create accurate representations of piping systems, facilitating better visualization and analysis. Drafting and Documentation:Prepare detailed drawings, schematics, and specifications for piping systems. Maintain accurate documentation throughout the design and modification process. Quality Assurance: Conduct reviews and quality checks on piping designs to ensure accuracy and compliance with project requirements. Cost Estimation: Collaborate with project management and cost estimation teams to provide input on material and labor costs associated with the piping design. Project Coordination: Coordinate with other engineering disciplines to ensure the seamless integration of piping systems into overall project designs. Field Support: Provide support during the construction and commissioning phases, addressing any design-related issues that may arise. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field.Proven experience in 3D piping design, preferably in the edible oil and gas industry. Proficiency in 3D modeling software such as AutoCAD Plant 3D, PDS, or similar tools. Strong understanding of industry standards, codes, and regulations related to piping design. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. A 3D Piping Design Engineer in the edible oil and gas industry contributes to the overall efficiency and safety of processing facilities by designing well-optimized and compliant piping systems.3-5 YEARS IN THE CADWORKS/CAD SOFTWARE A 3D Piping Design Engineer in the edible oil and gas industry is responsible for designing and creating detailed plans for the layout of piping systems within processing facilities. column2: Company Overview: Soleos Solar Energy Pvt. Ltd stands at the forefront of innovation in the solar EPC sector, with a significant footprint in both the Indian and international markets. Our commitment to excellence is evident in our pursuit of delivering superior solar solutions globally. With our headquarters in Ahmedabad, India, we are dedicated to empowering communities worldwide with sustainable energy. Position Overview: We are in search innovative Design Manager to lead our dynamic design team. The Design Manager will be entrusted with overseeing the creation and development of design solutions, collaborating closely with various stakeholders including the Sales department, Project Engineers, and Senior Project Managers. The Design manager will work closely with their team of Design Executives to translate inputs from these departments into actionable design plans. Additionally, the Design Manager will play a pivotal role in communicating design progress and insights to the Senior Design Manager, clients, and Project Heads for both International project and Indian Projects. Key Responsibilities : Design Development : Collaborate with the sales team and project engineers to gather project requirements and develop solar power plant designs that are technically sound and commercially viable. Team Coordination : Coordinate with Design Executives in India and internationally to ensure design consistency and integration across all project phases. Technical Leadership : Provide technical guidance and support to the design team, ensuring the use of best practices and innovative solutions in solar design. Stakeholder Communication : Act as the primary point of contact for design-related discussions with internal teams, clients, and external stakeholders. Quality Assurance : Oversee the design process to ensure compliance with industry standards, regulatory requirements, and company quality policies. Reporting : Regularly report progress, challenges, and achievements to the Senior Project Manager and Project Head, ensuring transparency and alignment with project goals. Qualifications : Education : Bachelors degree in Engineering, Architecture, or a related field. A masters degree or certification in solar energy design or project management is preferred. Experience : Proven experience pf 3 to 5 years in solar design management, with a strong portfolio of completed solar projects. Technical Skills : In-depth knowledge of photovoltaic systems, solar technology, and CAD software. Familiarity with solar regulatory standards and building codes. Leadership : Demonstrated ability to lead and manage a design team, fostering a collaborative environment that encourages innovation and high performance. Communication : Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex design concepts clearly to non-technical stakeholders. Project Management : Strong organizational and project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): 1.Design Output: 1.1.Target Achievement: Percentage of the annual design target completed within the specified timeframe. 1.2.MW Design Completed: Cumulative MW capacity of solar designs completed by the team against the annual target. 2.Quality of Design: 2.1.Accuracy Rate: Incidence of design errors or discrepancies in completed designs. Compliance Rate: Adherence of designs to industry standards, regulatory requirements, and company guidelines. 3 Efficiency and Productivity: 3.1.Design Turnaround Time: Average time taken to complete a design project from initiation to finalization. 3.2.Designs Per Employee: Number of designs completed per Design Executive to gauge productivity and workload distribution. 4Team Performance:  4.1.Team Collaboration: Effectiveness of teamwork and collaboration among Design Executives in achieving collective goals.  4.2.Employee Satisfaction: Feedback from team members on workload, resources, and support provided. Key Result Areas (KRAs): 1. Design Planning and Management:  Develop and implement strategies to achieve the annual design target and ensure alignment with project objectives. Oversee the design process from project initiation to completion, ensuring adherence to timelines and quality standards. 2. Team Leadership and Development : Provide leadership and direction to the design team, fostering a collaborative and high-performance work culture. Identify training needs and opportunities for skill development among Design Executives to enhance team capabilities. 3. Quality Assurance and Compliance : Implement quality control measures to ensure accuracy and compliance of design deliverables with industry standards and regulations. Conduct regular reviews and audits of design work to identify areas for improvement and ensure continuous quality enhancement. 4. Client Engagement and Satisfaction:  Collaborate with clients to understand their design requirements and expectations, ensuring alignment with project objectives. Monitor client satisfaction with design services and address any concerns or issues in a timely and effective manner. 5. Process Optimization and Efficiency : Identify opportunities to streamline design processes, improve efficiency, and reduce turnaround time while maintaining quality standards. Implement best practices and tools to enhance the effectiveness and productivity of the design team. 6. Performance Reporting and Analysis : Prepare regular reports and performance metrics on design output, quality, and team performance for management and stakeholders. Analyze data to identify trends, challenges, and opportunities for improvement in design operations.

column2: Role & responsibilities   System Design : Designing the overall system architecture for automation, including selecting appropriate hardware and software components. Component Selection: Selecting the necessary sensors, actuators, controllers, and other components needed for the automation system. CAD Modeling : Creating detailed 3D models and drawings of the automation system using computer-aided design (CAD) software. Prototyping : Building prototypes of the automation system to test its functionality and performance before full-scale production. Programming : Developing control algorithms and writing software code to control the behavior of the automation system. Integration : Integrating various subsystems and components of the automation system to ensure seamless operation. Testing and Validation: Conducting thorough testing and validation of the automation system to ensure it meets performance and reliability requirements. Documentation : Creating comprehensive documentation, including specifications, user manuals, and troubleshooting guides, for the automation system. Collaboration : Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including electrical engineers, mechanical engineers, and software developers, to ensure the successful implementation of the automation system. Continuous Improvement: Continuously monitoring and evaluating the performance of the automation system, and identifying opportunities for optimization and improvement. Preferred candidate profile   Need Candidate with the experience of 3 to 5 years who have worked with SPM industry Perks and benefits

column2: Design and develop package , components and Piping for Liquid Ring Vacuum pump and compressors. Detail drawings and define materials based on strength and surface finish requirements. Liaise with Fabrication team, suppliers to ensure components are manufactured to drawing.                           Lead on bills of material and assembly drawings, liaise with project team to ensure all required information is available to allow full specification of complete package development.                   Principal duties and responsibilities:                     Issuing technical plant drawings and documents according to the instructions from the Project manager / Project engineer.                     Plant layout drawings such as pipe-layout, pipe-routing for Liquid Ring Vacuum pump and compressor and its axilliaries.                     3D-Modelling on Autodesk Inventor                     Piping and Instrumentation (PID) diagrams                     General Arrangement (GA) drawings                     Foundation drawings                     Isometric drawings                     Skid-frame and support drawings                     As built revisions of issued drawings                     Supporting the Project Manager / Project Engineer for specification of package and plant components.                     Scope                     Design and develop components / package forLiquid ring vacuum pump, compressor, Blowers etc.                     Lead on complete package design for process application e.g Pump , Motor , Cooler, Seprator, piping, tubing , Instruments etc.                     Produce detailed part drawings, including all information required for sourcing team to effectively select suppliers.                     Produce and detail assembly drawings, work with production team to ensure all required information is available to support reliable production planning.                     Producing functional correct PID diagrams in collaboration with Project Manager /Project Engineer and I&C engineers.                     Producing isometric pipe layouts, supports and materials lists.                     Assisting during compilation of customer and supplier documentation.                     Dimensional check of manufacturing drawings provided by suppliers and integration in 3D modelling.                     Supporting application Engineering and Sales for sales-purposes.                     Planning                 Produce a full range of documentation and ensure suitable change control is implemented.             Prepare material masters and bills of material and other ERP data as necessary.             Monitor the progress of project equipment through design and build process and help resolve any issues impacting progress.           Cost Management                   Monitor project costs and/or adjustments, paying attention to the original targets set and advising management when deviations occur.             Visit suppliers as necessary to ensure good technical understanding/compliance.                 Timelines                 Develop project time estimates and product cost comparisons and selects materials, commercial parts and technical data.                     Production                 May oversee production processes, suggesting changes in working methods or sequences in order to improve efficiencies of project timelines.                 Documentation                 Co-ordinates and maintains all Engineering documents and design change information at the facility.             Creates functional descriptions/procedures for specific projects.                 Quality                 Follows ISO guidelines regarding design and production of new/revised products. Assists manufacturing and quality control in correcting any problems encountered in the machine shop or on the assembly floor.                 Essential skills                  Having good knowledge of ASME / ASTM / API Standards.             Experience with over all Package design and integration of multiple components.             Competent with Industry recognised parametric CAD system (Auto desk Inventor etc.)             Good knowledge on design of package subsystem according to process gas application.             Experience with geometrical dimensioning and tolerancing and identification.             Managing complete project with good project management skills.                             Personal Skills                     A very good knowlegde of English language (written and spoken).                 Proactive, self-motivating with ability to develop own priorities              Conversant with Microsoft tools - Word; Excel; PPT; MSP              Ready to travel for domestic or overseas based on need of business                 Education and Experience               8-12 years experience after Diploma / Graduation in Design Engineering or Product Development.

column2: The key responsibilities and qualifications for a Research, Development, and Design (RD&D) Executive at a manufacturing company of pumps typically include:             Qualifications:             1. A Bachelors or Masters degree in engineering, mechanical engineering, or a related field.     2. At least 1 years of experience in research, development, and design of industrial products, preferably in the pump industry.     3. Familiarity with 3D design software, computer-aided design (CAD), and other design tools.     4. Strong project management skills and experience leading cross-functional teams.     5. Experience with product testing, prototyping, and validation.     6. Good knowledge of industry trends, standards, and regulations.             Day-to-day duties:             1. Conducting research and analysis on market trends, customer needs, and emerging technologies to identify new product opportunities.     2. Leading the design and development of new pump products from concept to launch, including product design, testing, and validation.     3. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including product management, engineering, and production, to ensure product design aligns with customer needs, production capabilities, and quality standards.     4. Managing the design process, including resource allocation, project timelines, and budget management.     5. Developing and maintaining relationships with suppliers, vendors, and external partners to support the design and development process.     6. Ensuring that all designs meet industry standards and regulatory requirements.             Required skills:             1. Strong knowledge of engineering principles and mechanical design.     2. Familiarity with 3D design software, computer-aided design (CAD), and other design tools.     3. Excellent project management skills and experience leading cross-functional teams.     4. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively to develop innovative solutions.     5. Strong communication and interpersonal skills.     6. Good knowledge of industry trends, standards, and regulations.           In summary, an RD&D Executive at a manufacturing company of pumps plays a critical role in designing and developing new pump products from concept to launch. Required skills include strong knowledge of engineering principles and mechanical design, familiarity with 3D design software and other design tools, excellent project management skills, and strong problem-solving skills. Qualifications include a Bachelors or Masters degree in engineering or a related field, 10-15 years of experience in research, development, and design of industrial products, and good knowledge of industry trends, standards, and regulations.     ?

column2: Electromagnetic Design: Design and develop electromagnetic components and systems, including antennas, RF circuits, magnetic devices, and electromagnetic actuators, to meet performance specifications and requirements.     Simulation and Analysis: Use electromagnetic simulation tools (e.g., ANSYS HFSS, CST Studio Suite, FEKO) to model and analyze electromagnetic fields, transmission lines, and electromagnetic interference (EMI) effects. Perform simulations to optimize designs and validate performance.     Prototype Development: Create prototypes and conduct laboratory experiments to validate electromagnetic designs and verify performance. Collaborate with technicians and other engineers to build and test prototypes.     Design Optimization: Utilize optimization techniques and design automation tools to improve the efficiency, reliability, and manufacturability of electromagnetic designs. Identify opportunities for performance enhancement and cost reduction.     Testing and Validation: Develop test plans and procedures to validate electromagnetic designs against performance specifications and requirements. Conduct testing in laboratory environments and field trials as needed.     Documentation and Reporting: Prepare detailed design documentation, including drawings, specifications, and technical reports, to document electromagnetic designs and test results. Present findings and recommendations to project teams and stakeholders.     Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including mechanical engineers, electrical engineers, and software engineers, to integrate electromagnetic components and systems into larger products and systems.     Quality Assurance: Ensure that electromagnetic designs meet quality standards, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices. Implement design verification and validation processes to ensure compliance.     Research and Innovation: Stay current with advances in electromagnetic theory, technologies, and methodologies. Explore new concepts and techniques to improve the performance and functionality of electromagnetic systems.     Project Management: Manage electromagnetics design projects, including scheduling, resource allocation, and budget management. Ensure projects are completed on time and within budget.

column2: As a Senior Design Engineer specializing in wiring harnesses for medical equipment, you will play a critical role in the development of our innovative products. Your extensive experience and expertise in ISO 13485 and UL requirements will ensure the highest standards of safety, quality, and compliance in our medical devices.       Wiring Harness Design: Develop wiring harnesses for medical equipment, ensuring compliance with ISO 13485 and UL requirements, industry standards, safety regulations, and quality standards.     Product Integration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including electrical engineers, mechanical engineers, and product designers, to seamlessly integrate wiring harnesses into medical devices while meeting regulatory standards.     Electronic Electrical Component Selection: Select appropriate wiring components, connectors, and materials to meet the specific needs of each medical equipment project, considering ISO 13485 and UL compliance.     Prototyping: Create prototypes and perform testing to validate wiring harness designs, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards, and make necessary improvements.     Documentation: Generate detailed engineering documentation, including schematics, wiring diagrams, bills of materials, and manufacturing instructions, adhering to ISO 13485 documentation requirements.     Quality Assurance: Participate in quality control processes to ensure the reliability and safety of wiring harnesses in medical devices, aligning with ISO 13485 and UL quality standards.     Regulatory Compliance: Stay up-to-date with ISO 13485 and UL requirements and other industry regulations, and ensure that wiring harness designs strictly adhere to these requirements.     Cost Management: Work within budget constraints and seek cost-effective solutions without compromising quality while considering ISO 13485 and UL compliance.     Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement and contribute to the development of best practices in wiring harness design, especially in relation to ISO 13485 and UL requirements.     Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior engineers and technicians on wiring harness design principles, regulatory compliance, and best practices.     Proposals: for techno-commercial offers for medical device     Cross-functional: work with BD team

column2: Ingerem India Project Managment Pvt Ltd  is looking for Design & Drafting Manager  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey    Team Management: Lead, mentor, and supervise a team of designers, drafters, and technicians      Provide guidance, support, and training to ensure that team members meet project requirements, deadlines, and quality standards      Project Planning and Coordination: Collaborate with project managers, engineers, architects, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements, scope, and objectives      Develop design plans, timelines, and resource allocation strategies to support project goals      Design Development: Oversee the development of technical drawings, blueprints, schematics, and models using computer-aided design (CAD) software and other design tools      Ensure that designs meet industry standards, client specifications, and regulatory requirements      Quality Assurance: Establish and enforce quality control processes and standards to ensure the accuracy, completeness, and consistency of design documentation      Review and approve drawings, models, and specifications before release to clients or production teams      Resource Management: Allocate resources, including personnel, software licenses, and hardware, to support design and drafting activities      Monitor workload distribution, productivity levels, and project timelines to optimize resource utilization and efficiency      Technology and Innovation: Stay informed about advancements in design technology, CAD software, and drafting techniques      Identify opportunities to enhance departmental processes, workflows, and capabilities through the adoption of new tools and technologies      Interdepartmental Collaboration: Foster collaboration and communication between the design and drafting department and other functional areas within the organization, such as engineering, manufacturing, procurement, and sales      Facilitate cross-functional coordination to address project requirements and resolve design-related issues      Client Communication: Interface with clients, architects, engineers, contractors, and vendors to clarify design specifications, address technical inquiries, and resolve design-related issues      Ensure that client expectations are met and that design solutions align with project objectives

column2: We are Hiring Experienced CSA Engineer!!!  We are passionate about solving problems that will unlock the future of the Semiconductor/Automotive Production/Pharma & Lifesciences/Battery/Chemical plants Industry. If you are humble engineering genius who shares our passion, join Quest Global. Be a part of something greater! Interested candidates kindly share resume to sandhya.rani@quest-global.com Position: CSA Engineer  Location: Bangalore  Exp: 5 to 15 Years Responsibilities Plans, schedules, conducts, and coordinates detailed phases of Structural Engineering Mentor Civil Engineers and facilitate a holistic understanding as to the scope and plan for projects Communicates technical issues and recommends solutions to Supervisor and/or project management. Facilitates technical discussions with third parties (client, suppliers, regulators) Conducts reviews of vendor drawings, calculations and other documentation. Works on conceptual studies, designs, reports, or proposals. Prepares cost estimates, quantity take-offs and staffing requirements for proposals, forecasts and change orders. Coordinates and interfaces as directed with the day-to-day technical work of discipline engineers, specialists and designers. Qualifications / Skill BS / Masters degree in Civil engineering with minimum 5 (five) years of Structural Experience  Perform structural design and analysis calculations using governing codes and standards, engineering formulas, skills, and experience. Layout and details portions of projects using schematic layout by project lead engineer. May be assigned responsibility for schematic or conceptual layouts when qualified. Provide drawing for own designs and produce sketches to incorporate in drawings by Designers/Drafters. Research design options and document findings for project lead engineer,Review shop drawings. Assume the lead engineers role on assigned projects Develop probable construction cost estimates for his/her projects within the department. May direct and supervise other Designers/Drafters activities. Coordinate work with other disciplines such as architectural, mechanical, electrical, etc. Perform field activities such as observe and record existing field conditions, take and verify measurements within project area. Organize, draft, and coordinate technical documents Extensive knowledge and exposure to relevant International codes and specifications like ASCE, AISC, ACI is desirable Expertise in STAAD-Pro, MS-Office, Mathcad and related structural engineering software

column2: Responsibilities           Develop a control system to retrofit into older robots. This will entail completely replacing the control system of older robots with newly developed ones. Program industrial robots and design and develop complete turn-key solutions for customers.     Directly interface with customers to study the requirements and design and system     Develop and implement inverse kinematic and trajectory planning algorithms     Perform real time simulation of customer application             Requirements           Masters in Robotics is preferred. Extensive course knowledge and projects in Robotics.     Must be proficient in C/C and other programming languages.     Knowledge of visual guided robotics is a plus.

column2: Arcadis is the world's leading company delivering sustainable design, engineering, and consultancy solutions for natural and built assets. We are more than 36,000 people, in over 70 countries, dedicated to?improving quality of life. Everyone has an important role to play. With the power of many curious minds, together we can solve the worlds most complex challenges and deliver more impact together. Role description: Principal Engineer (Roadway Design -USA Mobility) - Design and 3D modelling for Design & Build and State DoT projects with proficiency in various Bentley tools as mentioned in Mandatory Technical Skills. Will have to carry out design and production Roadway design, 3D Modelling, CAD production and quantities should have work experience as Task Manager and should have led project team size of more than 4 at least once for D&B Projects. Experience on D & B projects ??oncept design, Alternative Technical Concepts and detailed design of projects, involved in construction support. Should have handled Design ??uild projects for any international projects. Specific US experience is most desirable. Role accountabilities: Responsible for end-to-end project design and delivery for Roadway design related tasks; Preparation / Finalization of various roadway related drawings at various stages of projects; Computation of quantities; Preparation of design reports; and, Ability to understand existing condition reports and surveys; Coaching and mentoring team members. Ability to lead and design D & B projects Should have handled minimum of 2 D & B projects-overseas preferably for ANA in Infrastructure Business. Should have worked for US Projects and must be conversant with AASHTO and various DOT specifications and standards. Qualifications & Experience: B.E / BTech in Civil Engineering with Master?? in Transportation / Highway Engineering (Desirable) Minimum 12+ years of experience in a Design Consulting Environment as of December 31, 2023. Minimum of 5 years of working experience for International Design Projects for Highway / Roadway Design and a minimum of 5 years of working experience for USA projects in delivering various design and modelling tasks for Roadway. Having work experience in Design & Build Projects is added advantage. Required Competencies: Good understanding and Knowledge on international codes like AASHTO, DMRB, British and Euro codes along with various other International Codal Practices and Standards, Design Standards for more than one DOT in USA. Highway Design experience using Inroads and GeoPak, good expertise and experience in 3D modelling using OpenRoads for proposals and Detail design projects Project Experience using various DOT (Department of Transportation) standards. Roadway Design for various stages of Design Build Projects ??Detailed design of Roadway corridor, Detailed drawings, construction support-drawings, Design Reviews, Project Management, Design Management. Experience in MS Office software including Word, Excel and PowerPoint; Full understand of US units of measure; Read, write and speaks -English. Why Arcadis? We can only achieve our goals when everyone is empowered to be their best. We believe everyone's contribution matters. It?? why we are pioneering a skills-based approach, where you can harness your unique experience and expertise to carve your career path and maximize the impact we can make together. You??l do meaningful work, and no matter what role, you??l be helping to deliver sustainable solutions for a more prosperous planet. Make your mark, on your career, your colleagues, your clients, your life and the world around you. Together, we can create a lasting legacy. Our Commitment to Equality, Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging We want you to be able to bring your best self to work every day which is why equality and inclusion is at the forefront of all our activities. Our ambition is to be an employer of choice and provide a great place to work for all our people. We are an equal opportunity employer; women, minorities, and people with disabilities are strongly encouraged to apply. We are dedicated to a policy of non-discrimination in employment on any basis including race, caste, creed, colour, religion, sex, age, disability, marital status, sexual orientation, and gender identity. Join Arcadis. Create a Legacy. #JoinArcadis #CreateALegacy #Hybrid

column2: R&D Core team member on Cost to Win (Value Engineering) and Sustaining engineering projects with technical ownership of R&D deliverables and leading technicians. Projects include, but are not limited to, supporting Advanced Access Devices product lines, supply chain, and operations.      Identify the best tools and approaches to effectively solve engineering problems to develop/optimize designs by leveraging appropriate mix of first principles / analytical, computational and experimental methods.      Lead and ensure implementation and rigor of design control best practices with compliance to BD quality policies and procedures through appropriate communication, training, and education of sound quality assurance principals.      Ensure compliance with all local, state, federal, and BD safety regulations, policies, and procedures.          Organizational Leadership      Quality systems processes: Ensure implementation of quality systems processes including design controls and change control.      Project planning: Ensure quality and accuracy of integrated project plans encompassing all cross-functional activities and associated resource requirements.      Project management: Be accountable for timely delivery of project deliverables for which is responsible as specified in the project plans.      Stakeholder Management: Identify project stake holders, establish and monitor stakeholder engagement      Technology transfer: Ensure efficient and effective transition from research to development to manufacturing in locations throughout the world      Process effectiveness: Ensure appropriate processes are followed for effective and timely engagement of other parts of the company in project activities.      Innovation: Develop and apply innovative approaches to ensure best outcomes in all aspects of the role. Support an environment in which innovation can flourish through empowerment, encouragement, and support.              Organizational Development:          Proactively develop, maintain & share technical knowledge in specialized area(s), remaining up to date on current trends and best practices.      Develop and apply innovative approaches to ensure the effective capture, retention and communication of technical and project knowledge generated (tacit & implicit).      Leadership      Responsible for developing and implementing critical component changes for high volume, disposable medical devices.      Influence others: Demonstrate strong persuasion and timing skills. Remain open to be persuaded when appropriate.      Inclusive work environment: Promote and leverage diversity to achieve best outcomes.      Leadership courage: Demonstrate and promote leadership courage by doing what is right. Engage those who disagree to persuade or be persuaded. Instill confidence in associates and customers.      Dealing with ambiguity: Demonstrate agility and action orientation when facing change and uncertainty. Effectively manage change and instill confidence.      Analyze design solutions using engineering first principles and advanced engineering methods      Write detailed technical reports based on design verification analysis/testing for design changes and product design activities      Develop and execute test methods which specify measurement equipment, test set-up, measurement systems analysis, and data analysis      Qualifications      Strong interpersonal and influence skills.      Strong written and verbal communication skills.      Advanced Problem-solving skills.      Strong technical judgment.      Team orientation.      Broad and deep understanding of disciplined change control processes, regulatory, and quality requirements.      Strong motivational fit.      Strong fit with BD values.      Bachelor s degree (or equivalent) in related technical field. Advanced degree preferred.      Minimum 2 years of experience in engineering/technical field, preferably in the medical device industry with successful track record of project task delivery.

column2: The right candidate will be placed in the Product engineering or product development team      Role and responsibilities will include leadership and technical support to a cross-functional team (across geography and domain)      This involves leading the independent project, technical discussions, decision making, driving projects in coordination with different sites, rigor in planning & execution steps, monitoring, and control      The Lead Engineer will have to inclusively lead TCI team members and ramp up capabilities within the team      This will need hands-on execution of the project, supporting other team members, and establishing good practices for cross-platform project execution      The Lead position requires a good balance of technical expertise and interpersonal skill to ensure all stakeholders remain positively involved and the project is delivered at the right quality on time      The ideal candidate will gain product domain knowledge and establish a good teamwork mechanism to ensure effective execution of product engineering projects      The associate will also be responsible for leading the verification strategy creation and execution to deliver high-volume single use disposable medical products      He will be responsible for end-to-end Lab Management activities for the platform      The Lead Engineer will be involved with all aspects of design engineering including new product design and optimizing existing products      In doing so the Lead Engineer will follow BDs Global Product Development System and relevant engineering tools to deliver a high quality, cost-effective design using BD s Stage Gate framework, DFM/DFSS to deliver cost-effective design-transfer and see it through into manufacturing      The successful candidate will lead test method development activities encompassing measurement system development & analyses, test fixture design and equipment hardware/software validation for measurement system equipment      He/she will ensure that translated product requirements are testable and measurable      The ideal candidate will also participate in executing technical and multi-functional design verification and design validation activities              Job Description      General Function              Lead R&D efforts through all phases of product development      Collaborate with Design & Development, Systems Engineering and cross-functional teams to ensure product requirements are verifiable and measurable.      Synthesize, develop, update, and optimize designs based on understanding design space. Understand design options and trade-offs; managing critical parameters; leverage strong engineering fundamentals and tools. Incorporate manufacturing principles early in the development process.      Ensure deliverables are reliable across the design space, is adequately pressure-tested to satisfy user, regulatory and business requirements. Understand system and subsystem design sensitivity and identify and address early any potential design integration and transfer risks.      Implement DFSS rigor throughout the design selection and development process, leveraging and deploying empirical, statistical, and analytical tools to drive informed design decisions and reduce design iteration cycle times.      Ensure the design considerations are embedding all applicable DFX (Design for Excellence) aspects including manufacturability, usability, reliability, and safety.      Coordinate with the cross-functional teams (i.e., D&D, Systems Engineering, Marketing, Quality, Regulatory, Manufacturing Technology, Operations etc.) to deliver the design solutions.      Lead and ensure implementation and rigor of design control best practices with compliance to BD quality policies and procedures through appropriate communication, training, and education of sound quality assurance principals.      Ensure compliance with all local, state, federal, and BD safety regulations, policies, and procedures.      Define, plan and lead activities for test method & measurement system development and validation, fixture design and testing optimization in support of Design Verification.      Lead end to end responsibility of all the platform level testing and Lab management.      Lead creation and execution of verification protocols, summarize results, enable formal design reviews, and own the verification portion of the Design History File.      Demonstrate proficiency in spotting Design Variance through relevant statistical measures.      Interpret and analyze design verification data with respect to product performance and operational stability in the manufacturing plants.      Identify the best tools and approaches to effectively solve engineering problems to develop/optimize designs by leveraging an appropriate mix of first principles / analytical, computational, and experimental methods.      Experience solving problems, provides detailed insight and constructive criticism in complex situations, and foresees problems along with potential solutions.      Executes Continuous Improvement projects in the following (but not limited to) areas:      o Equipment or method troubleshooting/repairs.      o Coordinates with Test Method Development and Verification & Validation team for equipment and method validations      o Method or Equipment Upgrades      o Fixture maintenance      o Drawing or Specification modifications      Create and document novel test methodologies and provide feedback and recommendations for product/design changes.      Actively build on personal skills, expertise, and competencies. Ensure that technical lessons are reviewed, learned, and disseminated.      Ensure compliance with BD quality policies, procedures, and practices.      The incumbent will also be responsible for ensuring QMS conformance and ensure that the quality policy and objectives are met per organizational guidelines.              Organizational Leadership            Quality systems processes: Ensure implementation of quality systems processes including design controls and change control.        Project planning: Ensure quality and accuracy of integrated project plans encompassing all cross-functional activities and associated resource requirements.        Project management: Ensure comprehensive and effective project plans are developed and actively monitor progress against plans. Be accountable for the timely delivery of all project deliverables as specified in the plans.        Budgeting: Develop detailed budgets by project plans. Manage budget diligently and be accountable to perform to the project budget.    Stakeholder Management: Identify project stakeholders, establish, and monitor stakeholder engagement.    Technology transfer: Ensure efficient and effective transition from research to development to manufacturing in locations throughout the world.        Process effectiveness: Ensure appropriate processes are followed for effective and timely engagement of other parts of the company in project activities.    Innovation:      Develop and apply innovative approaches to ensure the best outcomes in all    aspects of the role. Support an environment in which innovation can flourish through    empowerment, encouragement, and support.    Organizational Development        Proactively develop, maintain & share technical knowledge in a specialized area(s), remaining up to date on current trends and best practices.        Actively lead, mentor, and motivate team members and junior associates, while also ensuring effective cross-functional communication and engagement. Provide frequent feedback. Continue to raise the bar on the group and help associates rise to expectations.        Develop and apply innovative approaches to ensure the effective capture, retention, and communication of technical and project knowledge generated (tacit & implicit).    Leadership        Responsible for leading, developing, and implementing critical component changes for high volume, disposable medical devices.      Influence others: Intuitively and quickly assess people and situations and act accordingly. Demonstrate strong persuasion and timing skills.      Remain open to be persuaded when appropriate.    Inclusive work environment: Promote and leverage diversity to achieve the best outcomes.        Leadership courage: Demonstrate and promote leadership courage by doing what is right. Engage those who disagree to persuade or be persuaded. Instill confidence in associates and customers.        Dealing with ambiguity: Demonstrate agility and action orientation when facing change and uncertainty. Effectively manage change and instill confidence.          Education      Full time Degree in a relevant engineering field is required (i.e., Mechanical, Industrial & Production, Chemical, Materials Engineering) or master s degree in a relevant engineering field is an added advantage.      Experience            7 - 12 years of experience in the engineering/technical field, with 3 years demonstrated project and team leadership, preferably in the medical device industry with a successful track record of project completion      Strong exposure to six sigma and lean methodologies would be an advantage      Candidates with prior experience in Medical Devices will be preferred

Independently determines and develops approach to solutions.        Contributes to a project of considerable significance or leads smaller scope projects. Demonstrates accountability for successful and timely completion of designated tasks.        Develops technical solutions to complex problems using sound engineering principles, utilizing experimental, computational, and analytical methods.        Designs and develops in vivo and in vitro models to evaluate product features and improvements. design engineering including new product design and optimizing existing products      In doing so the Lead Engineer will follow BDs Global Product Development System and relevant engineering tools to deliver a high quality, cost-effective design using BD s Stage Gate framework, DFM/DFSS to deliver cost-effective design-transfer and see it through into manufacturing      The successful candidate  He/she will ensure that translated product requirements are testable and measurable      The ideal candidate will also participate in executing technical and multi-functional design verification and design validation activities              Job Description    General Function          Lead R&D efforts through all phases of product development        Collaborate with Design & Development, Systems Engineering and cross-functional teams to ensure product requirements are verifiable and measurable.        Synthesize, develop, update, and optimize designs based on understanding design space.      Understand design options and trade-offs; managing critical parameters; leverage strong engineering fundamentals and tools. Incorporate manufacturing principles early in the development process.        Ensure deliverables are reliable across the design space, is adequately pressure-tested to satisfy user, regulatory and business requirements.      Understand system and subsystem design sensitivity and identify and address early any potential design integration and transfer risks.        Implement DFSS rigor throughout the design selection and development process, leveraging and deploying empirical, statistical, and analytical tools to drive informed design decisions and reduce design iteration cycle times.        Ensure the design considerations are embedding all applicable DFX (Design for Excellence) aspects including manufacturability, usability, reliability, and safety. Lead creation and execution of verification protocols, summarize results, enable formal design reviews, and own the verification portion of the Design History File.        Demonstrate proficiency in spotting Design Variance through relevant statistical measures.        Interpret and analyze design verification data with respect to product performance and operational stability in the manufacturing plants.        Identify the best tools and approaches to effectively solve engineering problems to develop/optimize designs by leveraging an appropriate mix of first principles / analytical, computational, and experimental methods.        Experience solving problems, provides detailed insight and constructive criticism in complex situations, and foresees problems along with potential solutions.        Executes Continuous Improvement projects in the following (but not limited to) areas:    o Equipment or method troubleshooting/repairs.    o Coordinates with Test Method Development and Verification & Validation team for equipment and method validations    o Method or Equipment Upgrades    o Fixture maintenance      o Drawing or Specification modifications        Create and document novel test methodologies and provide feedback and recommendations for product/design changes. Ensure compliance with BD quality policies, procedures, and practices.        The incumbent will also be responsible for ensuring QMS conformance and ensure that the quality policy and objectives are met per organizational guidelines.

column2: Purpose/Objective   To responsible for designing, planning, and overseeing the construction and maintenance of EHV switchyard systems. Equipment Selection: Select appropriate EHV equipment such as circuit breakers, disconnect switches, transformers, surge arresters, and other components, considering voltage levels, capacity, and environmental factors.  Technical Documentation: Create detailed technical documents, including design drawings, equipment specifications, and design calculations, ensuring accuracy and compliance with project specifications.  Safety and Compliance: Ensure that EHV switchyard designs adhere to safety standards, regulations, and environmental guidelines, with a focus on maintaining safe operating conditions.  Project Management: Manage EHV switchyard projects from concept through commissioning, ensuring adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards.  Troubleshooting: Provide technical support during construction and commissioning phases, assisting in resolving design-related issues and ensuring the successful integration of the switchyard into the power grid. Technical Competencies   Design Engineering - EHV ,Project Engineering Substation GIS & AIS ,Protection and Control System,Risk Assessment  Qualifications and Experience   Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field.  Strong knowledge of EHV equipment and components.

column2: CENTUM T&S, headquartered in France, is a business unit of Centum Electronics Group (Around 1000Cr turnover organization) offering a wide range of electronic and embedded systems design engineering services to international customers to help them realize complex products and sub systems. It includes design, development, qualification, value engineering, testbench design & manufacturing and many more services. Centum T&S has established its India operations in North Bengaluru, known as Centum T&S Pvt Ltd (CTS), formerly known as Centum ADENEO India Pvt Ltd. CTS is working with many top companies like Airbus, Thales, Hitachi Energy, GE, ABB, DANA, Alstom, etc.,  The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, multi-tasker, and demonstrated team-player. You will be responsible for the delivery of the items assigned to you with quality and should interact with cross functional team and resolve the problem. You should excel in working with global stakeholders and have outstanding communication and leadership skills and report to the Project Manager.  Key values, beliefs, and attitudes   Results-orientation: Focus on Customers, provide quality deliverables on time, within estimated effort with high quality  Characteristics for a design engineering services business: establish trust, responsive to change/adaptability; learn continuously, proactive, positive & joyful. Following actively and continuously work on own goals. Accountability for design work in quality, delivery & productivity aspects, at project level. Evaluating and proving fit and function of overall assemblies or particular features. Built design in respect of safety, reliability, manufacturability, assembly processes & cost. Cooperation with cross function team on verification of specific requirements from these areas. To drive activities (design, FEA, CFD, APQP, etc.) for development of turbocharger technologies, as part of new product development and customer launch. Design, simulate & qualify the turbocharger components and assemblies to meet internal validation requirements and customer needs. Define operation limits and update product specification  Define and execute qualification activities, required for product release (order prototypes, set up test conditions and analyse test results). column2: I.  Hiring specifications Job Purpose:  Responsible for designing scalable product for autonomous mobile robots. As a Mechanical Design Engineer you will be responsible for designing scalable product for autonomous mobile robots department, you will play a pivotal role in the design and development of state-of-the-art robotic systems. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including electrical engineers, software developers, and project managers, to create robots that push the boundaries of technology and reshape industries. Your creative thinking, technical expertise, and attention to detail will be essential in bringing concepts to life and ensuring the successful implementation of robotic solutions. Role Expectations:  Work mechanical design process for robotic systems, from concept to production, incorporating both functionality and aesthetics. Utilize CAD software (e.g., SolidWorks, Creo) to create detailed 3D models, assemblies, and technical drawings for various robot components and systems. Perform structural and thermal analysis to ensure the mechanical integrity and performance of robot designs, making necessary adjustments as needed. Collaborate with the electrical engineering team to integrate mechanical and electronic components seamlessly, considering factors such as space constraints and wiring management. Participate in design reviews, providing constructive feedback and addressing design challenges while maintaining alignment with project goals. Select appropriate materials and manufacturing processes, considering factors such as cost, durability, and production scalability. Contribute to the development of prototypes and conduct testing and validation to ensure designs meet performance and safety standards. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, new materials, and emerging technologies to drive innovation and continuous improvement in robotic designs. Provide mentorship and guidance to junior members of the mechanical design team, fostering knowledge sharing and skill development. column2: Looking for  Lead Piping Design Engineer or Head of department - Oil and Gas   for one of our client Location : Hyderabad   Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Piping Design Engineer with extensive experience in engineering design and 3D modeling, within the oil and gas industry. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in piping design, with specialized knowledge in ADNOC projects, wellheads, and degassing facility engineering and expertise in 3D modeling software such as Intergraph Smart 3D (formerly known as PDS) and Aveva E3D (formerly known as PDMS).. Key Responsibilities: Piping Design and Layout: Lead the development of piping design concepts, layouts, and detailed engineering drawings for oil and gas projects, with a focus on ADNOC specifications and standards.. Engineering Design: Collaborate with project teams to develop piping specifications, material selection, and equipment sizing in accordance with project requirements, industry codes, and regulatory standards. Ensure compliance with ADNOC guidelines and procedures throughout the engineering design process. 3D Modeling and Simulation: The engineer  shall be capable to large group of Designers and 3D modelers in a multidisciplinary project. The engineer shall be experience in managing client and conducting 3D model workshops Hands on experience in industry software, such as 3D Model Review Tools (SPR & NavisWorks), Caesar II, Autopipe, Orthogen, Shell MESC Standards, AutoCAD, Microstation and 3D Modeling Tools (PDS, SP3D, CadWorx, Autoplant), MS Office Suite, etc Technical Support: Provide technical support and guidance to junior engineers, drafters, and designers in the preparation of piping drawings and documentation. Review and approve engineering deliverables to ensure accuracy, quality, and adherence to project specifications. Project Coordination: Coordinate with multidisciplinary engineering teams, including process engineers, mechanical engineers, and structural engineers, to integrate piping design requirements with overall project objectives. Participate in design reviews, HAZOP studies, and constructability reviews as required. ADNOC Compliance: Maintain a thorough understanding of ADNOC standards, specifications, and procedures related to piping design and engineering. Ensure that project deliverables meet ADNOC requirements and facilitate necessary approvals and reviews with ADNOC authorities. Wellheads and Degassing Facility Expertise: Apply specialized knowledge and experience in the design and layout of wellhead facilities and degassing units. Develop piping arrangements, equipment layouts, and piping support structures tailored to the specific requirements of these facilities. Qualifications and Experience: Bachelors degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Minimum of 15 years of experience in piping design and engineering within the oil and gas industry, with a focus on ADNOC projects. Proficiency in engineering design software such as AutoCAD, PDMS, PDS (Plant Design System), or equivalent. Strong knowledge of piping codes and standards such as ASME B31.3, API, and ADNOC specifications. Experience in 3D modeling, clash detection, and simulation software. Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills. Familiarity with project management principles and practices.

column2: Job Description:  As a Mechanical Design Engineer on our robotics team, you will play a pivotal role in the design and development of state-of-the-art robotic systems. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including electrical engineers, software developers, and project managers, to create robots that push the boundaries of technology and reshape industries. Your creative thinking, technical expertise, and attention to detail will be essential in bringing concepts to life and ensuring the successful implementation of robotic solutions. Responsibilities: Work  mechanical design      process for robotic systems, from concept to production, incorporating      both functionality and aesthetics. Utilize CAD software (e.g., SolidWorks, Creo) to create      detailed 3D models, assemblies, and technical drawings for various robot      components and systems. Perform structural and thermal analysis to ensure the      mechanical integrity and performance of robot designs, making necessary      adjustments as needed. Collaborate with the electrical engineering team to integrate      mechanical and electronic components seamlessly, considering factors such      as space constraints and wiring management. Participate in design reviews, providing constructive feedback      and addressing design challenges while maintaining alignment with project      goals. Select appropriate materials and manufacturing processes,      considering factors such as cost, durability, and production scalability. column2: A CAD Designer, short for Computer-Aided Design Designer, is a professional responsible for creating detailed technical drawings and plans using computer software     They play a crucial role in various industries such as architecture, engineering, manufacturing, and construction, where precise and accurate drawings are essential for design, development, and production processes       Key Responsibilities:       Creating Technical Drawings: Develop detailed 2D and 3D drawings, schematics, and models using CAD software (eg, AutoCAD, SolidWorks, CATIA) based on project requirements and specifications     Drafting and Design: Collaborate with engineers, architects, or project managers to interpret concepts and sketches into precise, dimensioned drawings and designs     Accuracy and Precision: Ensure that drawings are accurate, adhere to industry standards, and meet regulatory requirements     Pay meticulous attention to dimensions, tolerances, and material specifications     Modifications and Revisions: Incorporate feedback and make necessary revisions to drawings as projects evolve or to address any issues during the design process     Technical Documentation: Generate bills of materials (BOMs), assembly instructions, and technical documentation to support manufacturing, construction, or procurement processes     Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineers, architects, project managers, and other stakeholders, to ensure seamless project development and execution     Software Proficiency: Stay current with CAD software updates and industry best practices     Maintain proficiency in using various CAD tools and explore new software to improve efficiency and capabilities     Quality Control: Perform regular quality checks to ensure the integrity and accuracy of CAD drawings and models     Problem Solving: Identify and resolve design-related issues and challenges that may arise during the project lifecycle     Project Management: Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring deadlines are met and projects are completed within budget constraints
