column2: HVAC PROJECT DESIGN ENGINEER KNND has been in service for over 20 years and continues to grow at a steady pace. If you would like to be part of a growing organisation as a HVAC Design Engineer,  let us connect    Responsibilities The primary responsibility for this position is to support our existing customers and secondary to our sales department for acquiring new commercial,  industrial and institutional projects and accounts. HVAC design engineers will work under instructions from design head for new or replacement heating,  cooling,  and refrigeration systems specific to customer needs and building specifications. Design Engineers will focus on solving problems related to air quality issues,  environmental issues,  or energy efficiency. The HVAC design engineer will need to work on residential,  commercial,  healthcare,  hospitality and industrial projects. The tasks would include completing HVAC- related drawings,  heat load calculations,  preparing project estimates,  generating BOQs from drawings and overseeing the installation of projects to completion.    Required qualifications Education: Bachelors degree required,  graduate certificates also considered Soft skills: AutoCAD,  Rivet,  BIM,  MS Projects,  Heat Load tools HAP or equivalent Job Skills: Communication,  design,  time management,  project management Required knowledge,  skills,  abilities HVAC design engineers need to have outstanding communication and design skills. Computer- aided design skills are crucial,  as are time management and project management skills in order to meet client and company needs promptly and efficiently. WHY KNND AssociatesKNND associates has a proven track record of over 20- years of personal commitment to our clients which is generated by an internal culture of trust and support among our employees.    Established on the innovative premise that the HVAC business is a relationship business,  KNND Associates is an industry leader in HVAC service,  maintenance,  installation and building automation controls expert of choice for the regions premiere healthcare,  commercial,  education and industrial institutions. KNND Team of over 250+ employees earns customer loyalty through its total commitment to smooth and efficient operation of the clients building. As trusted advisors and solutions providers,  KNND empowers facility owners and operators to optimize their building energy and operating performance. As a Design Engineer you will be critical in our companys ability to increase our market share and help our clients achieve their operational goals. In order to provide the excellent customer service that we tout,  it is critical for KNND Associates to attract and retain the best people in the business. We are always eager to meet highly qualified people whose passion for excellence and customer service match our own. As a regional merit shop with a national reputation for excellence,  our employees are empowered and supported.    Benefits Competitive base salary plus Bonus Auto Allowance

column1: Senior Tower Structure Design Engineer - Offshore
column2: Our Structural Design team is responsible for the design of project specific, offshore wind turbine towers and foundations, focusing on the primary (load carrying) structure.      The team handles not only the structural design, but also the drawings, production specifications, assesses any production deviations and is driving new technology developments in this field.      Design of offshore support structures is a multidisciplinary task in which we combine knowledge and understanding of the interplay between fields such as structural dynamics, hydrodynamics, geotechnics, (aeroelastic) loads analysis and production engineering.      As such we are looking for people that have experience in (a selection of) these fields.      The team has a presence in Den Haag (NL), Hamburg (DE), Vejle (DK) and Bangalore (IN). The current position is open for the Bangalore office.      Occasional international travel may be involved for training and/or project meeting purposes.              Depending on your field(s) of expertise the job encompasses (part of) the following responsibilities:          Perform project specific tower structure design and optimization studies for commercial as well as R&D projects.      Point of contact within your project(s) regarding the tower design scope, from the sales phase through installation.      Define project plan and follow-up on deliverables and timelines      Detailed design and analysis of project specific tower structures, covering tower shells, flange connections, doorframe, and other details in accordance with eg, Eurocode/DNVGL standards.      Execution of detailed analytical and/or finite element analyses.      Regular alignment with design stakeholders, including sales, loads, tower design, project management, CAD design.      Delivery of documentation for certification of the support structure.      Follow up on deviations during manufacturing, transportation, and installation.      Support R&D projects to develop the next generation support structure design solutions.          What do I need to qualify for this job          You hold an MTech/ MSc/ PhD degree in aerospace, civil (structural), mechanical engineering, or an equivalent field.      At least 5 years of proven, relevant, work experience is seen as an advantage.      It is considered beneficial when you have experience in the offshore (wind) industry, and you are familiar with relevant (offshore) design standards such as Eurocode, DNVGL, etc      Should be familiar with dynamic analysis of structure, fatigue analysis and fracture mechanics.      You are skilled in finite element analysis, preferably using ANSYS APDL or Workbench.      It is paramount that you are proficient in English, both in reading and writing.      We are seeking a person with excellent communication and presentation skills.      You thrive in an international environment; our projects bring together various employee groups, nationalities, cultures, and authorities.      As a person you should be enthusiastic, decisive, self-starting, result-oriented, customer focused, resourceful, and creative
column11: Structural design, Fracture mechanics, Aerospace, Project management, Analytical, Production engineering, CAD, Ansys, Turbine, Finite element analysis

column2: Your Job You will be driving design and development projects for PSBU Cable Assembly with focus on customer requirements and business value. In this position you have full ownership of your projects and would be the first point of contact for customer on any technical query. Your key tasks are to ensure that you capture the voice of customer and develop innovative and competitive concepts to address the customer needs. You are then expected to share the design requirements accurately to the internal and external stakeholders which includes sample manufacturing, process engineers, quality assurance team, manufacturing team, suppliers, testing labs etc. Our Team We are part of the Power & Signal Business Unit (PSBU) in Molex. We offer innovative and integrated solutions in design and development of cable assemblies and electronic solutions with an end-to-end support from Concept to Launch. We support a global and diverse customer base, and our cable assemblies are used in various market segments, including consumer, automotive, datacom and medical (excluding cables which directly touch human body) What You Will Do We work in an international and creative environment, and you will have to collaborate closely with colleagues from the global Molex organization and Design centers globally. As a Product Engineer, you will also be responsible for, Participate in customer call related to the project irrespective of time zone. Review feasibility based on the customer VOC. Prepare technical information for costing, Drawings and Related specifications. Release and Update drawings, specifications & validation results to Work Manager / Teamcenter. Initiate and track ECN / ECRs if needed. Lead Design Reviews & Participate in PFMEA & Design for Manufacturability reviews. Establish product qualification plans and reliability test sequences by working with CFT. Provide disposition of First Article Inspection reports on new parts in case of deviations. Coordinate with Sample Room to prepare samples and evaluate changes required thereof. Ensure compliance with all Molex policies & procedures in all related areas. Who You Are (Basic Qualifications) You have a strong critical thinking mindset and are result oriented. You are self-motivated and not afraid to work on complex issues where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors. At the same time, you are open for input from colleagues, are a team player and exercises judgment in selecting the optimum solution. You know how to uphold the required level of quality in a fast-paced environment. You have a flexible approach and can adapt to differing audiences and often advises others on difficult matters. Graduate in Engineering - Mechanical/ Electrical and Electronics. 4+ years of post-qualification experience in product design and development, preferably in cable assemblies. Understanding of the entire PLM cycle which includes product design, development, validation and part qualification. Experienced in communicating and presentation on different organizational levels. Ability to communicate technical challenges to non-technical stakeholders. Good work planning and prioritization skills. What Will Put You Ahead Working knowledge in CAD S/W - NX (UG), PLM Teamcenter & ALM- Polarion Good knowledge in change management process. Good Knowledge in DFMEA, GD&T, DFM & pFMEA. Hands on experience in product development cycle, PPAP and APQP process. Knowledge on Project Management, IATF 16949 or VDA 6.3

column2: As a Technical Designer, you will play a crucial role in translating design concepts  into detailed technical drawings and specifications. Your primary responsibility is  to prepare & ensure the accuracy and quality of technical output, including 2D  drawings, detailing, cutlist and material specifications. Key Responsibilities: 2D Drawings and Detailing: -Create detailed 2D drawings, including plans, elevations, and sections, using AutoCAD as per client requirements and designers specifications. -Ensure comprehensive detailing and annotation to accurately represent project requirements. -Prepare detailed drawings and specifications for internal components of kitchen, wardrobes, and storage units, adhering to design standards and  client preferences. Site Validation and Incorporation of Changes: -Participate in site validation processes alongside the design and project management teams to identify discrepancies. -Incorporate changes and rectify errors identified during site validation into the design documentation promptly. Cutlist and Bill of Materials (BOM) Preparation: -Generate comprehensive cutlists detailing the type and size of materials required for each project component. -Ensure accuracy in reflecting project specifications and requirements in the cutlists and BOMs. Material Optimization:Analyze drawings and specifications to optimize material usage and minimize waste, contributing to cost-effective project execution. Quality Control: Adhere to quality standards for all technical outputs, ensuring precision and accuracy in drawings and specifications. Requirements: AutoCAD Proficiency: Strong proficiency in AutoCAD is essential for this role. Education: Diploma/Degree in Architecture, Civil Engineering, or Interior Design. Experience: 4 to 6 years of experience in a similar role, preferably with a focus on residential interiors and furniture manufacturing. Technical Expertise: Previous experience in preparing Reflected Ceiling Plan layouts, false ceiling detailing, custom furniture drawings, electrical, lighting, and plumbing layouts. Software Proficiency: Proficiency in AutoCAD, SketchUp, cutlist and BOM tools, and Microsoft Office Suite. Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail with the ability to work collaboratively as part of a team. Knowledge and Experience: Familiarity with cutlist and BOM preparation processes, as well as an understanding of material selection and  optimization techniques. Stay updated with the latest hardware solutions and production techniques relevant to interior design projects.

column2: Role & responsibilities   1. Project Engineering Management - Focuses team on achievement of milestones and other key project objectives. - Listens to the team, discusses the issues, resolves problems and directs activities to remove roadblocks and achieve objectives. - Setting clear objectives for the project team including scope, schedule, productivity and budget targets. Keeping team members informed about project status and key performance indicators. - Overseeing, motivating and monitoring the performance of the team, ensuring quality and timeliness of assignments and roles, and addresses any performance gaps. - Appling knowledge of all aspects of project engineering to oversee successful technical coordination - Ensuring design team is aware and complying with customer Functional Specification/Basis of Design and applicable codes, standards and regulations. - Managing execution, coordination, and implements regular reviews/controls to track project progress. - Ensuring project schedules and resource plans are developed and utilized in managing the project tasks. - Translating contract requirements for project scope and deliverables - Understands the customers key drivers and objectives, establishes good working relationship with customer technical counterpart. Establishing relationships with external vendors and suppliers. Developing a customer relationship of trust and respect with ability to discuss project progress, challenges and issues in a transparent manner. 2. Schedule management - Set-up of overall engineering schedule including Reviews and Close-out Status Management (HAZOP study/Design Review/3D Modeling Review) - Contributes to the development of overall project schedule. - Supervises work in accordance with the approved schedule for engineering deliverables - Management of Key Vendor Data Status 3. Scope Management & Cost Control - Compliance with Project Execution Plan & requirements of the contract. - Effective change control process application - Change order management - Monitors cost aspects of the project within direct control to forecast final costs, identifies trends and takes action to avoid cost overruns. 4. Quality Management - Contributes to compliance with Hyundai engineering procedures and project requirement. - Monitor Engineering Deliverable Quality 5. Budget management - Management of Manpower Mobilization - Cost control for Subcontracting 6. Engineering Deliverable Management: - Ensures design team aware of and complies with client s Basis of Design and application regulations and codes. - Manages inter-discipline interfaces effectively. - FEED Verification Management - HOLD and Design Change Management - BOQ Compilation and Management - Management of Technical Query - Management of 3D model/HAZOP close-out status 7. Communication Management - Regularly provides clear reports to Operations Management - Effective communication with the design team and third parties. - Preparation of Engineering Reports (Weekly, Monthly) - Strong communication with head quarter and construction site - Coordination with engineering disciplines 8. Document Control - Set of Engineering deliverable format - Set-up & Management of project document system (Master Document Register) Management) - Document Control (Letters, Deliverable Transmittals) - Vendor document Control (Transmittal, Vendor document Register set-up) Preferred candidate profile   -Typically, 10+ years engineering experience including 3+ years engineering management and/or project management experience in EPC company for oil & gas, refinery and petrochemical and etc. - A Strong understanding of engineering workflow, engineering deliverable, key Design information, R&R between inter-discipline and engineering activities (Design review/3D Model review/HAZOP study and etc.). - A Strong understanding of Company Management and Knowledge Systems, processes and tools. - Ability to assist others and troubleshoot issues. - Competent in Microsoft Office software is essential, namely MS Outlook, Word, Excel, Teams and PowerPoint.

column2: Title: Write a Job Description for the Role of Senior Engineer at Sansera Engineering    Introduction:  Sansera Engineering is a leading engineering solutions provider, serving various industries such as automotive, aerospace, and industrial manufacturing. As we continue to expand our operations, we are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Senior Engineer to join our team. The Senior Engineer at Sansera Engineering will play a crucial role in driving innovation, overseeing complex projects, and mentoring junior team members.    Job Title: Senior Engineer  Job Location: [Location]  Reports to: Engineering Manager    Responsibilities:  1. Technical Expertise:  - Develop a deep understanding of Sansera Engineering's product range, systems, and processes.  - Provide technical expertise in design, development, and optimization of engineering solutions.  - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure project specifications, standards, and deadlines are met.  - Conduct detailed analysis and feasibility studies, and define new product requirements.    2. Project Management:  - Lead the planning, coordination, and execution of complex engineering projects.  - Develop project schedules, assign tasks, and monitor progress to ensure timely delivery.  - Identify potential risks and develop contingency plans to mitigate them.  - Coordinate with internal stakeholders across different departments to align project objectives and ensure effective communication throughout the process.    3. Product Development:  - Work closely with the research and development team to design and develop advanced engineering solutions.  - Participate in the entire product development lifecycle, from conceptualization to production launch.  - Conduct testing, troubleshooting, and debugging to ensure product performance and quality.  - Contribute to the continuous improvement of existing products and processes.    4. Team Leadership and Mentorship:  - Lead a team of engineers and provide guidance in the execution of projects.  - Mentor and train junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and professional development.  - Delegate tasks, provide constructive feedback, and ensure the team's productivity and growth.    5. Technical Documentation:  - Prepare accurate technical reports, specifications, and documentation in compliance with the company's standards.  - Ensure documentation is maintained and updated throughout the project lifecycle.  - Contribute to the creation and revision of standard operating procedures (SOPs) related to engineering processes.    Requirements:  - Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical, Electrical, or relevant Engineering field.  - Minimum [X] years of experience in engineering roles, preferably in the automotive or aerospace industry.  - Strong technical knowledge and expertise in product development, design, and optimization.  - Proficiency in using CAD software, simulation tools, and other engineering software.  - Project management skills with the ability to drive multiple projects simultaneously.  - Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.  - Demonstrated leadership abilities and experience in leading and mentoring a team.  - Strong written and verbal communication skills.  - Demonstrated ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams.    Join Sansera Engineering:  At Sansera Engineering, we offer a dynamic work environment that encourages innovation and professional growth. As a Senior Engineer, you will have the opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge engineering solutions, work on diverse projects, and shape the future of the industry. If you're looking for an exciting challenge and the chance to make a significant impact, we invite you to join our team. Apply now and become a part of our journey towards engineering excellence!    Roles and Responsibilities   .

Excellent interpersonal and written communication skills to work in a global environment across different time zones.  Able to work in a matrix team environment and interact with other teams. column2: Lennox International has been built on a heritage of integrity and innovation dating back to 1895. We are dedicated to providing trusted brands, innovative products, and unsurpassed quality with responsive service. We are a Fortune 500 company and a world leader in residential and commercial heating, cooling, ventilation, and refrigeration systems. We have started our operations in India in Chennai in 2010. Lennox India Technology Centre is a R&D Centre with Mechanical Analysis, Embedded  Software, Hardware, and IT divisions. Our companies are spread across U.S, Europe, Asia Pacific, and Australia.  Required Skill Set  Five (5) to seven (7) Hands on experience in Creo and Windchill Worked on defining the product architecture  Experience on defining assembly methods in Creo based on various use cases and generation of BOM from the assembly models Experience on managing the E-BOM and M-BOM in Windchill Ability to Create part Families as per the product structure Capture rules and standards using properties, connections, sub part Family linking to DB tables. Define product data management architecture Defining attributes for part and assemblies and managing attributes in Windchill Good Problem-solving skills.  Experience of working/ understanding of Residential and commercial HVAC domains  HVAC Product Knowledge CAD Customization Basic understanding heat transfer and thermodynamic cycle. Able to work with the guidance to support the business.  Small size or mid-size project management experience added advantage  Job Description   Work closely with the Engineering and manufacturing team to gather requirements and come up with product data architecture for Bom and assembly documentation Define the product specification strategy which includes drawing, 3D specification, Attributes, engineering documents etc Define the rules for modeling and drawing creation.  Define rules to create product architecture and define the assemblies such that we can reuse the designs much efficiently. Define and maintain the standard process and procedures for the engineering data management using Creo and Windchill Automation of the design, drawing creation and BOM activities Define the process for creation of E-BOM and M-BOM  Must be able to multitask as multiple testing efforts run in parallel. Work well with limited supervision & ensure the new product development project schedule is on track. Able to analyze, investigate, brainstorm and implement a solution to new requirements.

column2: The right candidate will be placed in the Product engineering or product development team. Role and responsibilities will include leadership and technical support to a cross-functional team (across geography and domain). This involves leading the independent project, technical discussions, decision making, driving projects in coordination with different sites, rigor in planning & execution steps, monitoring, and control.     The Lead Engineer will have to inclusively lead TCI team members and ramp up capabilities within the team. This will need hands-on execution of the project, supporting other team members, and establishing good practices for cross-platform project execution. The Lead position requires a good balance of technical expertise and interpersonal skill to ensure all stakeholders remain positively involved and the project is delivered at the right quality on time. The ideal candidate will gain product domain knowledge and establish a good teamwork mechanism to ensure effective execution of product engineering projects.     The associate will also be responsible for leading the verification strategy creation and execution to deliver high-volume single use disposable medical products. He will be responsible for end-to-end Lab Management activities for the platform. The Lead Engineer will be involved with all aspects of design engineering including new product design and optimizing existing products. In doing so the Lead Engineer will follow BDs Global Product Development System and relevant engineering tools to deliver a high quality, cost-effective design using BD s Stage Gate framework, DFM/DFSS to deliver cost-effective design-transfer and see it through into manufacturing. The successful candidate will lead test method development activities encompassing measurement system development & analyses, test fixture design and equipment hardware/software validation for measurement system equipment. He/she will ensure that translated product requirements are testable and measurable. The ideal candidate will also participate in executing technical and multi-functional design verification and design validation activities.         Job Description       General Function         Lead R&D effort on B2B projects.         Developing and maintaining the product variance based on market and customer needs.         Lead R&D efforts through all phases of product development.         Collaborate with Design & Development, Systems Engineering and cross-functional teams to ensure product requirements are verifiable and measurable.         Synthesize, develop, update, and optimize designs based on understanding design space. Understand design options and trade-offs; managing critical parameters; leverage strong engineering fundamentals and tools. Incorporate manufacturing principles early in the development process.         Ensure deliverables are reliable across the design space, is adequately pressure-tested to satisfy user, regulatory and business requirements. Understand system and subsystem design sensitivity and identify and address early any potential design integration and transfer risks.         Implement DFSS rigor throughout the design selection and development process, leveraging and deploying empirical, statistical, and analytical tools to drive informed design decisions and reduce design iteration cycle times.         Ensure the design considerations are embedding all applicable DFX (Design for Excellence) aspects including manufacturability, usability, reliability, and safety.         Coordinate with the cross-functional teams (i.e., D&D, Systems Engineering, Marketing, Quality, Regulatory, Manufacturing Technology, Operations etc.) to deliver the design solutions.         Lead and ensure implementation and rigor of design control best practices with compliance to BD quality policies and procedures through appropriate communication, training, and education of sound quality assurance principals.         Ensure compliance with all local, state, federal, and BD safety regulations, policies, and procedures.         Define, plan and lead activities for test method & measurement system development and validation, fixture design and testing optimization in support of Design Verification.         Lead end to end responsibility of all the platform level testing and Lab management.         Lead creation and execution of verification protocols, summarize results, enable formal design reviews, and own the verification portion of the Design History File.         Demonstrate proficiency in spotting Design Variance through relevant statistical measures.         Interpret and analyze design verification data with respect to product performance and operational stability in the manufacturing plants.         Identify the best tools and approaches to effectively solve engineering problems to develop/optimize designs by leveraging an appropriate mix of first principles / analytical, computational, and experimental methods.         Experience solving problems, provides detailed insight and constructive criticism in complex situations, and foresees problems along with potential solutions.         Executes Continuous Improvement projects in the following (but not limited to) areas:         Equipment or method troubleshooting/repairs.     Coordinates with Test Method Development and Verification & Validation team for equipment and method validations     Method or Equipment Upgrades     Fixture maintenance     Drawing or Specification modifications         Create and document novel test methodologies and provide feedback and recommendations for product/design changes.         Actively build on personal skills, expertise, and competencies. Ensure that technical lessons are reviewed, learned, and disseminated.         Ensure compliance with BD quality policies, procedures, and practices.         The incumbent will also be responsible for ensuring QMS conformance and ensure that the quality policy and objectives are met per organizational guidelines.         Organizational Leadership         Quality systems processes: Ensure implementation of quality systems processes including design controls and change control.         Project planning: Ensure quality and accuracy of integrated project plans encompassing all cross-functional activities and associated resource requirements.         Project management: Ensure comprehensive and effective project plans are developed and actively monitor progress against plans. Be accountable for the timely delivery of all project deliverables as specified in the plans.         Budgeting: Develop detailed budgets by project plans. Manage budget diligently and be accountable to perform to the project budget.         Stakeholder Management: Identify project stakeholders, establish, and monitor stakeholder engagement.         Technology transfer: Ensure efficient and effective transition from research to development to manufacturing in locations throughout the world.         Process effectiveness: Ensure appropriate processes are followed for effective and timely engagement of other parts of the company in project activities.         Innovation: Develop and apply innovative approaches to ensure the best outcomes in allaspects of the role.         Support an environment in which innovation can flourish throughempowerment, encouragement, and support.         Organizational Development         Proactively develop, maintain & share technical knowledge in a specialized area(s), remaining up to date on current trends and best practices.         Actively lead, mentor, and motivate team members and junior associates, while also ensuring effective cross-functional communication and engagement. Provide frequent feedback. Continue to raise the bar on the group and help associates rise to expectations.         Develop and apply innovative approaches to ensure the effective capture, retention, and communication of technical and project knowledge generated (tacit & implicit).         Leadership         Responsible for leading, developing, and implementing critical component changes for high volume, disposable medical devices.         Influence others: Intuitively and quickly assess people and situations and act accordingly. Demonstrate strong persuasion and timing skills. Remain open to be persuaded when appropriate.         Inclusive work environment: Promote and leverage diversity to achieve the best outcomes.         Leadership courage: Demonstrate and promote leadership courage by doing what is right. Engage those who disagree to persuade or be persuaded. Instill confidence in associates and customers.         Dealing with ambiguity: Demonstrate agility and action orientation when facing change and uncertainty. Effectively manage change and instill confidence.         Education       Full time Degree in a relevant engineering field is required (i.e., Mechanical, Industrial & Production, Chemical, Materials Engineering) or master s degree in a relevant engineering field is an added advantage.       Experience         7 - 12 years of experience in the engineering/technical field, with 3 years demonstrated project and team leadership, preferably in the medical device industry with a successful track record of project completion.         Strong exposure to six sigma and lean methodologies would be an advantage. Candidates with prior experience in Medical Devices will be preferred.         Experience in customized product engineering is critical.         Excellent skill in create and maintaining the product variance based on market and customer needs         Experience in working with CRO and regional marketing leaders         Demonstrated experience working directly with customers to develop specifications, needs, etc.         Experience with contract negotiations (time, money, commitments, etc.) and associated quoting process.         Knowledge         Six Sigma knowledge/Black /Greenbelt certification, DFSS, MSA         PMP Certifications/Project Management knowledge         ISO 20417, ISO 15223-1, ISO 13485, ISO 14971, ISO 62304         Sustenance Engineering project delivery knowledge         Statistics and Verification methods         Tool knowledge SAP, Master control, JDE added advantage Exposure to CAD/CAE tools (Solid Works, AUTOCAD, PRO-E, etc.) specializing in mold flow, structural designs, CFD and plastics domain is desired.         Good understanding of medical device product development risk management methodologies (EURA, FMEA, etc.) will be an added advantage.         Expertise with test method development, validation strategy, and execution is required.         Expertise with design verification & validation strategy development and execution is required.         Expertise in fixture design & development.         Strong track record of technical problem solving and effective product development through expert application of engineering principles is required.         Design controls expertise and experience with traditional and modern fabrication techniques is required.         Proven experience in leading CAPAs, design-defect analyses, remediation is required.         Proficiency in solid mechanics/mechanics of materials and proficiency statistical methods/tools is required.         Experience with design standard methodologies, including advanced tolerance design, and design for reliability.         Working with regulatory standards         Exposure to Chemistry/ Chemical Engineering and/or structural analysis and simulation/mathematical modelling desirable.         Knowledge         Six Sigma knowledge/Black /Greenbelt certification, DFSS, MSA         PMP Certifications/Project Management knowledge         ISO 20417, ISO 15223-1, ISO 13485, ISO 14971, ISO 62304         Sustenance Engineering project delivery knowledge         Statistics and Verification methods         Tool knowledge SAP, Master control, JDE added advantage Exposure to CAD/CAE tools (Solid Works, AUTOCAD, PRO-E, etc.) specializing in mold flow, structural designs, CFD and plastics domain is desired.         Good understanding of medical device product development risk management methodologies (EURA, FMEA, etc.) will be an added advantage.         Expertise with test method development, validation strategy, and execution is required.         Expertise with design verification & validation strategy development and execution is required.         Expertise in fixture design & development.         Strong track record of technical problem solving and effective product development through expert application of engineering principles is required.         Design controls expertise and experience with traditional and modern fabrication techniques is required.         Proven experience in leading CAPAs, design-defect analyses, remediation is required.         Proficiency in solid mechanics/mechanics of materials and proficiency statistical methods/tools is required.         Experience with design standard methodologies, including advanced tolerance design, and design for reliability.         Working with regulatory standards         Exposure to Chemistry/ Chemical Engineering and/or structural analysis and simulation/mathematical modelling desirable.         Skills         Ability to lead and teach others to assess project/program needs, formulate strategy, build support, and execute initiatives.         Strong interpersonal and influence skills.         Ability to engage and mentor team members and to maximize diverse perspectives to achieve the best outcomes.         Ability to analyze, organize and present large amounts of data in a clear and concise manner.         Disciplined, detailed, and well organized with managing documentation in a regulated environment.         Ability to execute concurrently multiple projects and manage priorities.         Ability to work independently with global exposure is desired.         Strong written and verbal communication skills.         Advanced Problem-solving skills.         Strong Cross-functional Project Leadership skills.         Strong technical and managerial judgment.         Team orientation.         Strong skills in project planning and management.         Broad and deep understanding of disciplined change control processes, regulatory, and quality requirements.         Strong motivational fit.         Strong fit with BD values.         Desired / Additional Skills & Knowledge (Not essential to the job but will be an advantage to possess)         Experience in solid modelling (SolidWorks) or electromechanical systems is a plus.         Experience in high-volume manufacturing processes is a plus.         Experience developing and commercializing medical devices is a plus.         DFSS training or certifications are a plus.
column11: CFD, Fabrication, Product engineering, Manager Quality Assurance, Simulation, AutoCAD, Project management, CAD, Product design, Structural analysis

column2: Technical lead is responsible to within the area of Door Trim product development and details of product design according to standards and guidelines.     Translate defined product design performance criteria in CAD data specifications.     Applies a variety of concepts, practices, and procedures related to Automotive Interior Parts         Area of Responsibility:         This position is responsible for new establishing, planning and running the Automotive Interior trims design and development of trims.     He/ she Should be able to produce engineering design and concepts into 3D model using CATIA V5.     Complete ownership of Design and development of Glazing, Creat e Master sections considering Tooling Feasibilities leading and progressing the design in line with the program timescales and deliverable cadence 3D2D (CATIA V5)     Ensure Standard methodologies are followed to meet Regulatory, Safety Quality requirements.     To be able to assign and get the work done from team members effectively.     Should able to lead the design reviews with cross functional teams lead engineers.     Adequate knowledge of plastic molding and design process, DFMEA, DVP, DFA/DFM.     Knowledge of GDT, component drawings, Standards and Guidelines etc.     Ensuring that the all project deliverables is met at given time with Dashboard document. column2: Structural Analysis: Conducting thorough analysis of structures, using software and manual calculations, to ensure their stability and strength under various conditions such as wind loads, earthquakes, and other environmental factors      Design: Designing safe and sustainable structures, ensuring they meet all relevant codes and regulations      This includes creating detailed drawings, specifications, and calculations for construction      Material Selection: Selecting appropriate materials for construction and supervising their testing to guarantee quality and reliability      Project Management: Managing projects from conception through to completion, including organizing and overseeing construction works, resolving design and development problems, and ensuring projects are completed within budget and on time      Site Inspections: Conducting regular site visits to ensure that construction is proceeding as planned, and structures are being built according to the design specifications and safety standards      Collaboration: Collaborating with architects, other engineers, and construction teams to ensure the integration of the structural design with other aspects of the project      Documentation: Creating and maintaining comprehensive project documentation, including drawings, calculations, and reports      Client Interaction: Communicating technical information to clients and stakeholders in a clear and understandable manner, addressing their concerns and ensuring client satisfaction      Research: Keeping up-to-date with the latest developments in the field, new materials, and construction techniques, and integrating this knowledge into designs and projects      Qualifications:Bachelors degree in Civil or Structural Engineering (Masters degree is often preferred)      Professional Engineer (PE) license is required in most jurisdictions      Several years of experience in structural engineering, preferably in a consulting or design firm      Proficiency in structural analysis software and computer-aided design (CAD) software      Strong knowledge of engineering principles, codes, and standards      Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail      Strong communication and interpersonal skills      Ability to work both independently and in a team      Project management skills are often beneficial

column2: A Water Resources & Public Health Engineer is responsible for designing, implementing, and managing water supply and sanitation projects to ensure access to clean and safe drinking water and proper sanitation facilities     This role involves assessing water resources, developing infrastructure, and ensuring compliance with public health standards     The engineer will collaborate with multidisciplinary teams, government agencies, and communities to improve public health outcomes related to water and sanitation     Key Responsibilities:Water Resources Assessment:Conduct surveys and assessments to evaluate available water resources     Analyze data to determine water quality, quantity, and sustainability     Identify potential sources of water pollution and propose mitigation measures     Infrastructure Design and Implementation:Design water supply and sanitation systems, considering population needs and growth projections     Prepare detailed engineering plans, specifications, and cost estimates     Supervise construction projects, ensuring compliance with design standards and regulations     Water Treatment and Distribution:Design and oversee water treatment processes to ensure the provision of clean and safe drinking water     Develop distribution networks, including pipelines, pumps, and reservoirs, to supply water to communities     Sanitation and Waste Management:Design and implement sanitation facilities, including sewage systems and wastewater treatment plants     Promote proper waste management practices to prevent environmental contamination     Compliance and Regulation:Stay updated on relevant regulations, codes, and standards related to water resources and public health engineering     Ensure projects comply with local, regional, and national regulations     Community Engagement and Education:Collaborate with communities to raise awareness about waterborne diseases, hygiene, and sanitation practices     Conduct public education programs to promote water conservation and proper sanitation habits     Data Analysis and Reporting:Collect and analyze data related to water quality, usage, and infrastructure performance     Prepare reports and presentations summarizing project progress, challenges, and outcomes     Emergency Response and Disaster Management:Develop contingency plans for water supply during emergencies and natural disasters     Coordinate with relevant authorities to provide immediate assistance in crisis situations     Qualifications:Bachelors or Masters degree in Civil Engineering, Environmental Engineering, or related field     Professional engineering license (PE) is preferred     Strong knowledge of water resources management, hydrology, and environmental engineering principles     Proficiency in relevant engineering software for design and simulation     Excellent project management and communication skills     Ability to work effectively in interdisciplinary teams and liaise with stakeholders     Experience:Several years of experience in water resources engineering or related field     Experience in managing water supply and sanitation projects from conception to completion     Familiarity with public health engineering practices and standards

column2: As a Senior Design Engineer, you are responsible for leading and overseeing the design process for various engineering projects     Your role involves taking a holistic approach to designing solutions, considering technical feasibility, functionality, performance, and cost-effectiveness     You may work in various industries, such as mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, civil engineering, or product design         Here are some key skills and responsibilities of a Senior Design Engineer:         Design expertise: You have extensive knowledge and expertise in your specific field of engineering, such as mechanical, electrical, or civil engineering     You are proficient in using design software and tools relevant to your field, such as CAD (Computer-Aided Design) software     Project management: As a senior engineer, you may be responsible for managing and overseeing multiple design projects simultaneously     This includes creating project plans, setting timelines, allocating resources, and ensuring that projects meet quality standards and deadlines     Technical leadership: You provide technical guidance and leadership to a team of design engineers     You mentor and support junior engineers, review their work, and provide feedback to improve their design skills     Problem-solving and innovation: You are skilled at analyzing complex engineering problems, identifying innovative solutions, and optimizing designs for efficiency, performance, and reliability     You leverage your experience and expertise to overcome technical challenges

column2: The Lead Design Engineer will be a key contributor on a R&D team within BD- Specimen Management. The individual in this position will have a complete understanding of a wide application of technical principles, theories, and concepts. He/She provides solutions that are imaginative, thorough, and practical to a wide range of complex problems.       Job Description       Works under general direction.     Independently determines and develops approach to solutions.     Contributes to a project of considerable significance or leads smaller scope projects.     Supports material/design/process changes to the product line through design control process, with well documented research/analyses. Demonstrates accountability for successful and timely completion of designated tasks.     Develops technical solutions to complex problems using sound engineering principles, utilizing experimental, computational, and analytical methods.     Designs and develops in vivo and in vitro models to evaluate product features and improvements.     Applies innovative & logical risk-based approach to product development challenges with the capacity for original thinking. Develops robust test methods, design test fixtures and execute measurement system analysis.     Ensures compliance with BD quality policies, procedures, and practices through appropriate communication, training, and education of sound quality assurance principles.     Plans, executes, and analyzes design of experiments (DOE).     Writes, implements, and leads bench studies, tolerance stack up analysis, design verification, validation, vendor interactions, materials specifications, and component specifications.     Performs data analysis using statistical tools, regression analyses and develop transfer functions.     Collects, records, reports, interprets, and analyzes data, presents results to peers and business leadership.     Provides advanced engineering skills and product evaluation support to the platform toward building business cases for new opportunities.     Sound knowledge of engineering first principles.     Strong technical judgment and technical leadership skills.     R&D functional planning, requirement generation and technical (DFSS/Design/Cross functional) reviews for all product development phases.     Strong project management, prioritizing and multi-tasking skills to work within tight deadlines.     Proficient in solid modeling (Pro/E, SolidWorks or equivalent).     Ability to communicate concepts, ideas, and knowledge effectively and clearly to other individuals and teams.     Experience in directing associates and leading small cross-functional groups is required.     Proficient in Microsoft Project.     Disciplined phase-gate product development processes and project planning.     Proficiency with fixture design including basic machining considerations and developing test methods.     Understanding of Measurement Systems Analysis (MSA).     Knowledge of Six Sigma (DMAIC) practices, and Design for Six Sigma (DFSS) methodologies.     Product development considerations for tightly controlled high-volume manufacturing process.     Strong creative, analytical and problem-solving skills required.     Good written and verbal communication skills.

Understanding of Measurement Systems Analysis (MSA).     Knowledge of Six Sigma (DMAIC) practices, and Design for Six Sigma (DFSS) methodologies. Good written and verbal communication skills.

column2: As a part of Blades team in Bangalore location you will execute projects in collaboration with our Blade teams in Denmark, USA, Spain and other locations     The Blade Structural Design Department is responsible for the design of new blades for Offshore and Onshore market, tools development, blade handling, certification, validation, industrialization and handling of warranty cases     We are looking for people who are compliant, systematic, self-initiative, team player and consistent with excellent communication skills and the ability to communicate in all verticals with multicultural international stakeholders             What are my responsibilities           As an Individual contributor, working from office, you will be part of structural design and development of wind turbine rotor blade structures. Perform the composite blade structural analysis using ANSYS CLASSIC and analytical methods / MATLAB scripting.          Drive the blade handling analysis strategy. Build capability and capacity in blade handling analysis area.         As a Blade Component Owner, responsible for structural changes of blades in production, resolving non-conformities, develop and implement cost-out and quality improvement measures in serial production to improve product competitiveness.               What you need to make a difference           Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change.         You must have Postgraduate in Mechanical / Aerospace Structures / Civil Structures / Relevant engineering from Premier Institutes         You must have minimum 5-10 years of relevant experience in the area of composites structural analysis and design.         You should have good knowledge of MATLAB, willing to get expertise in MATLAB to contribute on automation activities.         Good understanding on handling analysis of large, layered composite structures / sandwich panel structures like blade.         Good hold on contact analysis in ANSYS CLASSIC and high-fidelity FE modeling analysis.         Based on observations from structural analysis you should have ability to propose an optimal composite lay-up design to meet structural requirements.         Good understanding of DFMEA, risk assessments and 8D/RCA process. Should be able to take component ownership.         Knowledge of wind turbine blade design, materials, structural analysis, review process, guidelines, manufacturing, testing, inspection, repair and transport methods.         Should be outgoing, determined, good team player, inclusive with global team members and persistent with strong communication and collaboration skills. Drive technical solutions, review with internal team and solution providers working across the globe. Should be ready to travel to meet the business requirements.         Working experience of wind turbine blade design, materials, structural analysis, review process, guidelines, manufacturing, full blade testing process, inspection, repair and transport methods         Wind blade manufacturing process and related operations like glass Lay-up, drilling, painting, handling, repair and inspection etc         Knowledge of reading 3D/2D drawings, PLM process, knowledge on modelling software s like NX / AutoCAD         Knowledge on interaction between aero, loads and structural design.               In return of your commitment we offer you            Become a part of our mission for sustainability: Clean energy for generations to come         A global team of diverse colleagues who share passion for renewable energy         Trust and empowerment to make your own ideas reality         Personal and professional development to grow internally within our organisation         Competitive Pension Scheme

column2: The AWS DevOps Engineer is responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure for software applications using Amazon Web Services (AWS).          Key responsibilities include:         Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Use tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible to automate infrastructure deployment and management.     Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Set up and maintain pipelines for code integration and deployment using tools like Jenkins, CircleCI, or CodePipeline.     Monitoring and Logging: Implement and maintain monitoring and logging solutions to ensure high availability and performance of applications.     Security: Ensure the security of the AWS infrastructure by implementing best practices and following security-related guidelines and policies.     Cost Optimization: Monitor and optimize AWS costs, making recommendations for cost-saving measures.     Collaboration: Work with development teams to implement and maintain infrastructure solutions that meet their needs and support their workflows.     The ideal AWS DevOps Engineer will have a deep understanding of AWS services and tools, as well as experience with automation tools like Terraform, Ansible, or Cloud Formation.      They should have a strong understanding of CI/CD practices and a good understanding of security best practices in the cloud.     Additionally, strong communication and collaboration skills are essential.
column11: cloud, automation, devops, testing, AWS

column2: About Schneider Electric   Schneider Electric SE  is a French multinational company that specializes in digital automation and energy management. Schneider Electric is a publicly traded Fortune Global 500 company, the company posted revenues of 34.2 billion. It addresses homes, buildings, data centers, infrastructure and industries, by combining energy technologies, real-time automation, software, and services. Schneider Electric is the parent company of APC, Aveva, L&T E&A among so many. Electrical & Automation (E&A)  is a part of Schneider Electric, which has a presence across the globe. We believe people are the core of everything we do at Electrical & Automation. We are incredibly proud of our people practices, which are progressive, particularly our policies around growth, diversity, equity, and inclusion. The health & well-being of our employees is of the topmost priority for us. India is one of the 4 global hubs, which implies that the Indian business plays a key role in India and globally  for technology, innovation, and manufacturing for the company. It also provides a plethora of opportunities for all kinds of profiles in India with a major focus on digital transformation including roles such as data analytics, data science, digital services, AI, among others. Over the years our Company has been widely recognized such as - by Kincentric as the Best Employer; by Catalyst for our efforts in Diversity, Equity & Inclusion; by SHRM for our policies around well-being; and many more. Our Companys vision for sustainability aligns with Indias vision. We have been actively contributing to India?? growth story by supporting key government initiatives such as Make in India, Smart Cities, Startup India, and Atmanirbhar Bharat. Job Description: Experience: 5-7 years Qualifications : BE/B.Tech/MTech (Electrical/Electronics/ECE/EEE)  Key Responsibilities/Deliverables: 1. Extensive Experience in C & C++. Embedded RTOS experience with exposure to threads/tasks, synchronization, scheduling, message queues, semaphores, mutexes and events 2. Debugging experience - Like J-Link debugger with ARM of STM32, C2000 of TI, NXP,  3. Experience with Communication Protocols (Modbus - RTU/TCP, TCP/IP, CAN, USB, RS232/485, SPI, I2C, IOT). Experience with Peripherals (DMA, LCD, FLASH, RAM, ADC, DAC, PWM, voltage/current/temp sensors). Ability to read schematics and interpret the behaviour of electronic systems. 4. Familiar with JIRA and GitHub, SVN or similar. Code coverage and analysis. Basic knowledge of power electronics products. 5. Experience in design of complex state machines. Experience with Model-based state machine design. Experience and knowledge of developing PC Software with .net/C#/Python. Functional Competencies 1. Extensive experience and knowledge in embedded firmware development for power electronics products 2. Should be able to execute task independent. 3. Prepare test cases and handle functional testing of firmware. Behavioural Competencies 1. Ability to adapt & learn. 2. Problem solving skills. 3. Act like owners.   If interested and found this job suitable, then do apply through Schneider's career?? page

column2: A CAD/GIS (Computer-Aided Design/Geographic Information System) professional is responsible for utilizing specialized software and technology to create detailed maps, plans, and spatial data for various purposes, including urban planning, environmental management, engineering projects, and more      The job description for a CAD/GIS professional typically includes the following responsibilities and qualifications:Job Responsibilities:Spatial Data Management: Collect, manage, and analyze geographical data using GIS software      This involves organizing and storing spatial data, performing spatial analysis, and creating maps and visualizations      Mapping and Cartography: Develop detailed and accurate maps for various purposes, including land use planning, infrastructure development, and environmental monitoring      Ensure that maps are visually appealing and easy to interpret      Data Analysis: Conduct spatial analysis to identify patterns, trends, and relationships within geographical data      Interpret the results of analysis and present findings to stakeholders      CAD Design: Create precise and detailed technical drawings and plans using CAD software      This can include architectural drawings, engineering designs, and layout plans for various projects      Database Management: Manage GIS databases, ensuring data accuracy, consistency, and integrity      Perform data validation and quality control procedures      Collaboration: Collaborate with professionals from various disciplines, such as urban planners, architects, engineers, and environmental scientists, to provide GIS support and contribute to multidisciplinary projects      Software Proficiency: Stay updated with the latest GIS and CAD software and tools      Proficiency in software like ArcGIS, AutoCAD, QGIS, and other relevant applications is essential      Problem Solving: Identify and resolve GIS-related issues and challenges      Develop innovative solutions to improve efficiency and accuracy in GIS and CAD processes      Documentation: Maintain accurate records of GIS data, methodologies, and analysis results      Prepare technical reports, documentation, and presentations for internal and external stakeholders      Qualifications:Educational Background: Bachelors or Masters degree in Geography, Geomatics, Civil Engineering, Environmental Science, or a related field      Additional certifications in GIS and CAD technologies are a plus      Technical Skills: Proficiency in GIS software (such as ArcGIS, QGIS) and CAD software (such as AutoCAD)      Knowledge of programming languages like Python for automation and scripting is beneficial      Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze complex spatial data and derive meaningful insights      Attention to Detail: Keen attention to detail and accuracy, ensuring precise mapping and data analysis      Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills      Ability to explain complex GIS concepts and analysis results to non-technical stakeholders      Teamwork: Ability to work collaboratively in multidisciplinary teams and coordinate with professionals from diverse backgrounds      Time Management: Effective time management skills to handle multiple projects and deadlines simultaneously      Industry Knowledge: Knowledge of industry standards, regulations, and best practices related to GIS and CAD applications in fields such as urban planning, environmental management, civil engineering, and architecture
column11: GIS, CAD Operator, Electricals

column2: As a Sr. Mechanical Engineer working in the new product development group, you will be responsible for a broad range of engineering tasks from requirements / design / implementation and testing. Our mission is to deliver to the market highly reliable products for which Emerson is well known and our customers demand.      In support of that mission, you will be responsible for rapid familiarization with our embedded products, Product design and technological needs.      This role requires a well-rounded skillset with the ability to understand technical requirements, work with technical leads & develop technical solution that meets the requirements as per Emerson s quality standards.      A highly technical expertise with hands-on experience in design, development and testing is critical for this role.      This role will require understanding technical requirements to technological assessment to designing a product that complies to regulatory standards needed for the product.      A strong exposure to product development life cycle processes, tools & methodologies is crucial to ensure process driven product development.                      Essential Job Functions:          Duties      Tasks    Design and Implementation        Design, implement, and enhance Mechanics for electric actuators, ensuring seamless integration with the hardware/Electronics        Mechanical Development        Develop Mechanical designs solutions from concept to deployment, which includes design calculations, tolerance stack up and design simulation of components works as intended        Performance Optimization        Analyze and optimize mechanical design.      Responsible for ensuring efficient design meets all the necessary performance specifications.        Collaboration        Collaborate with other engineers, including hardware, software, and test engineers, to ensure that the mechanical design is compatible and integrates smoothly with all other components of the product.        Testing and Troubleshooting        Conduct testing for endurance and performance of mechanical assemblies and improve the performance of overall system        Product Lifecycle Management        Participate in all phases of product development including design, prototyping, testing, certification, and manufacturing support        Continuous Improvement        Current with the latest trends, technologies, and methodologies in mechanical development and the broader mechatronics                          Education / Experience Required:          Education: BE/B.Tech, ME/ M.Tech Mechanical Engineering or equivalent      Motivated professional with 6 to 8 years of relevant experience in industrial product design and development. Hands on experience in NPD design cycle for Electric Actuators, Valves gearboxes and relevant test standards.      Must have expertise in Gearbox design (Planetary, Worm ) and hold working Knowledge of KISSsoft design software.      Candidate must have sound experience of Castings, Sheetmetal parts design, product validation & manufacturability.      Candidate must have experience in performing Design calculations, Tolerance Stack-up and problem solving.      Proficiency in Solid Edge, CAD PLM, FEA tools      Good Knowledge of GD&T, DFMA, FMEA.      Knowledge of Standards like ASME, ISO, ATEX, IECx, CSA, FM etc.      Self-motivated, capable of working with minimal supervision.      Experience of working in global engineering environment with effective communications skills      Undertakes work in an efficient and timely manner.      Strong interpersonal skills and team player.      Good understanding of Microsoft tools like Excel, Word, PowerPoint etc.      A willingness to learn is critical.      Experience in working principle of BLDC, AC and Servo motors would be added advantage.      Experience on working on Creo added advantage.                  Knowledge / Skills / Abilities:          Generate new creative ideas & design concepts, Idea verification by analytical calculations, sketches, 3D modelling, etc.      Convert ideas/concepts into workable models/proof of concepts and validate the designs through prototyping, testing and analysis.      Prepare detail designs, drawings, manufacturability, and Bill of materials.      Successful industrialization (from detail design to production readiness) of new products      Participate in Design Review Meetings, Ideation events and come up with innovative solutions.      Adherence to Quality processes, On time delivery & Quality of the deliverables      Work with cross functions - marketing, supply chain, manufacturing, and other stakeholders to review the designs, update status and meet the project objectives.      Good knowledge of manufacturing processes like Casting/Machining/Sheet metal.      Prepare technical documentations, presentations, reports etc.      Experience in electronics packaging including PCBA mechanical design, incorporation of sensors and metal enclosures that comply with IEC or NEMA      Willing to learn and explore new technology.      Should possess analytical approach in solving problems.

column2: This role is part of Arcadis Global Excellence Centre (GEC) and will join our 3,000+ talented individuals working in India, Romania, and Philippines, in partnership with Arcadis offices globally      The GEC brings key capabilities and capacity to support our clients seamlessly around the world      For those in GEC there are options to be dedicated to one country; developing deep knowledge and strong relationships, as well as opportunities to be part of teams working truly globally as a centre of excellence, offering diversity and variety      Arcadians are by nature, globally minded and culturally aware, and Arcadis strongly believes in flexibility which enables change over time as your career progresses      The GEC model is well embedded in Arcadis, and the strong relationships that exist between our global offices are truly unique              To deliver primary substation design projects working with Arcadis Australia Power Team meeting high quality standards and drive technical excellence in the team.      To bring engineering capabilities to preliminary and detail design of high voltage primary electrical plant including substations, power generating stations, windfarms and solar farms.      To develop industry knowledge of international design standards through internal technical training, certifications and continuing education.      To demonstrate leadership on assigned projects and build capability of the team on primary design.          Role Accountabilities        The main responsibilities of this role include, but are not limited to:        Preparing and reviewing engineering deliverables including complex reports, proposals, presentations, and drawing packages with the Brisbane Power Team.      HV transmission and distribution substations primary electrical design: layout design, specification of plant, coordination of civil design.      Earthing system analysis and design.      Taking personal responsibility for the preparation of detailed engineering documentation and leading the engineering effort for project including providing technical and performance oversight for members of the power team.      To manage selected projects, project task/responsibilities as assigned, and/or design processes (or parts of projects) to meet agreed budget, quality and timeframe targets.      To deliver fully documented designs to meet Client objectives and Arcadis quality system requirements.      To develop the technical competency of direct reports/ junior team members and ensure application of relevant international and Australian standards and engineering knowledge in various projects.          TECHNICAL RESPONSIBILITIES:          Apply engineering knowledge, techniques and tools complying with international design standards and Australian Codes and Standards relevant to assigned project.      Prepare document and drawing package for the appropriate project design submission stage complying with codes and standards and delivering the design with high quality.      Conduct internal review and quality checks of engineering drawings and design calculations to ensure compliance with the projects requirements.      Prepare and register all relevant documentation and design reports and ensure all documentation is accurate and in compliance with the Arcadis and customer requirements.      Leading interdisciplinary coordination as required for the project.      Leading technical issue resolution processes.      Liaise with other disciplines and ensure all requirements are understood.      Understanding scope and change in scope when it arises.      Use software packages as required for the design and delivery          COMMERCIAL RESPONSIBILITIES:          Record man-hour charges accurately into weekly timesheets and ensure correctness of project and non-project man-hour charges.      Proactively manage selected projects (or components of projects), take responsibility for resource allocation, manage subcontractors, manage the production of analysis and design (including drawings and reports), ensure the integrity of the overall design (in collaboration with other design disciplines), quality assurance and client feedback.      Identify opportunities and driving implementation of re-engineering strategies to maximise the profitability of design components.      Pursuing new opportunities, identifying, and documenting scope, schedule, budget and exclusions.          PEOPLE MANAGEMENT RESPONSIBILITIES:          Resource and develop skills and knowledge base of more junior engineers assigned on projects.      Liaise with Project Manager, BIM Manager and BIM Coordinators assigned to projects.      Self time-management.          OTHERS:          Liaise with Arcadis lead offices representatives and other consultants as appropriate to the project.      Working to achieve project delivery on time to budget and to a high standard in accordance with Client expectations.      Take responsibility for defined tasks within prescribed limits.      Gain experience and proficiency in Arcadis systems and procedures.      Become familiar and compliant with Health and Safety regulations and guidelines.      Perform other duties and responsibilities as required relevant to the role from time to time          Qualifications & Experience:        An ideal candidate for this role will have the following qualifications and experience:        At least 10 years experience in substation primary design, preferably in a consulting environment.      Consulting experience in power projects in Australia is preferred.      Experience in the production of CAD documentation to Australian Utility Standards and other international design standards.      Experience in utility processes from concept stage to construction and as-built drawings will also be beneficial.      Graduate of Bachelor of Technology/ Science in Electrical Engineering from recognized University.      Excellent English written and verbal communication skills.      Excellent mathematical skills applied in engineering calculations.      Organizational skills and proactive approach in project management.      Ability to provide solutions to technical problems.      Ability to lead, with good influencing, motivating and delegating skills.      Actively continue to develop technical knowledge and new emerging technology through regular CPD training.      Professional registration with any leading engineering body such as Engineers Australia is preferred.          Highly Regarded Skills          The ability to develop cable thermal rating studies and design using CYMCAP.      The ability to develop complex earthing and induction models in CDEGS earthing system software.      The ability to develop maintenance strategies and procedures, commissioning plans and documentation.      At least 2 years experience in design & drafting electrical infrastructure in Australia, general familiarity with the electricity supply industry, electricity transmission and distribution practices and related topics      Have knowledge of drafting and BIM, how to define BIM outcomes, BIM processes, how to coordinate a BIM project within the 3D environment and how to apply design to the models they produce.      Drafting standards experience and knowledge and application of functions within CAD.      Computational design, design algorithms and automation of data manipulation

column2: LRR Technologies is currently hiring talented people to work with Carrier Corporation. Carrier Corporation (NYSE: CARR) is a global provider of innovative heating, ventilating, and air conditioning (HVAC), refrigeration, fire, security, and building automation technologies boasting annual sales of over $20 billion, with 58,000 employees spread across 160+ countries. For its R&D centre in Hyderabad, Carrier is looking for a talented Design Engineer. Carrier was founded in 1915 as an independent, American company, manufacturing and distributing heating, ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC) systems, as well as commercial refrigeration and food service equipment. Built on Willis Carriers invention of modern air conditioning in 1902, Carrier is a world leader in heating, air-conditioning and refrigeration solutions. We constantly build upon our history of proven innovation with new products and services that improve global comfort and efficiency.   Skills and qualifications: Proven ability to capture engineering design and operation problems as mathematical programming problems (NLPs), including attention to reliable convergence of such problems. Proficient with the mathematical theory (applied mathematics, numerical analysis and functional analysis), algorithmic foundations (notably existence and convergence proofs), and methods/tools for numerical optimization (SQP, interior point method, etc.) of large-scale systems. Experience from using common algorithms/solvers for large-scale gradient-based non-linear programs, e.g., IPOPT, CONOPT, KNITRO, and WORHP, including their respective applicability to different types of problems. Experience from formulating and solving discrete optimization problems and using common algorithms, including CPLEX and Gurobi. Familiarity with physics-based modeling principles and best practices of thermo-fluid systems, such as vapor compression cycles or power plants. Familiarity and experience with development of computational platforms and tools in Python or equivalent. Familiarity with using HPC and cloud-based platforms for computation at scale. Demonstrated ability to work as part of a multidisciplinary team and an entrepreneurial attitude towards technological innovation in a global environment. Self-starter who is well-organized in an international team environment, with proven communication skills.   Responsibilities: Deployment. Support that methods and tools developed in the group impact the Carrier business through engagement in global product projects, including capture and formulation of computational problems arising in such projects. Methods, tools and algorithms. Ensure that appropriate computational methods, tools and algorithms for large-scale numerical optimization are based on sound mathematical foundations and are deployed to match the needs of the Carrier business, including contributing to the architecture, development, testing and documentation of the methods and tools developed in the group. Modeling for optimization. Support development of mathematical models for thermo-fluid systems are built based on principles and best practices that secure reliable application of numerical optimization algorithms. Talent. Support development and training of staff within Carrier product teams and within the Computational Engineering group; contribute to talent pipeline by supervising student internships and theses.   Qualification and Experience Required:   MEng or PhD in a relevant Engineering discipline (e.g., applied mathematics, mechanical or chemical engineering) with 5+ years of experience. Perks and Benefits: The position will pay quite well - Rs. 20-27 lakh per annum is the band, and the final amount may be even higher depending on your experience and expertise. If made an offer, you will need to join in 4 weeks. This is the opportunity of a lifetime for people looking to specialize in highly coveted niche futuristic skills, and to work in a top multinational company with excellent employee-first initiatives. We look forward to your application.

column2: Job Description Job Summary If you are a product design and development professional, Emerson has an exciting role for you! We are looking for a Design Engineer/ Senior Design Engineer to work with our Pervasive Sensing Team. This role will work independently and as a part of a team to execute ETO, NPD and VA/VE programs for Knife gate valve products. You will be work on Valve design tasks, which includes concept design, Structural strength calculations, refer international standards, product testing, Release manufacturing drawings, working with suppliers to resolve technical queries and develop prototype samples and interact with Global Engineering teams.
