Undertake calculations and preparation of design records to verify mechanical design of valves and accessories. Preparation of design documentation for Design Reviews Work closely with manufacturing teams and suppliers to conduct Design for Manufacturing (DFM) considerations. Preparation of submissions for Product Certifications applicable to valve industry. Create / Review 3D part & assembly models, 2D manufacturing drawings, engineering BoMs. Support sales & marketing literature, technical documentation incl. IOMs , TDS and Technical Bulletin. Who You Are:? You Continually assesses the market potential of an innovative idea or solution. You find and champions the best creative ideas and actively moves them into implementation. You focus efforts on continuous improvement; has a knack for identifying and seizing opportunities for synergy and integration. You Continually scans the environment for technology breakthroughs. Experiments with a wide range of existing technologies while applying new and emerging options that can enhance organizational outcomes. For This Role, You Will Need: Minimum 4 to 10 years' Proven experience on new product designs, development, engineering calculations and design Documentation Experience with industrial design standards like ASME/ANSI standards, API, EN etc. Should have good understanding of Machinability, Manufacturing processes like Casting or Forging components and materials use in General mechanical industry. should have good knowledge/work experience on valve testing and certifications like PED, API etc Should have at least one of CAD tool experience - Inventor, SolidWorks or any. Fluent in English (both written and verbal) and effectively communicate with Local, Global & cross-functional teams. Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart: Bachelor's Mechanical Engineering Degree or related Engineering Design for Six sigma or equivalent process certificates will be an added advantage Our Offer to You: By joining Emerson, you will be given the opportunity to make a difference through the work you do. Emerson's compensation and benefits programs are designed to be  competitive within the industry and local labor markets . We also offer a  comprehensive medical and insurance coverage  to meet the needs of our employees. We are committed to creating a global workplace that  supports diversity, equity and embraces inclusion . We welcome foreign nationals to join us through our  Work Authorization Sponsorship . We attract, develop, and retain exceptional people in an inclusive environment, where all  employees can reach their greatest potential . We are dedicated to the ongoing development of our employees because we know that it is critical to our success as a global company. We have established our Remote Work Policy for eligible roles to promote  Work-Life Balance  through a hybrid work set up where our team members can take advantage of working both from home and at the office. Safety is paramount to us, and we are relentless in our pursuit to provide a  Safe Working Environment  across our global network and facilities. Through our benefits, development opportunities, and an inclusive and safe work environment, we aim to create an organization our people are proud to represent.

column2: Energy, Siemens LimitedIndia is seeking a responsible, professional, and self-motivated individual tojoin the Gas Turbine R&D, Gurgaon as Gas Turbine- Engine Integration (SAS& Heat Transfer) Engineer .      Thisposition provides an exciting opportunity to work in a fast-paced, dynamic,global product development & service environment. Secondary air system andWhole engine model assessment.          Incorporate best practices from Siemens gas turbines regardingengine operations and controls. Post-processing of Secondary air system results to be applied inWhole Engine thermo-mechanical model for metal temperature predictions andclearance s optimization. More than 6 years of experience in the design and development ofGas turbine components in context to Secondary air system, whole enginemodeling, clearances & sealing design.          Basic understanding of gas turbine components and operations,including key design criteria in context to Secondary air system & Wholeengine models.          Experience with Fluid Mechanics & Heat Transfer techniques inGas turbines. Knowledge of fluid and structure interactions to simulate SS andtransient conjugate thermal analysis.          Proficiency in one or multiple computational modeling tools forthermo-mechanical or computational fluid dynamics analysis (eg, SC03, CFX,Ansys, Abaqus, NASTRAN, ProE, NX etc). column2: Position Overview:  We are seeking a talented Design Engineers and leaders specialized in Mechanical engineering with 3 to 10 years of experience. Ideal candidate will have experience in designing sheet metal, plastics Parts and Packaging material design for power/ industrial electronics and embedded products. These engineers will Work closely with production manufacturing team and vendors to deliver timely cost effective and reliable designs. Location: Bangalore, India   About Us: Delta Electronics, World leader in power conversion technologies has established its modern and cutting-edge R&D center in Bangalore. Situated in the heart of the tech hub, this center will drive innovation in power electronics, industrial automation, EV technologies. Equipped with advanced resources, it will facilitate next-gen product development to address global customer needs and stay ahead in technology. Benefits:  - Competitive salary and benefits package, including health insurance, retirement plans, and performance bonuses. - Opportunities for professional development and career growth within a global leader in power electronics - dynamic and collaborative work environment with opportunities to work on cutting-edge projects and technologies - Delta Electronics India Pvt. Ltd. is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes candidates from all backgrounds to apply.

column2: Energy, Siemens Limited India is seeking a responsible, professional, and self-motivated individual to join the Gas Turbine R&D, Gurgaon as Gas Turbine- Engine Integration (SAS & Heat Transfer) Engineer               This position provides an exciting opportunity to work in a fast-paced, dynamic, global product development & service environment     This position is for an experienced professional, who will be responsible for assessment of flows (Secondary air system model) thermals and displacements (Whole engine model) to support R&D projects of Gas turbines           The selected candidate will join an aspiring team of engine integration engineers working on existing GT product and/or the next generation of Siemens Gas turbines.                        Synthesis and Analysis of Secondary air system (SAS) & Wholeengine (WE) models to estimate mass flows, thermals & displacements of gasturbine development programs.          Complete ownership of the Secondary air system & Whole enginemodels for different gas turbine variants.          Fully accountable for model results and successful completion ofdesign or gate reviews for NPI s and service upgrades.          Perform quick design trade studies via. Secondary air system andWhole engine model assessment.          Incorporate best practices from Siemens gas turbines regardingengine operations and controls.          Develop instrumentation and testing plans to support enginedevelopment program and calibrate/validate SAS & WE models based on themeasured instrumentations.          Post-processing of Secondary air system results to be applied inWhole Engine thermo-mechanical model for metal temperature predictions andclearance s optimization.          Collaborate with different design groups to drive design changesin order to optimize engine performance.                              We do't need superheroes, just super minds:                      Bachelor / masters degree in Mechanical/aerospace engineeringdiscipline from recognized university.          2 to 6 years of experience in the design and development of Gasturbine components in context to Secondary air system, whole engine modeling,clearances & sealing design.          Basic understanding of gas turbine components and operations,including key design criteria in context to Secondary air system & Wholeengine models.          Experience with Fluid Mechanics & Heat Transfer techniques inGas turbines.          Knowledge of fluid and structure interactions to simulate SS andtransient conjugate thermal analysis.          Proficiency in one or multiple computational modeling tools forthermo-mechanical or computational fluid dynamics analysis (eg, SC03, CFX,Ansys, Abaqus, NASTRAN, ProE, NX etc).          Problem-solving ability.          Data analysis skills.          Verbal and written communication skills.          Positive Interpersonal skills ((ie, team player, quick learner,ability to adapt quickly & effectively etc)

Your new role -challenging and future-oriented             Responsiblefor designing Gas Turbine Combustion components (e.g. combustion liner,nozzles, transition duct, fuel piping system etc.) to meet full spectrum ofdesign requirements (functionality, robustness, cost effectiveness,manufacturing requirements and technology, assembly requirements and servicerequirements)         Developmentof innovative design solutions. Controls risk of design changes withappropriate methods like FMEA.         Appliesappropriate methods which focus on robust design, like tolerance stack up,GDT, analysis, standards and design rules.         Creates,evaluates, reviews and applies specifications and other technical documents,e.g. design philosophy, purchasing specification, working specification,drawings, BOM, MM, check lists, manufacturing data, standard part calculationsand component description.         Create/prepare/review2D and 3D CAD models and drawings of individual/assembly, UG-NX model of GasTurbine stationary and Rotating components. Tool experience in UG-NX will bepreferred.         Exposureexperience in model-based definition or PMI will be preferred          Create,understand, review modify manufacturing / assembly / fabrication drawings ofGas Turbine components. Create/review bill of material, Material Master,inspection specification of GT components as per SIEMENS standard practice.         Act as atechnical support towards workshops, procurement, and sites.         Independentlyexecute fault investigations.       We don t need superheroes, just super minds               Bacheloror master s in mechanical design from recognized college/university          At least 6years of work experience with mechanical design in turbomachines. Experience inGas Turbine component mechanical design will be preferred.          Proficiencyand experience in design tools, 3D CAD software UG-Nx, standard manufacturingprocess, standard fit tolerances.         Experiencein product data management tools Teamcenter, PLM2020 and SAP.         Experiencein GDT (geometric dimensioning and tolerances), tolerance stack up.         Experienceworking with Pressure Equipment Directive, PED will be preferred.         Proficiencyand experience in creating/reviewing manufacturing / assembly / fabricationdrawings of Gas Turbine components.          Goodunderstanding of bill of material, Material master, material specification etc.         Stronginter-personal skill i.e. team player, quick learner, imaginative, innovative,         Ability toadapt quickly effectively etc.         Basicmechanical integrity knowledge with ability to perform simple handcalculations.         Hands onexperience from mechanical workshops are considered to be beneficial.         You arefluent in English both in speech and in writing.
column11: Fabrication, Procurement, SAP, Manufacturing process, Mechanical, Siemens, Mechanical design, Gas turbine, Technical support, 3d cad

column2: You will be responsible for Thermodynamic design of Siemens Turbo Compressor.     The position will be based in Pune, India , in the global challenging technical environment. One must closely coordinate with the counterpart and monitor project KPIs like quality, project budget and on time delivery.           Responsibilities           Compressor flow path geometry finalization, Calculation of Stage design data, checking sales design w.r.t. thermodynamic criteria and finalize it. Which is relevant to CoCo dept, Forward engineering dept, rotodynamic dept. and I&C dept also.     Power and thermodynamic calculation, Knowledge of Startup curve, Surge control and discharge condition, Compressor control equations, IGV and speed limitations.     Customer documents - We provide performance curves, starting torque curve and API datasheet to customer.     Checking the design i.e., doing design review internal with all depts.     Dealing with PM, Sales, Forward Engg, Rotodynamic Engg, System Engg. depts. during execution.     Communication with internal / external clients about technical aspects. Doing Proposal/Sales Support.     Providing technical support to colleagues.     Ensure quality and timely deliveries of engineering documentation.     Knowledge of Tools / Softwares-GUI , SAP , Teamcenter will be added advantage.           Required Knowledge/Skills, Education, And Experience           Engineering background (Preferably Masters degree and specialization in Thermodynamics OR Other comparable degree)     of relevant engineering work experience.     Ability to work independently with clarity on scope and responsibility.     Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.     High flexibility in taking new tasks/responsibilities     Proactive and Solution Oriented. Ability to Pull inputs and interact with interface partners.     and their components will be added advantage.     Analytical skills, ability to understand cross culture people

As a team of remarkably diverse engineers, we recognize that what we are really engineering is a brighter future for us all. Drafters      may work in a specialty area or be generalists.        Job Overview        An AutoCAD drafter uses computer - aided design and drafting software to develop drawings and plans for construction and manufacturing industries. Their technical drawings are used by architects, engineers, surveyors, and scientists and may depict plans for anything from toys to spacecraft. Completion of a certificate program or an associate's degree with a focus on drafting is generally required to work as an AutoCAD drafter.

column2: Job Overview:  As a Pipe Stress Engineer at Sarla technologies Pune , you will play a key role in ensuring the integrity and reliability of piping systems in oil and gas projects. Your primary responsibility will be to conduct thorough pipe stress analysis, identify potential issues, and recommend effective solutions to ensure compliance with industry standards and project specifications.     Responsibilities:     1. Perform comprehensive pipe stress analysis using industry-standard software tools to evaluate the structural integrity of piping systems. 2. Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams, including design engineers, to ensure that piping layouts and designs meet project requirements and applicable codes. 3. Conduct piping flexibility and supportability analysis to optimize the design and minimize the risk of stress-related failures. 4. Review and interpret project specifications, standards, and codes to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements. 5. Provide technical guidance and support to junior engineers and designers involved in piping design activities. 6. Collaborate with other engineering disciplines to resolve interdisciplinary issues and ensure overall project success. 7. Participate in project meetings, presenting findings, and making recommendations to enhance the performance and reliability of piping systems.     Qualifications:     1. Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field. 2. Minimum of 5 years of experience in pipe stress analysis within the oil and gas industry. 3. Proficiency in using industry-standard pipe stress analysis software (e.g., Caesar II, AutoPIPE). 4. Strong knowledge of relevant industry codes and standards (ASME, API, ANSI, etc.). 5. Familiarity with piping materials, fabrication, and construction practices. 6. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively within a team. 7. Detail-oriented with strong problem-solving and analytical skills. 8. Professional Engineer (PE) license is a plus.

column2: Job Description  We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Body-in-White (BIW) Designer who must have handson experience in the automobile domain having worked on BIW space frame structures. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in the design and development of BIW components, ensuring they  meet stringent quality, performance, and safety standards.   Duties and Responsibilities    Space Frame Design: Lead the conceptualization, design, and development of space frame structures  for electric vehicles, balancing weight, stiffness, and crashworthiness considerations.   Structural Analysis: Utilize advanced simulation and analysis tools to evaluate and optimize space  frame designs for structural integrity, durability, and NVH (Noise, Vibration, and Harshness)  characteristics.   Material Selection: Identify and assess suitable materials (e.g., aluminum, carbon fiber) for space  frame construction, considering factors such as weight, cost, manufacturability, and sustainability.   Integration with Vehicle Components: Collaborate closely with other engineering teams (e.g., chassis,  powertrain, aerodynamics) to ensure seamless integration of space frame structures with vehicle  components and subsystems.   Prototype Development: Oversee the prototyping and testing of space frame designs, coordinating  with internal teams and external partners to validate performance and meet regulatory requirements.  Manufacturability Optimization: Work with manufacturing engineering teams to optimize space frame  designs for efficient and cost-effective production, considering assembly processes, tooling  requirements, and automation opportunities.   Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance space frame design  processes, tools, and methodologies, leveraging lessons learned from prototyping and testing  activities.   Documentation and Reporting: Maintain comprehensive documentation including design  specifications, drawings, analysis reports, and test results, ensuring compliance with internal  standards and industry regulations.   Quality Assurance: Ensure compliance with quality standards and regulatory requirements  throughout the space frame design and development process, implementing appropriate validation  and verification procedures.   Supplier Management: Collaborate with suppliers to source materials and components, manage  relationships, and ensure timely delivery of high-quality parts for space frame production.    Required Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities   Bachelors degree in mechanical engineering, Automotive Engineering, or related field. Master's  degree preferred.   Minimum of 4 to 8+ years of experience in BIW design and development, with a focus on Space frame in the automotive industry.   Proficiency in CAD software (e.g., 3DX CATIA, SolidWorks, Siemens NX) and structural analysis tools  (e.g., ANSYS, Abaqus).   Strong understanding of automotive manufacturing processes, materials, and industry standards.  ??Experience with electric vehicles or alternative propulsion systems is highly desirable. ??Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work effectively in a fast-paced,  collaborative environment.   Effective communication skills with the ability to present complex technical concepts to crossfunctional teams and management.

column2: A controls engineer, also known as an automation engineer or a systems engineer, is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining control systems for various industrial processes and equipment     The primary focus of a controls engineer is to ensure efficient and reliable operation of automated systems in industries such as manufacturing, power generation, oil and gas, automotive, and many others       The job description of a controls engineer may vary depending on the specific industry and company, but here are some common responsibilities and tasks associated with the role:       System Design: Designing control systems that meet the requirements of the project, considering factors such as safety, efficiency, reliability, and cost-effectiveness     This involves analyzing process requirements, selecting appropriate control hardware and software, and creating system architectures and specifications     Programming and Configuration: Developing control logic and programming software for programmable logic controllers (PLCs), distributed control systems (DCS), human-machine interfaces (HMIs), and other control devices     This includes configuring communication networks and protocols, implementing control algorithms, and troubleshooting software issues     System Integration: Integrating various components and subsystems of the control system, such as sensors, actuators, motors, and communication interfaces     This involves hardware installation, wiring, and ensuring proper communication and interaction between different elements of the system     Testing and Commissioning: Conducting tests and simulations to verify the functionality and performance of the control system     This includes performing system-wide tests, conducting factory acceptance tests (FAT) and site acceptance tests (SAT), and resolving any issues or bugs identified during the testing phase     Troubleshooting and Maintenance: Diagnosing and resolving control system malfunctions, equipment failures, or performance issues     This includes troubleshooting electrical and software problems, conducting root cause analysis, and implementing corrective measures to restore system functionality     Regular maintenance and calibration of control systems are also part of the responsibilities
column11: Usage, Manufacturing technology, Consulting, Corporate, Packaging, Instrumentation, Operations

column2: FEA Analyst  -  Engineering Services | Engineering Solutions Pune | Ideametrics    Jr. FEA Analyst FEA Analyst Sr. FEA Analyst      The primary role of the FEA Analyst is to perform FEA analysis for process equipment. Create tools for routine FEA analysis i.e. automation of the work process will be another task for the FEA analyst. Candidates must have knowledge of standards i.e. Codes like ASME, PD 5500, AD 2000, EN, etc. FEA Analyst must contribute in the growth of company by creating software tools for Ideametrics internal processes and analysis types with codal requirement.      Ideametrics was setup by people who have strong technical background graduate from IIT Bombay in Design Engineering and shown great aptitude for Engineering problem solving capabilities.      Any Engineer recruited in Ideametrics has to go through a training period wherein the gap between academic and industry expectations is filled gradually to make the candidate a great engineer first then to delegate complex engineering tasks. The training period is based on the premise to make the candidate into a complete engineer who will be a problem solver, capable of solving complex engineering tasks single handedly equipped with cutting edge tools. Consider this to be like a full - stack Mechanical Engineer like the Computer Science counterpart.      The training period starts with working on basic 3D modelling tasks, where starting with simple geometries the candidate progresses to modelling critical components that require through imagination. Once comfortable in 3D modelling and having gained enough domain knowledge, the candidate starts to assist our expert engineers in their analysis learning first hand from them and then replicating the tasks done by them. As the training progresses, the candidate is delegated tasks in Finite Element Analysis based on simple problems which are easy to understand gaining confidence and expertise step by step the candidate then becomes capable of handling problems moderately complicated and delivering project reports for the same. We believe at this point the candidate has transformed into an Engineer and may start working on our core tasks independently.      We invite talented engineers who have dreamt of working in a technically challenging position and we ensure will add meaning and purpose to their careers.      UG Mechanical engineer having minimum 2 years of experience @ Ideametrics.    PG -  M Tech in Design Engineering.    Doctorate -  Mechanical or FEA.      Jr. FEA Analyst 2 Years of Experience at Ideametrics Pvt Ltd (subject to passing tests for Jr. FEA Analyst) or M Tech Degree in Design.    FEA Analyst 6 Years.    Sr. FEA Analyst 8 + Years Experience.    Technical Skills Required:    Any 3D Modeling Software Knowledge      Python or C#.net      ASME, AD, EN, PD5500, Vessel Design Code Requirement.    Roles Responsibilities:    Work with Technical team heads management team to create process automation for routine analysis types.      Roles includes performing analysis for the process equipment such as (but not limited to) pressure vessel, heat exchangers, columns, reactor and so on.      Create software tools for routine analysis jobs by coordinating with Ideametrics management team.      Roles also includes working on Ansys workbench orand Ansys Classic APDL.      Creating scripts using APDL coding.      Must have very good communication skill (oral and written) while communicating internally to the team members and externally to clients.      Should have good background in mechanics, linear and non - linear finite element analysis procedures and methods using ANSYS. Should have hands on experience in multi - body parts in ANSYS and sweep meshing and multi - domain meshing in ANSYS Mechanical.      Create software packages using APDL language, C#.net or Python language for the existing processes set @ Ideametrics Pvt Ltd. The design work includes overseeing the detailing of the design, completion of all assembly drawings, and the ordering of any special purchases. In addition, the task will also include controlling and developing the planning document for determining all motion control components and function/cycle time diagrams. Tasks will include controlling changes needed to the designs due to customer part changes, manufacturing, and assembly issues. Individual will be required to find solutions to all and any problems from the design phase up through customer runoff. Education & Experience Requirements: Ability to comprehend 2-D drawings. Proficient use of AutoCAD (2020 and higher). Knowledge of mechanical design, material science, manufacturing processes, and geometric dimensioning and tolerancing. Knowledge of ISO, DIN standards, and metric system. Knowledge of manufacturing safety standards. Strong knowledge of static and dynamic mechanics. Proficient use of NX Completed studies in the field of mechanical engineering, years of subject-specific professional experience Confident handling of 3D CAD systems, preferably Siemens NX and MS-Office skills Experience in design of hydraulic clamping fixtures Automotive Experience in design of gantries, conveyors Preparation of drawings and bills of materials Definition of tolerances (GD & T), heat treatments and material selection Creation of standard drawings (e.g. CAD structures, guidelines, guidelines and standardization catalog) Adaptation of requirements for components and assemblies Structured and analytical approach Strong communication and ability to work in a team, sense of responsibility, passion for complex constructions

Job Title: Mechanical Design Engineer No. of Openings: 1 Department/Group:Engineering  Job Code/ Req#:DPENG.005/2024 Location:Naraina, New Delhi Travel Required:Yes  CTC Range:2.5 lac - 3.5 lac Position Type:Full time HR Contact:hr@dronepwr.in Address: A-81, Naraina Industrial Area Phase-1, New Delhi-28 Job Description: We are seeking a motivated Mechanical Design Engineer with expertise in the power electronics industry to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in mechanical engineering, proficient in SolidWorks, and possess knowledge of airflow dynamics. The role involves designing and developing mechanical solutions for power electronic systems, ensuring optimal performance and reliability. If you are passionate about pushing the boundaries of innovation in power electronics and have a knack for 2D and 3D design, we want to hear from you. Responsibilities: Utilize SolidWorks to design mechanical components, enclosures, and thermal management systems for power electronic products. Conduct airflow analysis and thermal simulations to optimize the cooling efficiency and thermal performance of electronic assemblies. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop innovative solutions that meet performance, cost, and reliability requirements. Generate detailed 2D drawings and 3D models for manufacturing and assembly. Perform structural analysis and mechanical testing to validate designs and ensure compliance with industry standards. Work closely with electrical engineers to integrate mechanical and electrical components seamlessly. Conduct design reviews and provide feedback to optimize designs for manufacturability and assembly. Stay updated on the latest advancements in power electronics, thermal management techniques, and CAD software tools. Support the prototyping process and iterate designs based on test results and feedback. Assist in the development of documentation, including bill of materials (BOM) and manufacturing instructions. Qualifications and Education Requirements B.Tech or Diploma in Mechanical Engineering. 2-3 years of Proven experience in mechanical design, preferably in the power electronics industry.  Proficiency in SolidWorks and other CAD software.

Introduction to the company: Approaching 4 decades in the electronic industry, we Electronics Devices Worldwide Pvt. Ltd. are a reliable manufacturer and exporter of induction heating machine / induction heating equipment / heat induction machine and many other allied products. The machine has rugged construction and an energy efficient design. The induction heating machine is ideal for high-volume scan hardening of different parts in the cylindrical shape. It has high speed index capability and a programmable logic controller (PLC), which ascertains continuous working for machine for many hours. On demands of clients, we can provide the with the specifications of maximum weight and maximum part length of our induction heating equipment. column2: TITLE:  CAD Trainee DEPARTMENT:  CAD Manufacturing INDUSTRY:  Medical Devices REPORTS TO:  CAD Engineer II EXPERIENCE:  None EDUCTION:  Diploma in Mechanical Engineering ROLE:  Full Time LOCATION:  Hyderabad PACKAGE:  2,65,000 per annum     About Conformis: Conformis is a US based medical device company. As one of the most innovative companies in orthopedics we partner with surgeons to deliver individualized solutions to eliminate joint pain. Our ultimate goal at Conformis is to redefine the standard of care in orthopedics, but our ability to do that is only as strong as the people within. This not only applies to the technical skills required for your position, but your entrepreneurial spirit and commitment to our core values of respect for one another, collaborative teamwork, and ethical citizenship.   Job Summary: The CAD Trainee will be responsible for designing and reviewing patient-specific implants and surgical instruments using various software packages while ensuring Conformis quality standards.   Essential Duties and Responsibilities: Develop and maintain strong internal working relationships across Conformis. Understand the objectives, responsibilities, and mission of the CAD department and works towards those goals. Prioritize and plan work activities; adapt for changing conditions. Generate 3D models from diagnostic CT images and use commercial and research software to design patient specific implants and surgical instruments. Work independently to achieve departmental and personal goals. Plan and manage workload effectively and efficiently.  Works with all departments to facilitate and implement new designs, engineering changes, and software development for CAD processes. Perform tasks under the company FDA and ISO-conforming quality system. Execute paperwork and Conformis Information System functions as necessary for each implant. Acknowledge and participate in research programs, quality assurance, and quality improvement projects carried on in the company. Other responsibilities as assigned.   Qualifications: Exposure towards using 3D CAD modeling software, SolidWorks is preferred. A Diploma in an Engineering field or equivalent education.   Skills, Abilities, Competencies Required: Willingness to work flexible hours & work from home as needed. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Willingness to travel abroad if needed Able to work accurately in a fast-paced, hectic, ever-changing environment with strong attention to detail. Demonstrated ability to monitor own work to ensure quality, accuracy, and thoroughness. Strong organizational, analytical, and time-management skills. Able to self-motivate and work both independently and as part of a team. Be able to follow detailed procedures and ensure accuracy and quality in documentation and data. Must demonstrate flexibility and willingness to adapt to diverse roles as a member of the corporate team. Must be aware of hazards within the company; adhere to safety standards established by FDA and other regulatory agencies. Able to work in changing environments (reduced lighting, increased noise, temperature variances, unpleasant odors, etc.). Willingness to learn needed skills on the job in order to enhance performance. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite.   Conformis India is an Equal Opportunity Employer

column2: Job Description       ?Ensure quality and accuracy of designs. Offer suggestions to assist in the efficiency of works. Produce Hand sketches & Carry out and check design calculations. Ensure compliance with project Design Criteria/Client Brief/Approved Concept. Check documentation complies with design. Attend design, clients, architects and site meetings. Ensure compliance with program constraints and budget; and maintain Quality Procedure Manual. Other duties and responsibilities as reasonably required by the Team Leader/Division Manager.      Job Responsibility: As a result of the continuing growth of our Design and Engineering business, our Civil and Structural Engineering team in Bangalore, Chennai and Mumbai are seeking to recruit an experienced Principal Structural Engineer. This new appointment is part of our aspiration to develop and grow our structural team in India. This role will allow the right candidate to play a leading role in some of the most challenging and exciting engineering projects in the world. The successful candidate will have a proven track record in the management and production of engineering / technical deliverables on a range of multi-disciplinary projects of varying scales and levels of complexity. You will be responsible for overall Civil and Structural Engineering technical delivery within the Bangalore, Chennai and Mumbai Offices, providing all necessary technical direction, resourcing, mentoring and assurance of structural engineering within Bangalore, Chennai and Mumbai offices.     ?Credibility, competence, agility and technical excellence are a given as the role requires close working with our internal and external clients, decision makers, industry stakeholders and other consultants to develop robust design solutions through collaborative and proactive management of client demands - providing leadership from both a technical delivery and people management perspective is imperative. You will be a Structural Engineer with a proven track record of successful technical and commercial delivery of design projects from feasibility through to completion of construction/handover.      You will be required to demonstrate a developed understanding of the market and industry and ability to focus our business to take full advantage of market conditions and have experience in assisting with the preparation of bids and tendering opportunities, where required. Our offices provides multi-disciplinary design and engineering services and integrated solutions across a wide range of sectors.     ?This appointment offers a challenging and rewarding opportunity to apply knowledge, experience and problem solving skills to assist with leading and developing our business, from a technical perspective. Desired Profile: --Candidate must possess at least a Bachelors Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Masters Degree, Engineering (Civil) or equivalent. --At least 5 years of working experience in the related field is required for this position. --Preferably Senior Executives specializing in Engineering - Civil/Construction/Structural or equivalent.

column2: Work Timings:    Rotational           Working Days:    5, Some or all Saturdays may be working as per business requirement           Compensation:    As per market standards       Broad Function:         We are seeking an experienced Mechanical Design Engineer with a specialization in metal and hardware designing, and proficiency in Solidworks     The ideal candidate will play a crucial role in designing and developing metal components for our Smartbox locker systems, ensuring both functionality and aesthetic appeal           Roles and Responsibilities:       Metal Component Design:     1- Design and develop metal components and hardware for Smartbox lockers using Solidworks.   2- Optimize designs for manufacturability, durability, and cost-effectiveness.       Prototyping and Testing:     1- Create prototypes of designed components and conduct tests for functionality, strength, and durability.   2- Collaborate with the manufacturing team to ensure smooth transition from design to production.       Material Selection and Analysis:     1- Select appropriate metal materials considering factors like strength, weight, and corrosion resistance.   2- Perform stress analysis and other computational simulations to validate designs.       Design Documentation:     1- Maintain comprehensive design documentation, including detailed drawings and specifications.    2- Ensure all designs comply with industry standards and safety regulations.       Collaborative Development:     1- Work closely with cross-functional teams, including software engineers and product managers, to integrate hardware design with overall product functionality.   2- Provide technical input during product development meetings and design reviews.     Qualification       bachelors degree or Diploma in Mechanical Engineering or a related field.         Minimum 3 years of experience in mechanical design, specifically with metal materials.         Proficiency in Solidworks.         Strong understanding of manufacturing processes related to metal, including machining, welding, and forming.         Knowledge of material properties and design for manufacturability.         Personal Attributes:         Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.         Strong communication and teamwork abilities.         Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.         Employee Benefits:          Cashless medical insurance for employees, spouses, and children         Accidental insurance coverage         Life insurance coverage         Company-paid lunch         Company-paid transportation         Access to online learning platforms such as Udemy and LinkedIn Learning.         Retirement benefits including Provident Fund (PF) and Gratuity         Sodexo benefits for income tax savings         Paternity & Maternity Leave Benefit         National Pension Saving       Why Join Smartboxlocker:       Rapid Growth:    Join a bootstrapped, rapidly growing SaaS company where you can make a significant impact and shape your career trajectory.       Learning Opportunities:    Experience unparalleled learning opportunities that go beyond the traditional corporate mold, acquiring skills and knowledge that will benefit you in the long term.       Straightforward Culture:   Be part of a straightforward, no-nonsense culture that values transparency, authenticity, and open communication       Innovation and Collaboration:   We believe great ideas can come from anyone, regardless of their role or level in the company. We actively encourage innovation and collaboration among our team members.       Fast-Paced Environment:    Thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment where we move quickly, adapt swiftly to market changes, and embrace the challenges and rewards of a startup lifestyle.       Competitive Compensation:    Enjoy a competitive salary package along with a range of benefits designed to support your lifestyle and help you perform at your best, both in and out of work.       High-Growth, Innovative Environment:   If you're a driven individual who thrives in a high-growth, innovative environment, were excited to hear from you. Join us for a unique opportunity to accelerate your career and be part of our exciting journey

To manage team of Engineers and provide them technical guidance. To perform engineering analysis and prepare calculations complying with Project Design Criteria, codes of practises and company standards. To supervise drafters in the production of engineering drawings in order to develop practical and economic designs. To participate in the preparation of all project design deliverables including layout drawings, detail drawings, schedules, specifications, data sheets, calculations requisitions, and technical tender evaluations, in accordance with the project requirements and the company procedures and standards. To ensure technical integrity of design deliverables. Attend meetings as and when required and prepare minutes of meeting. Resolve technical problems at site by liaising with PE directly. QUALIFICATIONS Graduate or post graduate degree in Civil & Structural Engineering from a reputed university. Degree recognised by Board will be an advantage.  5 to 8 years of experience with proven track record of successful delivery in infrastructural, building or industrial projects preferably in Singapore  Conversant with Eurocode design. Knowledge of BIM modelling will be an advantage.  Good interpersonal and communication skills. Good written and communication skills. Capable of working in multi-cultural environment.

Collaborate with architects, engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure software meets project requirements. Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to Staad Pro software. Stay updated on industry trends and advancements in structural engineering software. Requirements: 1-3 years of experience working with Staad Pro software. Proficiency in structural analysis and design principles. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. column2: 1. Job Title: Plant Design Engineer (Solar) 2. Job Summary: The Plant Design Engineer for solar is responsible for designing, planning, and overseeing the implementation of solar power plants. This includes developing detailed engineering plans, coordinating with various stakeholders, and ensuring that the solar power systems meet performance and safety standards. 3. Key Responsibilities: a. System Design: Design and optimize solar power systems, considering factors such as efficiency, cost-effectiveness, and environmental impact. Prepare detailed engineering drawings and specifications for solar power plants. b. Project Planning: Collaborate with project managers to develop project plans, timelines, and budgets for solar power projects. Conduct feasibility studies and site assessments to determine the viability of solar installations. c. Regulatory Compliance: Ensure that solar power projects comply with local, state, and federal regulations and codes. Obtain necessary permits and approvals for solar installations. d. Technology Selection: Evaluate and select appropriate solar technologies and components, including solar panels, inverters, and tracking systems. Stay abreast of technological advancements in the solar energy field. e. Coordination: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including electrical engineers, civil engineers, and environmental specialists. Work closely with contractors, suppliers, and consultants to ensure project success. f. Quality Assurance: Implement quality control measures to ensure the reliability and performance of solar power systems. Conduct testing and analysis to identify and address any issues. g. Documentation: Maintain accurate and comprehensive project documentation, including design specifications, drawings, and reports. Prepare and present progress reports to stakeholders. h. Safety and Sustainability: Incorporate safety and sustainability considerations into the design and implementation of solar power plants. Identify and implement best practices for environmental stewardship. 4. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical, Electrical, or Renewable Energy Engineering. Professional Engineer (PE) license is often preferred. Experience in solar energy projects and plant design. Proficiency in relevant design and analysis software.

column1: Lead Piping Design Engineer or Head of department
column2: Looking for  Lead Piping Design Engineer or Head of department - Oil and Gas   for one of our client Location : Hyderabad   Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Piping Design Engineer with extensive experience in engineering design and 3D modeling, within the oil and gas industry. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in piping design, with specialized knowledge in ADNOC projects, wellheads, and degassing facility engineering and expertise in 3D modeling software such as Intergraph Smart 3D (formerly known as PDS) and Aveva E3D (formerly known as PDMS).. Key Responsibilities: Piping Design and Layout: Lead the development of piping design concepts, layouts, and detailed engineering drawings for oil and gas projects, with a focus on ADNOC specifications and standards.. Engineering Design: Collaborate with project teams to develop piping specifications, material selection, and equipment sizing in accordance with project requirements, industry codes, and regulatory standards. Ensure compliance with ADNOC guidelines and procedures throughout the engineering design process. 3D Modeling and Simulation: The engineer  shall be capable to large group of Designers and 3D modelers in a multidisciplinary project. The engineer shall be experience in managing client and conducting 3D model workshops Hands on experience in industry software, such as 3D Model Review Tools (SPR & NavisWorks), Caesar II, Autopipe, Orthogen, Shell MESC Standards, AutoCAD, Microstation and 3D Modeling Tools (PDS, SP3D, CadWorx, Autoplant), MS Office Suite, etc Technical Support: Provide technical support and guidance to junior engineers, drafters, and designers in the preparation of piping drawings and documentation. Review and approve engineering deliverables to ensure accuracy, quality, and adherence to project specifications. Project Coordination: Coordinate with multidisciplinary engineering teams, including process engineers, mechanical engineers, and structural engineers, to integrate piping design requirements with overall project objectives. Participate in design reviews, HAZOP studies, and constructability reviews as required. ADNOC Compliance: Maintain a thorough understanding of ADNOC standards, specifications, and procedures related to piping design and engineering. Ensure that project deliverables meet ADNOC requirements and facilitate necessary approvals and reviews with ADNOC authorities. Wellheads and Degassing Facility Expertise: Apply specialized knowledge and experience in the design and layout of wellhead facilities and degassing units. Develop piping arrangements, equipment layouts, and piping support structures tailored to the specific requirements of these facilities. Qualifications and Experience: Bachelors degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Minimum of 15 years of experience in piping design and engineering within the oil and gas industry, with a focus on ADNOC projects. Proficiency in engineering design software such as AutoCAD, PDMS, PDS (Plant Design System), or equivalent. Strong knowledge of piping codes and standards such as ASME B31.3, API, and ADNOC specifications. Experience in 3D modeling, clash detection, and simulation software. Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills. Familiarity with project management principles and practices.

column2: We are looking for a Hydrology Hydraulics Engineer with experience on Hydropower and Pumped-hydro projects with a focus on hydrological and hydraulic studies in realization of projects ranging from feasibility studies to construction.       How will you contribute to the team         To perform this role successfully, the candidate will be responsible to carry out work in a team and/or supervise various types of studies in the fields of hydrology and hydraulics, such as:     Hydrological studies and modelling to determine statistical floods and probable maximum floods, flood routing studies, evaluation of flood zones.     Dam safety studies and dam failure analysis.     Design of hydraulic structures such as spillways, weirs, stilling basins, water intakes, penstocks, channels, temporary diversions, tunnels, fish passes, culverts etc     Hydrodynamic analyses with 1D, 2D and 3D simulation tools.     Remote sensing and GIS applications.     Power generation and energy studies.     Optimization of water conveyance systems.     Transient analysis.     Wave studies, erosion protection and stabilization.     Sedimentation studies.     Prepare design basis memoranda, technical memoranda, and design reports.     Participate in risk analysis workshops including dam-safety related risks.     Provide presentations to clients and internal audiences including technical teams and management committees.         What are we looking for         The candidate must possess a bachelor s degree in civil engineering or equivalent and master s degree in hydrology/ hydraulics/ water resources.     12-15 years of experience in the hydroelectric industry.     Knowledge of analytical methods and tools in the field of hydrology and hydraulics.     Knowledge of HEC models such as HEC-RAS 1D and 2D, HEC-HMS, HEC-RESSIM.     Knowledge of one or more 2D and 3D modelling software such as FLOW-3D, Telemac, SOBEK, Delft 3D.     Knowledge of software for hydraulic transient studies such as SIMSEN, WHAMO.     Experience in dam safety studies will be an asset.     Fluency in English (spoken and written; French is an asset).     Ability to work effectively in a multi-disciplinary team environment.     Excellent technical writing skills.         We are looking for a Hydrology Hydraulics Engineer with experience on Hydropower and Pumped-hydro projects with a focus on hydrological and hydraulic studies in realization of projects ranging from feasibility studies to construction. Dam safety studies and dam failure analysis. column1: Stantec is hiring For Senior Transportation Engineer/Highway
column2: Your Opportunity As a Senior Transportation Engineer, you will leverage your experience with Texas highway and roadway projects to assist in our growing Texas practice and manage the design and delivery of various projects from conceptual planning, through design, construction, and completion. You will perform a variety of tasks with potentially complex features that will require the application of mature knowledge, sound principles and best practices. The role of a Senior Transportation Engineer is to work independently on smaller projects, and as a team member of a larger project. You will lead the design of assigned projects to ensure reliability, resource efficiency and cost-effectiveness. You may provide supervision and guidance to a group of employees, assigning tasks, checking work at frequent intervals for accuracy and completeness; and maintaining budgets and schedules. You may support proposal efforts to expand our project base in the Texas market.  Your Key Responsibilities Lead the development of project plans and drawings for various projects including urban and rural roadways, highways, rail, transit, trails, and intersections. Prepare complex engineering designs and plans for urban and rural roadways and highways. Develop budgets and monitor work of assigned team to ensure budgets and schedules are met. Coordinate with Project Managers, project team and clients. Responsible for design, review and sealing of assigned projects. Supervise the work of engineers and CAD assigned. Lead and develop junior staff. Qualifications Your Capabilities and Credentials Thorough understanding of codes, legal and design requirements in relevant jurisdictions Ability to solve complex problems using sound professional judgement, creativity, and innovation. Proficient in MicroStation and -OpenRoads 3D modeling tools, and other relevant design software. Strong knowledge of the Department of Transportation's legal requirements, design/planning procedures, and PSE plan production in relevant jurisdictions. Ability to participate and collaborate in project team setting, engage in creative and critical though, and effectively communicate ideas, design issues and solutions to others. Ability to check the work of others for accuracy and completeness and manage time to meet project budget and schedule. Effective communicator with excellent verbal and written communication skills. Proficient in Microsoft (MS) Office Suite. Education and Experience Bachelors degree or foreign equivalent in Transportation Engineering, Civil Engineering, or a related field Minimum of 10 years highway/roadway design experience - TxDOT Precertification is desirable.

column2: As a part of Blades team in Bangalore location you will execute projects in collaboration with our Blade teams in Denmark, USA, Spain and other locations     The Blade Structural Design Department is responsible for the design of new blades for Offshore and Onshore market, tools development, blade handling, certification, validation, industrialization and handling of warranty cases     We are looking for people who are compliant, systematic, self-initiative, team player and consistent with excellent communication skills and the ability to communicate in all verticals with multicultural international stakeholders             What are my responsibilities           As an Individual contributor, working from office, you will be part of structural design and development of wind turbine rotor blade structures. Perform the composite blade structural analysis using ANSYS CLASSIC and analytical methods / MATLAB scripting.          Drive the blade handling analysis strategy. Build capability and capacity in blade handling analysis area.         As a Blade Component Owner, responsible for structural changes of blades in production, resolving non-conformities, develop and implement cost-out and quality improvement measures in serial production to improve product competitiveness.               What you need to make a difference           Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change.         You must have Postgraduate in Mechanical / Aerospace Structures / Civil Structures / Relevant engineering from Premier Institutes         You must have minimum 5-10 years of relevant experience in the area of composites structural analysis and design.         You should have good knowledge of MATLAB, willing to get expertise in MATLAB to contribute on automation activities.         Good understanding on handling analysis of large, layered composite structures / sandwich panel structures like blade.         Good hold on contact analysis in ANSYS CLASSIC and high-fidelity FE modeling analysis.         Based on observations from structural analysis you should have ability to propose an optimal composite lay-up design to meet structural requirements.         Good understanding of DFMEA, risk assessments and 8D/RCA process. Should be able to take component ownership.         Knowledge of wind turbine blade design, materials, structural analysis, review process, guidelines, manufacturing, testing, inspection, repair and transport methods.         Should be outgoing, determined, good team player, inclusive with global team members and persistent with strong communication and collaboration skills. Drive technical solutions, review with internal team and solution providers working across the globe. Should be ready to travel to meet the business requirements.         Working experience of wind turbine blade design, materials, structural analysis, review process, guidelines, manufacturing, full blade testing process, inspection, repair and transport methods         Wind blade manufacturing process and related operations like glass Lay-up, drilling, painting, handling, repair and inspection etc         Knowledge of reading 3D/2D drawings, PLM process, knowledge on modelling software s like NX / AutoCAD         Knowledge on interaction between aero, loads and structural design.               In return of your commitment we offer you            Become a part of our mission for sustainability: Clean energy for generations to come         A global team of diverse colleagues who share passion for renewable energy         Trust and empowerment to make your own ideas reality         Personal and professional development to grow internally within our organisation         Competitive Pension Scheme

column2: Structural Analysis: Conducting thorough analysis of structures, using software and manual calculations, to ensure their stability and strength under various conditions such as wind loads, earthquakes, and other environmental factors      Design: Designing safe and sustainable structures, ensuring they meet all relevant codes and regulations      This includes creating detailed drawings, specifications, and calculations for construction      Material Selection: Selecting appropriate materials for construction and supervising their testing to guarantee quality and reliability      Project Management: Managing projects from conception through to completion, including organizing and overseeing construction works, resolving design and development problems, and ensuring projects are completed within budget and on time      Site Inspections: Conducting regular site visits to ensure that construction is proceeding as planned, and structures are being built according to the design specifications and safety standards      Collaboration: Collaborating with architects, other engineers, and construction teams to ensure the integration of the structural design with other aspects of the project      Documentation: Creating and maintaining comprehensive project documentation, including drawings, calculations, and reports      Client Interaction: Communicating technical information to clients and stakeholders in a clear and understandable manner, addressing their concerns and ensuring client satisfaction      Research: Keeping up-to-date with the latest developments in the field, new materials, and construction techniques, and integrating this knowledge into designs and projects      Qualifications:Bachelors degree in Civil or Structural Engineering (Masters degree is often preferred)      Professional Engineer (PE) license is required in most jurisdictions      Several years of experience in structural engineering, preferably in a consulting or design firm      Proficiency in structural analysis software and computer-aided design (CAD) software      Strong knowledge of engineering principles, codes, and standards      Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail      Strong communication and interpersonal skills      Ability to work both independently and in a team      Project management skills are often beneficial

Job Responsibility: As a result of the continuing growth of our Design and Engineering business, our Civil and Structural Engineering team in Bangalore, Chennai and Mumbai are seeking to recruit an experienced Principal Structural Engineer. This new appointment is part of our aspiration to develop and grow our structural team in India. This role will allow the right candidate to play a leading role in some of the most challenging and exciting engineering projects in the world. The successful candidate will have a proven track record in the management and production of engineering / technical deliverables on a range of multi-disciplinary projects of varying scales and levels of complexity. You will be responsible for overall Civil and Structural Engineering technical delivery within the Bangalore, Chennai and Mumbai Offices, providing all necessary technical direction, resourcing, mentoring and assurance of structural engineering within Bangalore, Chennai and Mumbai offices.     ?Credibility, competence, agility and technical excellence are a given as the role requires close working with our internal and external clients, decision makers, industry stakeholders and other consultants to develop robust design solutions through collaborative and proactive management of client demands - providing leadership from both a technical delivery and people management perspective is imperative. You will be a Structural Engineer with a proven track record of successful technical and commercial delivery of design projects from feasibility through to completion of construction/handover.      You will be required to demonstrate a developed understanding of the market and industry and ability to focus our business to take full advantage of market conditions and have experience in assisting with the preparation of bids and tendering opportunities, where required. Our offices provides multi-disciplinary design and engineering services and integrated solutions across a wide range of sectors.     ?This appointment offers a challenging and rewarding opportunity to apply knowledge, experience and problem solving skills to assist with leading and developing our business, from a technical perspective. Desired Profile: --Candidate must possess at least a Bachelors Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Masters Degree, Engineering (Civil) or equivalent. --At least 5 years of working experience in the related field is required for this position. --Preferably Senior Executives specializing in Engineering - Civil/Construction/Structural or equivalent.

column2: Job Title: Design Engineer-Water Supply Experience Level: 4+ years Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering or similar (Master's degree in Environmental Engineering preferred) Key Responsibilities: Develop conceptual, schematic, detailed, and final designs for water transmission mains and distribution systems, catering to potable or non-potable water supply. column2: As a Technical Designer, you will play a crucial role in translating design concepts  into detailed technical drawings and specifications. Your primary responsibility is  to prepare & ensure the accuracy and quality of technical output, including 2D  drawings, detailing, cutlist and material specifications. Key Responsibilities: 2D Drawings and Detailing: -Create detailed 2D drawings, including plans, elevations, and sections, using AutoCAD as per client requirements and designers specifications. -Ensure comprehensive detailing and annotation to accurately represent project requirements. -Prepare detailed drawings and specifications for internal components of kitchen, wardrobes, and storage units, adhering to design standards and  client preferences. Site Validation and Incorporation of Changes: -Participate in site validation processes alongside the design and project management teams to identify discrepancies. -Incorporate changes and rectify errors identified during site validation into the design documentation promptly. Cutlist and Bill of Materials (BOM) Preparation: -Generate comprehensive cutlists detailing the type and size of materials required for each project component. -Ensure accuracy in reflecting project specifications and requirements in the cutlists and BOMs. Material Optimization:Analyze drawings and specifications to optimize material usage and minimize waste, contributing to cost-effective project execution. Quality Control: Adhere to quality standards for all technical outputs, ensuring precision and accuracy in drawings and specifications. Requirements: AutoCAD Proficiency: Strong proficiency in AutoCAD is essential for this role. Education: Diploma/Degree in Architecture, Civil Engineering, or Interior Design. Experience: 4 to 6 years of experience in a similar role, preferably with a focus on residential interiors and furniture manufacturing. Technical Expertise: Previous experience in preparing Reflected Ceiling Plan layouts, false ceiling detailing, custom furniture drawings, electrical, lighting, and plumbing layouts. Software Proficiency: Proficiency in AutoCAD, SketchUp, cutlist and BOM tools, and Microsoft Office Suite. Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail with the ability to work collaboratively as part of a team. Knowledge and Experience: Familiarity with cutlist and BOM preparation processes, as well as an understanding of material selection and  optimization techniques. Stay updated with the latest hardware solutions and production techniques relevant to interior design projects.
column11: 2D drawing, Design engineering, Cutlist, Design Associate, SketchUp, QC, AutoCAD, Bill of Materials, Site validation

column2: This position is responsible for providing engineering consultation to the Product Engineering Groups in the area of engineering specialization i.e. FEA.       KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:     1. Construct and solve advanced, high-quality FEA models of compressor components and assemblies; through this analysis provides recommendations to Product Engineering on the adequacy of the design for given application and how to improve or reduce part costs.    2. Use closed form hand calculation methods to verify analysis techniques.   3. Support development of standard analysis procedures for all analyses performed in Applied Mechanics.   a. Support development of best practices and procedures for simulating mechanical compressor components and assemblies.    4. Use analysis results to develop/estimate fatigue calculations including probability of failure or cumulative damage estimates.    5. Be current with software used by:   a. Attending update conferences   b. Have resource base for material information related to properties and failure criterions.   c. Receiving advanced training as necessary.   6. Evaluate new capabilities in FEA software for possible use in Applied Mechanics projects.   7. Involvement in the development and review of project proposals and reports for technical content.   8. Write reports summarizing the analysis and recommendation using standard report formats which are in English for global consumption       REQUIRED EDUCATION   :   Masters Degree in Mechanical, Aerospace, Civil Engineering or closely related field required plus a minimum of three years related experience.       PREFERRED EDUCATION:     PhD in Mechanical Engineering plus a minimum one years of related experience.       REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS:     1+ years mechanical product design or testing experience.   3+ years of relevant mechanical simulation experience (Example Ansys, Adina, NX CAE, FE-safe, GT-Suite etc).    Understands underlying mechanical, physical and numerical principals (structural, fluid, thermal, fatigue, fracture, dynamics, shock, implicit, explicit, linear and non-linear).      Have strong skills in FEA grid generation and meshing techniques (Workbench Meshing, Mechanical APDL, NX meshing, Hypermesh) for components and assemblies.    Must know best practices and procedures for using simulation contact elements advance uses.    Good skills in any one CAD software.   Good skills in using high performance computing for any one CAE software.   Good skill in any one of the programming languages used in automating CAE related tasks.   Have Strong interpersonal skills and be fluent in written and verbal English language.
column11: HyperMesh, Product engineering, Simulation, Aerospace, CAD, Ansys, Mechanical, thermal, Product design, Civil engineering

column2: As a Senior Design Engineer, you are responsible for leading and overseeing the design process for various engineering projects     Your role involves taking a holistic approach to designing solutions, considering technical feasibility, functionality, performance, and cost-effectiveness     You may work in various industries, such as mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, civil engineering, or product design         Here are some key skills and responsibilities of a Senior Design Engineer:         Design expertise: You have extensive knowledge and expertise in your specific field of engineering, such as mechanical, electrical, or civil engineering     You are proficient in using design software and tools relevant to your field, such as CAD (Computer-Aided Design) software     Project management: As a senior engineer, you may be responsible for managing and overseeing multiple design projects simultaneously     This includes creating project plans, setting timelines, allocating resources, and ensuring that projects meet quality standards and deadlines     Technical leadership: You provide technical guidance and leadership to a team of design engineers     You mentor and support junior engineers, review their work, and provide feedback to improve their design skills     Problem-solving and innovation: You are skilled at analyzing complex engineering problems, identifying innovative solutions, and optimizing designs for efficiency, performance, and reliability     You leverage your experience and expertise to overcome technical challenges
column11: Quality standards, Software design, Project management, CAD, Mechanical, Technical leadership, Product design, Mechanical engineering, Civil engineering, Electricals

column2: Job Description: Design Excellence (India) Private Limited, known as DXL, is an engineering consultancy organisation in the field of Civil and Structural engineering, predominantly for large Industrial Projects. DXL is presently seeking a Civil and Structural Engineering Manager to serve both public and private clients on International Projects.  The Structural Engineering Manager will manage Civil and Structural detailed engineering, project planning of structural systems for industrial, infrastructural, and commercial projects.  Role & responsibilities    1. Support structural design of projects from the conceptual phase through design completion as per project needs and requirements set forth by the client. 2. Perform engineering analysis, design, and prepare structural specifications, design details, and calculations for steel, concrete, masonry, and other type of structures. 3. Review structural vendor drawings and interface with suppliers, clients, engineering disciplines, detailers, and designers. 4. Participate in development of project schedule, scope, budget, staffing planning and construction planning. Responsible for effective management of changes. 5. Apply expert knowledge of commonly used structural concepts, practices, codes, and procedures within the structural engineering services industry. 6. Ensure the quality of deliverables and verify corrections to be made. 7. Work with field personnel to resolve design problems, support field inspections and test structural systems. 8. Provide leadership, guidance, and instruction to the Civil /Structural engineering practice. Mentor and guide less experienced engineers. Preferred candidate profile   1. Master's degree in Civil / Structural Engineering from an accredited institution preferred. 2. 10+ years structural engineering experience designing structural systems for industrial structures in sectors such as oil & gas, power plants, petrochemicals, fertilizers, distilleries, desalination plants and elements such as mounded bullets, silos, pipe racks, stacks, dynamic equipment foundations, as well as commercial structures like Airports, Hotels etc. 3. Expert knowledge in standard engineering techniques and procedures. Strong knowledge of structural design codes, both Indian and International codes. 4. Structural analysis and design software skills including proficiency with analysis and design structural finite element software such as STAAD-Connect, ETABS, SAP2000, Mat-3D, Idea-Statica, SAFE, ANSYS etc. Should be conversant with Dynamic analysis of foundations of vibratory machines. 5. column2: A Water Resources & Public Health Engineer is responsible for designing, implementing, and managing water supply and sanitation projects to ensure access to clean and safe drinking water and proper sanitation facilities     This role involves assessing water resources, developing infrastructure, and ensuring compliance with public health standards     The engineer will collaborate with multidisciplinary teams, government agencies, and communities to improve public health outcomes related to water and sanitation     Key Responsibilities:Water Resources Assessment:Conduct surveys and assessments to evaluate available water resources     Analyze data to determine water quality, quantity, and sustainability     Identify potential sources of water pollution and propose mitigation measures     Infrastructure Design and Implementation:Design water supply and sanitation systems, considering population needs and growth projections     Prepare detailed engineering plans, specifications, and cost estimates     Supervise construction projects, ensuring compliance with design standards and regulations     Water Treatment and Distribution:Design and oversee water treatment processes to ensure the provision of clean and safe drinking water     Develop distribution networks, including pipelines, pumps, and reservoirs, to supply water to communities     Sanitation and Waste Management:Design and implement sanitation facilities, including sewage systems and wastewater treatment plants     Promote proper waste management practices to prevent environmental contamination     Compliance and Regulation:Stay updated on relevant regulations, codes, and standards related to water resources and public health engineering     Ensure projects comply with local, regional, and national regulations     Community Engagement and Education:Collaborate with communities to raise awareness about waterborne diseases, hygiene, and sanitation practices     Conduct public education programs to promote water conservation and proper sanitation habits     Data Analysis and Reporting:Collect and analyze data related to water quality, usage, and infrastructure performance     Prepare reports and presentations summarizing project progress, challenges, and outcomes     Emergency Response and Disaster Management:Develop contingency plans for water supply during emergencies and natural disasters     Coordinate with relevant authorities to provide immediate assistance in crisis situations     Qualifications:Bachelors or Masters degree in Civil Engineering, Environmental Engineering, or related field     Professional engineering license (PE) is preferred     Strong knowledge of water resources management, hydrology, and environmental engineering principles     Proficiency in relevant engineering software for design and simulation     Excellent project management and communication skills     Ability to work effectively in interdisciplinary teams and liaise with stakeholders     Experience:Several years of experience in water resources engineering or related field     Experience in managing water supply and sanitation projects from conception to completion     Familiarity with public health engineering practices and standards
