Only apply if you are seriously looking for job change to enhance your career.  Position Overview This role is to be offered at either Junior Engineer or Mid-Senior Engineer level depending on the qualifications and experience of the successful candidate. You will be working with other team members and managers and responsible for Engineering and Design services during the proposal, engineering and construction stages of projects with strict adherence to the project contract for medium-voltage and high-voltage substation projects, both Air Insulated Switchgear (AIS) and Gas Insulated Switchgear (GIS) Substation, Rail, Infrastructure, Data Centre, Battery Energy Storage System and Wind Offshore & Onshore Substation, including but not limited to 11- 400kV range with an emphasis on project safety, cost, quality and reliability.  This position requires the ability to clearly and effectively communicate in order to successfully collaborate, coordinate, and resolve project design related activities and issues. It also requires the ability to independently manage design with minimum supervision. Good conversation and writing skills as well as normal tact and courtesy are required.    Benefits   Statutory bonus Special bonus scheme (performance based) Referral bonus Provident fund Medical insurance (family or spouse) Life insurance Gratuity scheme Allowances (LTA, HRA, Conveyance, Hospitalisation etc.) Meal and travel allowance (working beyond office hours) Paid time-off and sick leave Learning and on the job training  Key Duties and Responsibilities (Protection Design Engineer): Preparation of Protection Logics and Interlock diagram. Review and preparation of Protection Single Line Diagrams, AC & DC schematic, cable schedule, core sheet, wiring diagram, specifications and BoMs for the substation design packages developed by third party or OEM engineering in coordination with other disciplines. Knowledge in Substation protection system and design philosophy e.g., Distance Protection, Differential Protection (High Impedance and Low Impedance), REF Protection and O/C & E/F Protections etc. Calculations Relay Setting, CT & VT Sizing Etc. Auxiliary Power System design like Low Voltage AC Panel & DC Panel requirements Preparation of SCADA signal list. Interface knowledge with Primary Equipment, Bay Controller Units /SCADA/RTU. Knowledge of Mimic diagram, Alarm system, metering system, SAS etc. Ability to produce (IED) protection and control device settings and configuration files  Ability to operate the vendor specific software tools for modern substation automation and protection equipment (e.g., MiCOM Studio, DIGSI, etc.) Knowledge in communication architecture for the substation automation, teleprotection and SCADA system. Responsible for obtaining customer approvals for the designs and drawings. Identifying and clarifying technical ambiguities and conflicts in the documents Notify the Senior Team or the Client Project Manager of any difficulties encountered in the engineering and design that may adversely impact safety, reliability, quality, cost, or schedule of the project deliverables, and provide recommendations for solutions. Prepare, update, and support the project execution engineering activities in the schedule with emphasis on; On-time delivery and Quality of deliverables. Adhere to the company's quality processes and document control procedures to ensure design documents are complete and accurate. Key Duties and Responsibilities (HV Design Engineer): Preparation of Single Line Diagrams Review and preparation of detailed design drawings (Plan, Layout, Electrical Clearance, Earthing, Connectors, etc.) and BoMs for the substation design packages. Knowledge in Substation HV system and design philosophy e.g., bay arrangements and configuration, AIS, GIS, electrical clearances, etc. Engineering design calculations (busbar forces, earthing, plant equipment sizing) Responsible for obtaining customer approvals for the designs and drawings. Identifying and clarifying technical ambiguities and conflicts in the documents Notify the Senior Team or the Client Project Manager of any difficulties encountered in the engineering and design that may adversely impact safety, reliability, quality, cost, or schedule of the project deliverables, and provide recommendations for solutions. Prepare, update, and support the project execution engineering activities in the schedule with emphasis on; On-time delivery and Quality of deliverables. Adhere to the company's quality processes and document control procedures to ensure design documents are complete and accurate. Relationship Management  Maintain productive working relationships with team members, peers and customers, service providers, industry groups and other relevant stakeholders  Carry out the duties of the role in a professional and ethical manner and in accordance with the Companys values and Code of Conduct requirements.  Knowledge and Experience Working with a team of Engineers Good understanding in the application of protection skills, judgement and experience Essential Skills Extensive experience in Auto CAD and proficient in 2-D CAD drafting Extensive experience in MS Office packages e.g., Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc. A high level of competency in written and spoken English Sensitive to agreed delivery programme, quality and budget Other Requirements   Knowledge on the following will be an advantage: Knowledge of IEC 61850 substation network communication standards Experience in Auto CADRaster, Microstation, Elecdes, ELCAD  CDEGS Earthing software Personal Qualities You will be a team player, capable of facilitating increased performance from those around you, a self-starting and self-reliant Engineer with a pedigree of delivering quality design outputs. You must be able to demonstrate commitment, enthusiasm and reliability. You must be meticulous, diligent, time conscious, self-composed and able to work under pressure to meet deadlines. You must be sensitive to the directives of the company at all times. You must be flexible and adopt to quick changes to meet delivery priorities. You must demonstrate the high quality of leadership and lead by example. Other Requirements You must at least have minimum of 3 to 10 years significant design experience in the required field. Woking Hours:  April to October: Monday-Friday | 10am 7pm  November to March: Monday-Friday | 11am 8pm       (During peak periods, flexibility will be required) Salary: Negotiable and depending on experience. Gratuity scheme for continuity of service. Probationary Period: Six months.

column2: Sistema.bio, creating value from waste. At Sistema.bio, we firmly believe that the transition to renewable energy, the reduction of global greenhouse gas emissions, and the adoption of regenerative farming are crucial for ensuring a thriving world for both current and future generations. We manufacture and distribute high-quality, cost-effective biodigesters across  Latin America ,  Asia , and  Africa . Our biodigesters empower farmers to convert waste into renewable energy and organic fertilizer, allowing them to reduce their carbon footprint, increase productivity, and operate more efficiently. By providing access to innovative biodigester technology, Sistema.bio is dedicated to addressing the interconnected challenges of poverty, food security, and climate change.  We are on a mission to reduce 1% of global greenhouse gas emissions   .  You have the opportunity to become an integral part of this impactful story!      Your mission at Sistema.bio: Reporting to the Sr. R&D Manager, your role involves carrying out design calculations by referring to standards/ literature/ engineering principle to determine the design specifications, system failure mode effect analysis for electro-mechanical products and solutions. Youll be in charge of:  Design questionnaire/ requirements gathering document to understand product requirements from different stakeholders.  Finalize scope of projects based on the requirements in consultation with the Design Head.   Prepare System failure mode effect analysis for the products/ solutions.  Conduct research on literature and standards related to different electro-mechanical products and solutions.  Carry out design calculations for the specific product/ solutions based on standards/ literature to meet the requirements finalized in the project scope document.  Finalize Design Specification Sheet for the implementation team to build prototypes/ look for products and solutions in the market. More about YOU:  Education: BE Electrical/Mechanical with 3-6 years of experience or ME Mechanical/Electrical with 2-5 years of experience in relevant field. Key Experiences & Skills:  - 2-5 years in Research/ Technical consulting/ Product development/ design engineering. - Understanding of engineering principle behind development of electro-mechanical products and solutions. - Motivating and doers attitude - Structured thinking with engineering mindset  - Ability to work with a multicultural team- Motivating and doers attitude. - Excellent writing skills in English.  - Ability to work with a multicultural team. What we offer:   Passion and Purpose:  Join a dynamic social impact company, certified B Corp and immerse yourself in an environment where passion, a strong mission and collaborative spirit converge.   Global Team, Local Impact:  Be part of our incredible international team comprising over 360 colleagues across 3 continents. Experience the power of working together toward a common goal that transcends borders.  Balance matters : We understand that your best work comes from a rested and healthy state. Embrace our commitment to work-life balance with a flexible and accommodating work environment designed to suit your needs.  Embrace diversity : Join a vibrant workplace with colleagues representing more than 17 nationalities. At Sistema.bio, inclusivity and diversity are not just values; they are the essence of our culture.  Grow with us:  We foster an autonomous work environment that empowers you to contribute, develop, and take ownership of your projects and work. Join our team of doers in a fast-paced environment where there are plenty of opportunities to grow and learn.   Farmers are at the heart of what we do : Dedicate meaningful time in the field to develop a deep understanding of the needs and challenges faced by the farmers. Get ready to have your boots on the ground, making a tangible impact where it matters most.  Your journey with us is not just a job; it's a chance to make a lasting impact. Other important details:  This is a full-time position based in Chakan, Pune  We would preferably look at Immediate Joiners, or candidates with not more than a months to 45 days notice period to serve. Eager to witness how we passionately solve humanity's most important problems?   Immerse yourself in our Youtube channel featuring customer testimonials, mini documentaries and videos showcasing our impact work.   Dont miss CACA, our award-winning documentary illustrating how our efforts contribute to combating climate change.   Check this page to learn more about our commitment to the Sustainable Development Goals.  Sistema.bio is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of gender, race or color, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression.

column2: This role is responsible for designing of mechanical & electrical solutions for material handling equipment and systems. Your work will directly contribute to the development of efficient and reliable material handling solutions, improving the productivity and safety of various industrial processes.      Your role requires a combination of technical expertise, creativity, and problem-solving skills to design and deliver high-quality mechanical solutions that meet the unique requirement of each project.      Your role will involve working closely with cross-functional teams, including project managers, electrical engineers, and production teams, to ensure the successful execution of projects.      Your expertise in mechanical & electrical engineering and design will be instrumental in creating efficient, safe, and innovative material handling solutions that meet industry standards and customer requirements.            Conceptual Design and Development.            Collaborate with project managers & clients to understand project requirements & objectives. Develop innovative and practical mechanical designs for material handling equipment like cranes, and other related systems.            CAD Modelling and Analysis.            Computer Aided Design (CAD) software to create detailed 2D & 3D models of mechanical components & assemblies. Conduct engineering analysis, simulations, and stress tests to ensure the integrity and performance of the            Material Selection.            Appropriate materials based on design specifications, budget constraints, and project requirements. Collaborate with the procurement team to source high-quality components and materials for the manufacturing process.            Compliance and Standards.            Ensure that all mechanical designs comply with relevant industry standards, codes, and safety regulations.Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements and best practices in the material handling industry.            Collaboration & Communication.            Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate mechanical designs with electrical and control systems.Communicate design concepts and progress effectively to stakeholders, including project managers, team members, and clients            Continuous Improvements.            Identify opportunities for design optimization, cost reduction, productivity and performance enhancement.Implement improvements based on feedback from manufacturing, production, and field teams.          Qualification and Experience.          Bachelor s degree in Mechanical/Electrical Engineering          Proven experience (typically 2-5 years) in mechanical design, preferably in the material handling industry          Proficiency in Computer-Aided Design (CAD) software, such as SolidEdge, AutoCAD, or similar tools.Strong knowledge of mechanical principles, materials, and manufacturing processes.          Strong knowledge of mechanical principles, materials, and manufacturing processes.          Familiarity with industry standards and safety regulations related to material handling equipment          Analytical skills to conduct engineering analysis and simulations          Excellent communication and teamwork abilities to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.          Attention to detail and accuracy in creating technical drawings and documentation.

column2: Leo Circuit Boards Pvt Ltd. is looking for PCB Design and Layout Engineer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Schematic Analysis:Review and analyze schematic diagrams to understand the electrical requirements and constraints      Collaborate with electrical engineers to ensure accurate representation of the circuit on the PCB      PCB Design:Utilize PCB design software (such as Altium, Eagle, KiCad, etc) to create the physical layout of the circuit board      Place components on the board, considering factors like signal integrity, power distribution, and thermal management      Optimize component placement for efficient routing and adherence to design rules      Signal Integrity and Power Distribution:Implement best practices for signal integrity, power distribution, and impedance matching      Conduct simulations and analyses to ensure the reliability and performance of the PCB      Routing:Create and optimize PCB routing to meet electrical and mechanical requirements      Consider EMI/EMC (Electromagnetic Interference/Electromagnetic Compatibility) standards during the routing process      Collaboration:Work closely with electrical engineers, hardware engineers, and other stakeholders to address design challenges and ensure successful PCB integration into the overall system      Documentation:Generate comprehensive design documentation, including assembly drawings, fabrication files, and bill of materials (BOM)      Prototyping and Testing:Collaborate with the prototyping team to build and test PCB prototypes      Identify and resolve issues during the prototyping phase      Manufacturability:Optimize designs for manufacturability, considering cost-effective production processes and materials      Liaise with manufacturers to ensure smooth production and assembly of PCBs      Quality Assurance:Conduct design reviews to ensure compliance with industry standards and project requirements      Address and rectify any issues identified during the review process

column2: Greetings from Ashkom! We are hiring for the role of?  Draftsman  ?for the well known  Automobile Industry , position based at    Malanpur (Gwalior)  ?.   Job Profile  Draftsman Location    Malanpur   Gwalior   (Madhya Pradesh) Experience  4-5 Years Qualification  Diploma Mechanical / Draftsman course   Roles & Responsibility ?? * Creating Technical Drawings :* Use AutoCAD to produce detailed 2D and 3D drawings, plans, schematics, and blueprints based on design specifications and project requirements. * Architectural Drafting :* In architecture, AutoCAD Draftsmen assist in designing and drafting architectural plans for buildings, including floor plans, elevations, and sections. * Engineering Drafting :* In engineering fields, AutoCAD Draftsmen may work on mechanical, electrical, or civil engineering projects, creating technical drawings for components, machinery, electrical systems, or infrastructure. * Conversion of Hand-Drawn Sketches :* Sometimes, AutoCAD Draftsmen are tasked with converting hand-drawn sketches or old paper drawings into digital CAD formats. * CAD Software Proficiency :* Be proficient in using AutoCAD software and its various tools and features to create accurate and detailed drawings. * Detailing and Annotation :* Add dimensions, annotations, and other necessary details to drawings to ensure clarity and compliance with industry standards. * Collaboration :* Work closely with architects, engineers, designers, and other professionals to incorporate their input and changes into the drawings. * Quality Control :* Review and check drawings for accuracy, completeness, and adherence to project standards and guidelines. * File Management :* Organize and maintain a library of CAD files and drawings, making them easily accessible for future reference and revisions. * 3D Modeling :* Depending on the industry, AutoCAD Draftsmen may also create 3D models and renderings of objects or structures. * Stay Updated :* Keep up-to-date with the latest AutoCAD software updates, industry standards, and best practices in CAD drafting. * Problem-Solving :* Solve design and drafting challenges and provide creative solutions when necessary.   Warm Regard's ____ Your Manpower Manager Udit Agnihotri (He/Him) HR- Recruiter Ashkom Media India Private Limited ??shkom House??DK2/6 Danish Kunj, Kolar Road, Bhopal- 462042 +91-9977082289 udit.ashkom@gmail.com

column2: Burns & McDonnell India has exciting opportunity for Instrumentation & Controls (I&C) Designer interested in growing their careers in one of the fast-paced company involved in high tech building design and construction. We are looking for a young and energetic candidate to join our Global Facilities business unit in Mumbai office to support Instrumentation & Control design activities for above listed facilities. Responsible to manage the assigned scope within agreed schedule, budget and complying with agreed project quality norms.   Assist more experienced engineers in preparing, coordinating and reviewing deliverables for the discipline.   Training new staff members on various tools and discipline practices.   Willing to advance in career by taking increased responsibilities on projects and organization.   A committed team player able to work on own initiative.    Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.   Good Communication skills (verbal & written) and ability to self-check and produce accurate work.  - This position requires an individual capable of applying intensive and diversified knowledge of principles and practices to broad areas of assignments. Must be capable of interpreting and developing solutions to complex problems. Qualifications include: ?   Diploma in Instrumentation Engineering or ITI / NCTVT certification in a relevant field.?    5-8 years of related experience.    Experience in Autodesk Revit is preferred.   Knowledge of basic technical theory and engineering principles in Control and Automation.          Knows how to apply engineering principles for basic design analysis within discipline   Knows input requirements to perform various discipline tasks.   Should have good understanding of activities carried by other disciplines and also of inter discipline coordination involved on typical project.   Should have hands on experience in preparing Floor Plans, Control Room Layout, Wiring Diagrams, Loop Drawings, Instrument Location Plans, Panel GAs.   Familiar with P&IDs, Cable Schedule, IO List and Network Architecture.     ?

column2: Role of Solid Works Designer Solid Works designer are skilled professionals with deep subject matter expertise in product development and industrial processes, capable of performing 3D modeling, 2D drawing and 2D detailing. Solid Works architectural designers closely work with architects to create floor plans and 3D blueprints for construction purposes. They can also analyze their floor plans on the basis of safety, appearance and functionality. On the other hand, Solid Works industrial designers work on process optimization and product development for a variety of industrial manufacturing and production processes. 3D designers prefer using Solid Works due to its simple and user-friendly interface and the flexibility it offers for modeling and detailing diagrams. For product design, Solid Works has become the gold standard in the world of engineering and a number of professionals are choosing to provide online freelance services. Quality/Skills A strong knowledge of the extensive capabilities of Solid Works for design, analysis and optimization processes. Knowledge of requirement for design in various industries such as manufacturing, production, construction and interior design. The ability to provide and present detailed and self-explanatory diagrams as per project requirements. Familiarity with surface modeling in Solid Works for performing organic-based designs. Qualifications  A strong educational background in the relevant field of engineering, architecture or interior design. Strong foundational knowledge of the importance and applications of CAD and the use of Solid Works for this purpose. Experience in performing technical drawings for mechanical, electrical, instrumentation and pipe designs. Experience in using Solid Works for simulation of products and processes before taking it to the prototype stage. The ability to understand instructions clearly and work with accuracy to deliver effective designs within the stipulated deadline.

column2: Role & responsibilities     Qualification: Bachelors degree in Electrical & Electronic Engineering, or a related field. Minimum of 5+ years of experience in electronic component qualification or hardware design engineer Strong understanding of electronic components, Analog & Digital ICs, active & passive components, and their applications. Experience with various testing methodologies, including environmental, electrical, mechanical, and reliability testing. Proficiency in data analysis and interpretation. Excellent communication and writing skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Experience with industry standards and regulations Summary: We are seeking a qualified engineer to join our Electrical and Electronic Components Qualification LAB. In this role, you will be responsible for the selection and qualification of electronic components, conducting tests, analyzing results, and making recommendations for component selection and usage. This position plays a crucial role in ensuring the reliability and performance of electronic components used in our company's products. Minimum Experiences: Responsible for electronic component selection and qualification process, based on product requirements, industry standards, and risk assessments. Select and qualify new components for product designs, considering factors such as performance, cost, availability, and reliability. Strong understanding on Analog, Mixed analog/digital ASIC, mixed signal technologies, Fiber Optic, Opto-electronics, Electronic Measurement/Analog signal chain design. Strong understanding on Digital processors, Microcontrollers & I/O system, Digital ASIC, HMI, Safety products, Control techniques, FPGA/CPLD logic (VHDL) design. Strong understanding on Active and Passive components Conduct various tests on components, including environmental, electrical, mechanical, and reliability testing. Collaborate with internal & external LABs, design & R&D teams, procurement specialists, and manufacturing teams to ensure proper component selection and usage. Stay up to date on industry trends, new technologies, and component advancements. Prepare and present technical reports and presentations on component qualification activities. Additional Skills: Knowledge of statistical analysis tools and techniques. Familiarity with test automation tools and methodologies. Experience with project management and risk assessment. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills   If you are Interested Share your Updated Resume to  aarthi@bvrpc.com   Thanks & Regards Aarthi. S

column2: Job Description:   Engineer/Sr Engineer-Software Design Centum Electronics Ltd is a leading ESDM (Electronics System Design & Manufacturing) Indian Multinational Company founded in 1994 that offers, Mission Critical design, development & manufacturing of customized  system/subsystem solutions for high-reliability applications for global customers in Defense, Aerospace, Space, Industrial, Medical, and Transportation domain.  Centum has around 2000 plus employees and has operations across India, Europe and Canada. Centum has been recognized by World Economic Forum as a global growth company and Forbes Asia featured Centum as Asias 200 Best Companies under a Billion.  The Strategic Electronics Business Unit designs, develops and manufactures customized, complex products for Defence and Space customers. Centum is a leading industry partner for Indias DRDO labs, Defence PSUs as well as the Indian Space Research Organization having delivered mission critical electronics on major missile, radar, electronic warfare & satellite applications. Centums unique microelectronics capability enables the development of lightweight, high reliability electronics for on-board applications.  What You'll Do  Development of firmware in C and C++ in embedded systems.  Design and verification of firmware/embedded software on Windows/Linux  platforms.  Development of firmware/software drivers, APIs and algorithms.  Experience with assembly level and C language development including the tools used to edit, compile/assemble and debug code in an embedded environment  Develop the software that manages electronic devices.  Key values, beliefs, and attitudes Good written and verbal communication skills Good planning and organization skills Who You are?  BE/B Tech in Electronics & Communications or ME/M Tech with Solid experience in C/C++ programming for embedded systems  Knowledge of serial interfaces and peripherals (I2S, I2C, SPI, ADCs, DACs). Knowledge of GCC compiler/linker and debugging tools on Windows/Linux platform  Exposure to the Agile process and best-practice methods for developing high quality software.  Good Knowledge of communication protocols TCP/IP, security protocols and UDP.  Should possess relevant experience with embedded firmware development and a demonstrated track record of innovation.
column11: Embedded Software, Embedded C, Microcontroller, UART, SPI

column2: Job title: Senior Battery Design Engineer (Mechanical) Company: Enovix Location: Gachibowli, Hyderabad About the Company: Enovix (Nasdaq: ENVX) is a US $1.9 Billion Li-ion billion battery company based in Fremont, California. With our patented 3D battery architecture and 100% active silicon anodes we have demonstrated 50-100% more energy than conventional cells. Our product has been tested and validated by industry giants in the mobile electronics and EV markets. Were looking to hire professionals to help support our facilities in California, USA and Penang, Malaysia. Come join our dynamic team to revolutionize the battery industry and the devices they power. https://www.enovix.com/ Objective for Current Openings: Engineer with expertise in developing 3D thermal-electro-mechanical models to optimize battery manufacturing processes and drive innovation in product design. Job Description: Develop Finite Element Analysis (FEA) models for electro-mechanical phenomena in batteries. Use models to simulate expansion/ contraction stress simulations on welds, glued parts, assess material integrity, assess structural reliability and safety in battery components and assemblies. Use simulation tools to guide design decisions, troubleshoot failures, and optimize performance. Experience in following software: ABACUS (preferred), COMSOL, ANSYS/ FLUENT. Expertise in making reduced order models for use in applications. Utilize 3D design tools to develop intricate components and assemblies for lithium battery systems. Take complete ownership of product design, from initial concept to production launch and ramp-up. Drive product performance enhancement while minimizing cost and weight. Spearhead the development of novel technologies, supported by early process development. Engage in hands-on prototyping to validate design concepts. Define precise specifications, including dimensions, functionalities, performance, and manufacturability. M??Collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams within the organization, including manufacturing, testing, NPI, and supply chain. Be prepared for occasional travel to support production launch and ramp activities, including supplier visits and on-site support at company facilities. Skills & Qualifications: Minimum 5 years of experience in Finite Element Analysis (FEA) for structural stress-strain simulations and design. Proficiency in Finite Element Analysis (FEA) for structural stress-strain simulations coupled with fluid-solid interaction and electro-thermal effects. Proficiency in one of the following software: ABACUS (preferred), COMSOL, ANSYS/ FLUENT. Proficiency in coding to develop and execute user interfaces for testing and analysis purposes. Demonstrated commitment to taking ownership and thriving in a fast-paced, small team environment. Proven ability to bring product concepts to life, from CAD design to hands-on prototyping. Proficiency in the following is a plus: Pseudo-2D models (PyBaMM), single particle models Python, optimization algorithms, libraries such as Pandas, Scikit learn and visualization libraries. Experience working alongside manufacturing setup suggesting design changes in products using FEA analysis. Ability to define comprehensive test plans, design relevant test setups, and analyze resulting data. Meticulous attention to detail, along with excellent documentation and reporting skills. Proficiency in CAD modeling tools; familiarity with SOLIDWORKS is a plus. Experience: Candidates with at least 5 years of work experience are preferred.
column11: FEA, Simulation, Battery

column2: We are seeking a Trainee PCB Designer to join our team and assist in the design and development of printed circuit boards (PCBs) using software tools such as Protel and Altium      As a Trainee PCB Designer, you will work closely with experienced PCB designers and engineers to learn the fundamentals of PCB design, gain practical experience, and contribute to the creation of high-quality PCB layouts      This is ideal for individuals with a strong interest in electronics and a desire to pursue a career in PCB design      Key Responsibilities:Learn and understand the principles of PCB design, including schematic capture, component placement, routing, and design rules      Collaborate with senior PCB designers and engineers to create and revise PCB layouts, ensuring that they meet project specifications and industry standards      Assist in the generation of schematics, netlists, and bill of materials (BOM) for PCB projects      Gain proficiency in using PCB design software tools, such as Protel and Altium, through training and hands-on experience      Participate in design reviews and provide input to optimize PCB layouts for manufacturability, reliability, and performance      Learn to work with various electronic components, including surface-mount devices (SMDs), through-hole components, and connectors      Assist in conducting design validation tests and troubleshooting PCB prototypes      Follow company procedures and best practices to maintain accurate documentation and version control of PCB designs      Stay updated on industry trends and advancements in PCB design technology and techniques
column11: Trainee PCB Designer, engineer

column2: HELLA,  one of the leading automotive suppliers worldwide,  has shaped the industry with innovative lighting systems and vehicle electronics.  In addition,  the company is one of the most important partners of the aftermarket and independent workshops.  What motivates us: Shaping the mobility of tomorrow and fostering the central market trends such as autonomous driving,  efficiency and electrification,  connectivity and digitization as well as individualization.  Every day,  36, 000 employees worldwide are committed to this with passion,  know-how and innovative strength.       A Developing optical geometries    1 Calculate optical geometries of headlamp / Signal Lamp components for series development and series-related predevelopment,  using common lighting technology and related simulation technology.   2 Evaluate and submit the results to Design and / or other internal and external departments and derive possible design-related measures.   3 Involvement in the new or advanced development of reflector technologies in cooperation with those responsible.   4 Assist with the development and evaluation of software programs for lighting technology related calculations in collaboration with internal and external departments; test and evaluate new programs in consultation with internal departments  5 Advising the concerned departments for the issues with regard to the use of optical components,  as well as the design of free-form areas for headlamps / Signal Lamps.   6 Arranging and / or involvement in the preparation of light samples,  photometric components and prototypes in agreement with the superior and the relevant departments.   7 Assist in the development of new light sources in consultation with the responsible departments and in collaboration with suppliers      B Planning,  measuring,  analysing    1 Accept or put together the headlamp / Signal lamp components required,  including the necessary documents; check the components and prepare them for inspection  2 Set up complex experiment designs,  possibly adapting existing experiment and test facilities  3 Carry out or arrange extensive photometric investigations,  following selection of the suitable methods and processes; record,  check and present the results  4 Carry out studies on temperature behaviour of equipment for the testing and experimenting laboratory  5 Analyse and interpret the results based on the required values.  Possibly identify causes of faults and propose possible solutions in collaboration with departments involved  6 Analyse and qualify optical materials and surfaces using self-developed test methods and procedures      C Other Tasks    1 Supporting Series Production in questions of light measuring technology  2 Monitoring QCD Parameters in accordance with Quality system of the company  3 Updating minutes action plan for completed tasks.   4 Maintaining project time entry on daily basis.     YOUR QUALIFICATIONS        B. Sc/M. Sc (Physics / Optics) /B.  E / B.  Tech with 2 to 3 Years of relevant experiences        Good Knowledge / Skill in Product development lighting technology,  CAD/CAM and Measuring and testing technology

column2: The Cold Forming Engineer is responsible for updating or redesigning existing cold forming tooling for improved performance and completing new designs for future projects as identified by the Engineering Manager or Plant Manager. The Cold Forming Engineer will create layouts identifying tooling by machine and product, create inspection fixtures to aid in part inspection, and make machine and process recommendations. The Cold Forming Engineer will work with Production and Manufacturing to define production needs and improve machine flexibility. The Cold Forming Engineer must also work closely with Manufacturing and Quality Control in troubleshooting, tooling preparation, and production for product quality and integrity.             Position Responsibilities:         Timely development of forming tooling and processes for redesign or new product development projects assigned at the facility.     Develop, design, and troubleshoot tooling and cold forming processes of near net, net and precision forming; assist in the selection of forming processes and equipment.     Develops, evaluates, and improves manufacturing methods, utilizing knowledge of product design, materials and parts, fabrication processes, tooling and production equipment capabilities, assembly methods, and quality control standards.     Utilizes Industry 4.0 elements to improve processes and productivity.     Confers with vendors to determine product specifications and arrange for purchase of equipment, materials, or parts, and evaluates products according to specifications and quality standards.     Develops and prepares formal cost justifications for purchase of Capital Equipment; Develops tooling sources and budgetary costs for tooling.     Utilize solid modeling and drawing software to prepare layouts, drawings, and sketches (2d and 3d).     Analyzes data and trends to identify problems and opportunities and makes recommendations.     Completes work improvement projects by training and guiding operators and supervisors.     Works closely with other departments including manufacturing, sales, marketing, quality control and other engineering departments.     Keeps abreast of technological changes and trends by attending educational workshops, reviewing professional publications and participating in professional societies.     Participate in Continuous Improvement initiatives and support sustainment efforts of new/improved processes; Contribute to cost savings plans set up by corporate initiatives.     Support plant policies, goals, standards, values and strategic planning; responsible for adhering to the Environmental Policy as well as supporting the procedures and work instructions maintained within the Environmental Management System.     Other duties as directed by the Engineering Manager                         Qualifications:         Bachelor of Science in appropriate engineering discipline, Manufacturing Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or related field.     Minimum 3-7 years experience in designing cold forming tooling.     Must have experience with solid modeling and drawing software (AutoCAD, Solidworks, or similar).       Problem-solving skills       Analytical thinking skills     Ability to perform effectively within budgetary guidelines     Decisive and confident, open and candidate with the ability to energize others     Strong sense of urgency and personal commitment     Able to build strong and dependable teams     Possesses excellent written, verbal and presentation skills, Fluent in English     Ability to work with many different disciplines across all levels of the organization         Education and Experience:         Bachelor of Science in appropriate engineering discipline, Manufacturing Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or related field.     Minimum 3-7 years experience in designing cold forming tooling.     Must have experience with solid modeling and drawing software (AutoCAD, Inventor, or similar).     Ability to drive change in products, processes, and organization culture     Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional/trade publication; establishing personal networks and participating in professional societies

column2: The Staff Mechanical Design Engineer works with the cross-functional team to design, develop, test, and implement lifesaving medical devices. In this position, you will design parts and assemblies that are part of Stryker s    defibrillator/monitor    products. You will work on a variety of designs including plastic parts, electronics packaging, electro-mechanical systems, wire harnesses and cables, patient interfacing accessories, and power systems. The challenge is to design reliable medical devices that can withstand very harsh environments, so experience with drop, impact, shock, vibration, and water seals is desired. You will develop design concepts, conduct feasibility studies, build, and perform evaluation testing on prototypes and perform analysis on designs.               Who we want:               Analytical problem solvers.    People who go beyond just fixing to identify root causes, evaluate optimal solutions, and recommend comprehensive upgrades to prevent future issues.       Dedicated achievers.    Relentless about quality, people who thrive in a fast-paced environment and will stop at nothing to ensure a project is complete and meets regulations and expectations.       Curious learners   . Engineers who seek out cutting-edge research and information to expand and enhance their ability to develop software.       Goal-oriented developers   . Keeping the customer and system requirements squarely in focus, people who deliver safe and robust solutions.       User-focused creators.    Engineers who design with the user in mind, developing solutions that help change patients lives.       Collaborative partners   . People who build and leverage cross-functional relationships to bring together ideas, information, use cases, and industry analyses to develop best practices.       Motivated product launchers   . Engineers who bring strategic direction and drive for execution to ensure products are developed and launched with precision.                 What You Will Do:               Technical Responsibilities:            Independently research, design, develop, modify, and verify components, modules and sub-systems for medical devices.     Translate user needs to design inputs/ specifications and produce complex system-level designs with some guidance.     Conduct or design advanced prototyping and testing.     Analyze and correct complex product design issues using independent judgment.     Troubleshoot engineering design issues, develop , and propose solutions to design. Implement design changes effectively and efficiently           Med Device Compliance:           Be proficient with and mentor others in the usage of industry standards, including design requirements and test strategies per applicable regulations.     Follow and mentor others on R&D procedures like design controls and risk management, per the Quality Management System.           General Responsibilities:            Work cooperatively with R&D, Quality, Manufacturing, Regulatory, Clinical, Marketing, and Project Management to ensure project success.     Identify and support the creation of or improvements to procedures, policies, processes, systems, and technology.     Support and execute segments of complex multifunctional teams to advance projects through the design /development/launch process.     Deliver high quality results with passion, energy,and drive to meet business priorities.     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to build partnerships to achieve business objectives.                 What You Need:             Master/Bachelor s in Engineering, Mechanical Engineering     4+ years of work experience in plastics/metallic electronic device enclosure design. Proficient in performing static, dynamic, and thermal simulations preferably on Ansys software.     Experience in designing mechanical enclosures for electronic consoles, wireless devices, power systems is highly desirable. Must be adept on thermal management including PCB thermal calculations/modeling, simulations, and design considerations for thermal, EMI/EMC characteristics of the electronic body.     Exposure to designing mechanical components around PCBAs, electronic systems, and smart devices is required.     Strong technical ability to develop and optimize designs for mechanical / electro-mechanical assemblies incorporating DFM principles     Strong technical ability in creating engineering drawings, 3D models, applying GD&T and CAE tools.     Adept at applying knowledge of materials and manufacturing processes to product design.     Ability to communicate moderate complexity plans and technical information to team members.     Experience with PTC CREO CAD system and PTC Windchill database is preferred.     Strong Experience with analysis tools, specifically tolerance analysis and FEA using ANSYS software preferred.     Experience in doing crash simulations, drop test simulations, static and dynamic simulations is highly preferred.     Experience in the design of ingress protection(IP) rated parts. Strong knowledge of plastic parts design, manufacturing, and testing methods.     Experience in executing new product development projects involving complete product development life cycle phases from concept to launch.     Experience in working with regulated industries like Medical Devices, Aerospace, Automotive, etc. Understanding of medical device standards and regulations is preferred.

column2: Your Job Phillips-Medisize, India is seeking a Product Design Engineer to design and develop drug delivery devices, following the Phillips-Medisize Design Development Process (DDP) and applicable standards such as ISO 13485 & ISO 14971 with design controls. Our Team Phillips Medisize is an expert in the design, development and delivery of advanced drug delivery devices and connected health solutions. Our customers are leading pharmaceutical companies worldwide. We offer innovative and integrated solutions supported by an end-to-end service offering from Strategy to Launch. Phillips Medisize is a part of Molex. We have opened a new Global Innovation and Development center in Bangalore, India and expected to grow in the Asian region. What You Will Do Operate primary CAD systems such as NX or SolidWorks or Creo Identify and analyze design risks using tools such as tolerance analysis, static or dynamic simulation or theoretical design calculations. Develop appropriate design risk mitigations and test strategies using dFMEA & pFMEA Develop appropriate assembly and test fixtures to aid in the manufacture and testing of the design. Integrate the electronic elements into the product design Develop appropriate drawings to detail part and assembly specifications in a manner compliant with ASME Y14.5 & ISO 1101 or other design standards Generate Database Approval Forms and Engineering Change Orders to document design changes and customer approval. Ensure that design inputs and outputs are properly documented and controlled according to relevant SOP, WI process. Set up and Perform engineering test for component verification against mechanical specification. Design/selection of components used in drug delivery devices such as springs, elastomers, plastic parts, sheet metal components,  Selection of material for plastic, metal, elastomeric parts that are interacting with the drug  Other duties as assigned. Who You Are (Basic Qualifications) BE/B. Tech in Mechanical Design or Mechanical Engineering or Mechatronics Minimum 3 years of experience in the design and development of mechanical or electro-mechanical drug delivery devices (EX. pen injectors, auto-injectors and wearable pumps) or any healthcare, medical devices. Expertise in Plastic injection molding process and product development Design for Manufacturability (DFM) experience focusing on plastic injection molding and plastic assembly methods (snaps, sonic welding, press fit, sealing, bonding, etc) What Will Put You Ahead Familiar with ISO 13485 and ISO 14971 Ability to generate complex solid & surface models. Familiar with various plastic materials and their design limitations. Strong written and verbal communication skills; ability to communicate design intent to a diverse audience. Demonstrates strong ability to evaluate and recommend appropriate prototyping processes (i.e. SLA, printed, machined, molded) Maintains and respects customer, project, and program confidentiality. Motivated self-starter who is able to manage multiple tasks. We offer you A challenging position in an international innovative and successful company that is growing. An opportunity to setup the processes and development team in India to support the Asian customers.  An opportunity to become part of a global team of dedicated and highly qualified colleagues based in Bangalore, India. Well-structured training and continuous development of your competencies.  Exciting career possibilities within the constantly growing area of medical devices

column2: We are seeking talented and motivated Design Engineers, both freshers and those with 2-5 years of experience, to join our team as AV CAD Designers. As an AV CAD Designer, you will play a critical role in creating and implementing innovative audiovisual (AV) designs using computer-aided design (CAD) software. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop detailed AV system designs that meet client requirements and industry standards.       Responsibilities:         AV System Design: Collaborate with project teams to understand client requirements and develop AV system designs using CAD software. Create detailed schematics, layouts, and equipment specifications for audio, video, and control systems.     CAD Drafting and Documentation: Generate accurate and precise CAD drawings, including floor plans, elevations, equipment rack layouts, and wiring diagrams. Ensure that all designs adhere to project specifications, industry standards, and best practices.     Technical Expertise: Stay updated with the latest AV technologies, products, and industry trends. Apply your knowledge and expertise to recommend appropriate AV equipment, configurations, and solutions based on client needs and project requirements.     Collaboration and Coordination: Work closely with internal teams, including project managers, engineers, and technicians, to coordinate design activities and ensure seamless integration of AV systems. Collaborate with external stakeholders, such as architects and contractors, to ensure proper coordination and successful implementation of designs.     Quality Assurance: Review and validate AV design documentation for accuracy, completeness, and compliance with project requirements. Conduct regular design reviews and participate in system testing and troubleshooting activities to ensure optimal system performance.     Project Support: Provide technical support during the project lifecycle, including attending site visits, assisting with equipment selection and procurement, and addressing design-related queries from project teams.         Requirements:         For Freshers: Bachelors degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, or a related field. For experienced candidates: Relevant degree or diploma in Engineering or a related discipline.     Proficiency in CAD software, such as AutoCAD, Revit, or similar tools, with a focus on creating detailed AV system designs.     Strong understanding of AV concepts, equipment, and industry standards, including audio systems, video displays, control systems, and signal flow.     Excellent attention to detail, with the ability to create accurate and precise CAD drawings and documentation.     Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.     Effective communication and teamwork abilities, with the capacity to collaborate with cross-functional teams and present ideas and designs effectively.     Knowledge of AV installation practices, equipment mounting, and cabling is a plus.

column2: Job Description for Faade Engineer :- Facade engineers should able to identify problems that affect the durability of the building. This could include cracked glass panes, movement within structural elements or worn seals. Facade engineers also work to make buildings more environmentally sustainable, allowing light but not heat in and reducing the load on building services. Each building brings a new challenge. Faade Engineer shall Undertake the review of design for  Curtain Walling ,  Cladding  and  Structural glazing   Design Faade Engineer shall Undertake to recheck Structural Engineering calculations and??Review design drawings prepared by Faade  Designers. Consider all  Structural  aspects associated with each project  Liaise with Architects, Building Service Engineers and Sub-Contractors  Build client relationships and help identify business opportunities Candidate shall be well conversed with relative standards for faade design like AAMA and ASTM Standards. Candidate shall be awareness of basic Building Physics including Ventilation, Solar gain control, Thermal Insulation, Glare control etc. The person should also have good computer skills and able to provide simple drawings in CAD. The ability to communicate through drawing would be an advantage. Candidate shall be Graduate Civil Engineer or Mechanical Engineer & having 8-10 years of experience in faade. If previously worked with faade designer then it will be added advantage. Interested applicants please share your updated resume on divya.parab@lodhagroup.com

Responsibilities: Perform stress analysis of piping systems using software tools such as Caesar II. Review project specifications, P&IDs, and isometric drawings to identify stress critical lines. Design pipe supports and restraints to ensure system integrity. Collaborate with other engineering disciplines to optimize piping layouts. Conduct stress calculations for various load cases (thermal, pressure, seismic, etc.). Provide technical guidance to junior engineers and drafters. Participate in design reviews and HAZOP studies. Ensure compliance with industry codes and standards (e.g., ASME B31.3, B31.1). Support procurement activities related to piping components. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field. Proficiency in Caesar II for stress analysis. Strong understanding of piping codes and standards. Excellent problem-solving skills. Effective communication and teamwork abilities. Assessing plant processes, identifying system risks, and determining optimal piping configurations. Creating drawings and specifications using SP3D, 2-D, and 3-D CAD tools2. column2: We are looking for a Mechanical Engineering Graduate (Malayalam-speaking) who has proficiency in AutoCAD and a minimum of 3 years of experience in designing HVAC systems for all types of buildings (hotels, hospitals, residences, commercial complexes, and apartments) using AutoCAD. Design HVAC Systems: This involves creating schematics and layouts for heating and cooling systems, including equipment selection, ductwork design, and control systems. Perform Calculations: They perform load calculations to determine the heating and cooling capacity required for a space. This ensures the system can maintain a comfortable temperature efficiently. Review Building Plans: HVAC design engineers interpret architectural plans and blueprints to understand the layout and specifications of a building. This helps them design an HVAC system that integrates seamlessly with the overall structure. Ventilation Requirements: They determine the ventilation needs for a space to ensure proper air quality and remove contaminants. Cost Estimation: HVAC design engineers estimate project costs, considering equipment, materials, and labor. Collaboration: They collaborate with architects, mechanical engineers, and other construction professionals to ensure the HVAC system integrates effectively with the entire building design. Building Code Compliance: They ensure their designs comply with all relevant building codes and safety standards. Familiar with designing HVAC systems for buildings (hotels, hospitals, residences, commercial complexes, and apartments) using AutoCAD.

column2: Position: Senior Aluminium Facade Designer Location:  Mumbai, India Relocation Assistance:  Provided A Confidential Company in the aluminum facade industry seeks a skilled Senior Aluminium Facade Designer for our Mumbai team. This role involves delivering subcontract design for aluminum facade packages for architecturally sophisticated buildings in the UK and Ireland, aligned with the UK time zone (Monday to Friday). Key Responsibilities: Design external aluminum facade packages. Interpret architectural requirements for facades, roof lights, and fenestration. Produce working drawings/designs per customer specifications. Supervise and monitor design information issued by other designers. Produce flashing schedules, procurement schedules, and cutting lists. Attend handover meetings to discuss project details. Maintain contract files and daily records. Support the Team Leader & Design Manager. Requirements: 5-10 years of experience in aluminum facade design. Proficiency in architectural interpretation and detailed drawings. Strong supervisory and organizational skills. Proficiency in English (business home office in the UK). Willingness to relocate to Mumbai (relocation assistance provided). Availability to work aligned with the UK time zone (Monday to Friday). Application: Submit a CV and portfolio showcasing relevant experience at Ankit@recruitingguy.com Must be willing to relocate to Mumbai (relocation assistance provided).

As an independent player, we act as a partner to the entire industry and network manufacturers, customers, and service providers in a unique industrial ecosystem. column2: We are seeking talented Mechanical Design Engineers with 3-6 years of experience to join our team in the metal fabrication industry. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing robust and efficient components, systems, and structures that meet our high standards for quality and performance. Key Responsibilities: Design and Development : Create detailed designs and drawings for heavy fabrication components, including wear-resistant products like composite wear plates and hardfacing consumables. Utilize solid modelling tools for mechanical design tasks, ensuring high-quality and precise outputs. Technical Specifications : Develop comprehensive technical specifications and documentation to ensure designs meet all relevant engineering standards and client requirements. 3D Modeling : Utilize CAD software to create 2D/3D models. Project Management : Manage design projects from concept to completion within a matrix structure, coordinating with cross-functional teams to ensure timely and cost-effective delivery. Fabrication Support : Collaborate with the manufacturing team to provide technical support during the fabrication process, ensuring designs are accurately translated into final products. Standards Compliance : Ensure all designs comply with industry standards, safety regulations, and company policies. Continuous Improvement : Identify opportunities for design improvements and cost reductions, implementing changes to enhance product performance and manufacturability. Challenge current practices and propose new solutions. Client Interaction : Engage with clients to understand their requirements and provide technical solutions, ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction. Documentation : Maintain accurate and up-to-date design documentation, including drawings, specifications, and project records. Team Collaboration : Work closely with cross-functional teams, including design, production, and quality assurance, to ensure seamless operations. Travel : Willingness to travel, if needed, to meet client and project needs. Qualifications: Education : Technical qualification in Mechanical Design Engineering or a related field. Experience : 3-6 years of proven experience in mechanical design engineering within the heavy fabrication industry, managing projects in a matrix structure. Technical Skills : Proficiency in CAD software and strong knowledge of mechanical design principles and fabrication processes. In-depth knowledge of welding techniques, processes and drawing symbols. Expertise in steel fabrication, including cutting, bending, machining, and assembling steel components. Analytical Skills : Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to perform complex calculations and simulations. High organizational skills to manage multiple projects simultaneously. Communication : Strong verbal and written communication skills in English; other languages are an advantage. Capable of explaining technical concepts clearly and effectively to various stakeholders. Personality Traits : Confidence to challenge the organization and current practices, with a strong character to stand firm on decisions that may impact process timelines. Outgoing personality to interact effectively with the team, internal, and external customers at all levels. Demonstrated general business interest and understanding. Enthusiastic and dynamic character, capable of staying calm under pressure in a busy and complex environment. IT Literacy : Good IT literacy, including proficiency in Office, MS, and spreadsheet programming. Preferred Skills:  Knowledge of materials science, with a particular emphasis on steel plates, castings, forgings, and related materials.  Familiarity with industry standards and regulations related to heavy fabrication. Join our team and contribute to designing innovative solutions that enhance the performance and durability of industrial machinery. If you have a passion for mechanical design, strong project management skills, and a dynamic personality, we encourage you to apply and become a part of our cutting-edge engineering team.   Job Location:    Rabale, Navi Mumbai  APPLY TO:   If you find the job profile as per your needs then apply at  jobs@hardcarb.com  with your most updated resume and salary slips of last 3 months.

column2: Role & responsibilities   Job Summary: We are currently seeking an experienced and highly skilled CAD-CAM Engineer with a strong background in the wood working industry. In this role, you will utilize your expertise in CAD-CAM engineering and programming to develop precise and efficient machining programs for our wood working operations. Your primary objective will be to optimize production processes, ensuring high-quality output and adherence to project specifications. Responsibilities: 1. Utilize CAD-CAM software to develop and optimize machining programs for wood working operations. 2. Interpret technical drawings, blueprints, and specifications to accurately comprehend project requirements. 3. Collaborate closely with design, 3D cad model and engineering teams to review and analyze part designs for manufacturing feasibility. 4. Select appropriate cutting tools, speeds, and feeds to ensure efficient and accurate machining operations. 5. Prepare and generate CNC programs for wood working machines, including but not limited to routers, beam saws, and edge banding machines. 6. Perform test runs to validate program accuracy, making necessary adjustments for optimal performance. 7. Monitor machining operations to detect any issues or deviations from specifications, troubleshooting and resolving them promptly. 8. Extract bill of materials and prepare cultists from project requirements. 9. Continuously optimize production processes to maximize efficiency, quality, and productivity. 10. Maintain comprehensive documentation of machining programs, setups, and tooling for future reference and replication. Requirements: 1. Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Manufacturing Engineering, or a related field. Relevant certifications or equivalent experience will also be considered. 2. Proven experience as a CAD-CAM Engineer with a strong focus on the wood working industry. 3. Proficiency in CAD-CAM software, specifically for wood working applications. 4. In-depth knowledge of woodworking principles, techniques, and best practices. 5. Strong understanding of CNC machining operations and programming. 6. Familiarity with a variety of wood working machines, such as routers, beam saws, and edge banding machines and drilling machines. 7. Ability to interpret technical drawings and specifications with a meticulous attention to detail. 8. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot machining issues effectively. 9. Experience in extracting bill of materials, preparing cultists, and optimizing production processes in the wood working industry.

column1: Senior Composite Designer - (FRP, GRP, Pultrusion, Injection Moulding)
column2: Role & responsibilities     Position Summary: The Senior Composite Designer is a critical role within our R&D department, responsible for pioneering the design of composite products specifically tailored for the composite market. You will leverage advanced Pultrusion and SMC techniques to create components that enhance building structures, faade elements, and interior features. Your work will directly contribute to our portfolio of sustainable, durable, and cutting-edge products that push the boundaries of modern architecture and construction. Key Responsibilities: Lead the design and development of composite products using Pultrusion and SMC technologies, focusing on applications within the composites with advanced material and process for existing & ensuing applications/segments. Conduct thorough market research to understand the evolving needs of the composite industry, translating insights into innovative design solutions. Engage in the entire product lifecycle, from concept to production, ensuring designs meet functional requirements, aesthetic values, and cost targets. Employ state-of-the-art CAD and CAE software to construct detailed 3D models, technical drawings, and perform structural analyses and other composite applications. On hand exposure of detailed product analysis, including FEA, LCT (Life cycle Test) and end of life recyclability. Spearhead R&D projects, working closely with material scientists to experiment with new composite formulations and hybrid materials. Organize and oversee testing protocols to assess the performance of composite products under various environmental and load conditions. Collaborate with architects, contractors, and stakeholders to integrate composite products into building designs and to provide technical support. Document all design processes and maintain comprehensive records of research findings, design iterations, and test results. Facilitate knowledge transfer by preparing technical reports, presenting findings, and conducting design reviews with the R&D team and company leadership. Remain current with industry trends, regulatory standards, and technological advancements in composite materials and composite applications. Generating requisite documentation processes and maintaining doc control mechanism for secure possession of documents, drawings and models. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in mechanical engineering, Materials Science, or related field, with a strong portfolio of relevant design work. Candidates with master?? degree shall have edge. Minimum of 5 years of experience in composite design/engineering and product development, with a proven track record in variety of composites products & applications, including the composite industry, Mobility, R&B, Power & Energy, etc. Proficiency in advanced CAD/CAE software, such as SolidWorks, CATIA, or equivalent, and experience with FEA. Deep understanding of composite material behavior, testing methods, and manufacturing processes, particularly Pultrusion & SMC. Prior experience in leading R&D projects and managing cross-functional teams. Skills and Competencies: Exceptional analytical, technical, and creative design skills. Strong project management capabilities with meticulous attention to detail. Adept at technical communication, with the ability to convey complex concepts clearly and persuasively. Leadership skills to guide and mentor junior designers and to lead project teams. Eagerness to challenge the status quo and pursue innovative solutions.
column11: FEA, CAE, CAD, SMC, Pultrusion, Life Cycle Test

column2: The Design Manager is responsible for leading and managing the design team, setting design standards, and ensuring that design projects align with the organization's objectives and meet high-quality standards. They will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product development, and engineering, to deliver creative solutions that drive business success.       Key Responsibilities:       Design Team Leadership:       Lead, mentor, and manage a team of designers, including graphic designers, UX/UI designers, and other design professionals.   Foster a collaborative and creative work environment.      Set clear goals and performance expectations for the team.       Design Strategy and Planning:       Develop and communicate the design vision and strategy in alignment with the organization's goals.   Collaborate with stakeholders to define design project objectives, scope, and timelines.   Create design project plans, budgets, and resource allocations.       Design Quality and Standards:       Establish and maintain design standards, guidelines, and best practices.   Ensure that design projects adhere to brand identity and quality standards.   Conduct regular design reviews and provide feedback for improvement.       Cross-functional Collaboration:       Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product development, and engineering, to align design efforts with overall product and business goals.   Act as a liaison between design and other departments to ensure effective communication and collaboration.       Project Management:       Oversee the entire design project lifecycle, from concept development to final execution.   Monitor project progress, budgets, and timelines.   Identify and address project risks and challenges.       Design Tools and Resources:       Ensure that the design team has access to the necessary tools, software, and resources.   Stay updated on industry trends and design technologies.   Recommend and implement design tools and software upgrades as needed.       Client and Stakeholder Engagement:       Engage with clients, stakeholders, and internal teams to understand their design needs and preferences.   Present design concepts and proposals to clients and stakeholders.   Gather feedback and make necessary adjustments.       Performance Analysis and Reporting:       Track and analyze the performance of design projects.   Provide regular reports to senior management on design team achievements and areas for improvement.

column2: Product Design: Creating and developing mechanical designs for various products, machines, or components.     3D Modeling: Using computer-aided design (CAD) software to create 3D models of mechanical parts and assemblies.     Analysis: Conducting structural, thermal, and other analyses to ensure the design meets performance and safety requirements.     Material Selection: Recommending suitable materials for components based on mechanical properties and cost-effectiveness.     Prototyping: Building prototypes and conducting tests to evaluate design concepts and identify areas for improvement.     Collaboration: Working closely with cross-functional teams, including engineers, manufacturers, and project managers, to ensure designs align with project objectives.     Cost Optimization: Finding ways to reduce production costs while maintaining design integrity and quality.     Documentation: Preparing detailed technical drawings, specifications, and documentation to guide the manufacturing process.       Qualifications:       A bachelor's or master's degree in mechanical engineering or a related field.     Proficiency in CAD software and other design tools.     Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.     Knowledge of manufacturing processes and materials.

column2: Works in conjunction with Discipline Manager and Leads a team of Piping Engineers & Piping Designers Continuous improvement in Piping project tasks/deliverables     ensure project completion within budget, and schedule without compromising, quality and safety requirements.     Complies with Company standard administrative, technical or operating processes and procedures.     Leading a Piping design team within a project Organization on Large EPC projects.      Must be able to take a hands-on role in the development of Piping concept studies and equipment layout preparations as well as provide supervision/guidance to working engineers and designers in problem-solving.      Must be able to understand Material / Mechanical handling studies.      Must be able to understand safety layout & good knowledge of safety equipment used in the offshore industry. Also, display good knowledge of Human ergonomics in Design.      Display good knowledge and understanding of process requirements in piping Design and Material considerations.      Adherence to company procedures (Technical, Management & QMS procedures).      Able to plan and work independently, reporting progress and schedule to team leaders and PMT.      Planning and implementation of the Project to ensure that deliverables are issued on schedule, project milestone dates are met, and given tasks are completed within the allowed budget.      Preparation of scope of work, man-hours distribution; Selection of resources in consultation with the head of the discipline to meet the specific job requirements.      Preparation, Review & Approval of all design documents/drawings as per project deliverables list.      Understand Piping bulk material aspects, bulk take-offs, quantification.      Ensure proper detailing of Pipe supports in 3D & 2D and interface with Structural to provide clash free model.      Able to evaluate stress analysis result and provides necessary recommendation on resolving the method of analysis.      Ensure smooth handling of 3D model gate reviews (30%, 60% & 90%), Constructability reviews & HAZOP reviews, and implementations. Perform cold eye review of Piping deliverables & 3D model.      Develop and maintain isometric Index, Pipe support index, closeout report of the model review, and Punch list & Hold list.      To coordinate the review and approval of vendor documents /drawings and ensure full compliance with contract requirements and meet with company/client specifications.      Coordination with Engineering Project Managers / Lead Engineers from other Disciplines for the inter-disciplinary tasks.      Monitoring of job progress, identifying slippage and shortcomings, and setting solutions and remedies in consultation with the Project Manager.      Have experience in handling queries arising from clients, comments from approval authorities, contractors, or other disciplines. Provide sound judgment while handling projects of Brownfield nature.      Develop training and skill development plan for graduate Trainees and mid-level Engineers.      Effective weekly progress report (Project status and resource utilization).      Working knowledge of international codes and standards like ASME B 31.3 / B31.4 / B31.8, ASTM, API, BS, MSS SP, NACE & ABS.      3D software work experience is value added: E3D / PDMS & AutoCAD.            REQUIREMENTS           BE/BTech in Mechanical engineering with Min. 15 year of experience (Min 4-5 years in Lead role).      Should have worked as Design Lead in the offshore Oil & Gas industry working with International companies involved in Concept/FEED/Detail Design & EPC Projects of Piping for Offshore Oil and Gas facilities Wellhead platforms, Fixed Process Platforms, FPSO topsides modules & Turret Mooring System, TLPs & Semi-submersibles     Should be able to undertake multiple tasks related to discipline development in additional to the project execution.     Good communication skills to ensure smooth flow of project information across the team members.     A good team player who is capable to work with a diverse team of engineers with a high-level profession.
