column1: Mechanical Design Engineer , Medical Devices & Automation,
column2: Urgent : Sr Design Engineer (Mechanical : Medical Devices & Automation) @ Pune  Our client  is  3+  years old  an innovative startup that leverages the collective expertise of industry-leading  professionals who have united to address unmet needs in the fields of  medical devices, robotics,   &  mobility . We specialize in delivering comprehensive solutions, from capturing the voice of the  customer & translating designs into proof of concept (PoC) & minimum viable products  (MVP), to conducting experiments & crafting prototypes ready for commercialization. Our  shared mission is to pioneer a brighter future by overcoming obstacles & fostering progress.  Clients  commitment is to lead the way in emerging technologies, with a focus on the  convergence of AI, mechatronics, IoT, motion solutions, & embedded technologies. We believe  in harnessing these advancements to serve diverse applications across the medical, industrial,  aerospace, & defense industries.  Department:  R&D  Reports To:  Head of R&D Location : Pune  Medical Devices design & development Minimally invasive power tools  Arthroscopic shaver, ENT debrider, Otologic Drills  Peripheral Artery devices  Laparoscopic devices & robotics hand tools  Powered Orthopedic hand tools  Endoscopy systems  Powered Dermatome systems  Powered Neuro & Spine hand tools  Physiotherapy systems  Electro pneumatic systems for wound therapy (Torniquet??)  Surgical Helmets  Automation Industrial automation/Special purpose machines  Mobility & drones  Robotics  Motion solutions ??Motors, gearheads & Electronics  Position Summary:  The position would be responsible for  Product Design & Development.   Experience designing complex  Electro-Mechanical Assemblies  with Engineering principles with  understanding of  Failure Modes  & its effects on  Design Reliability  would be critical to the role.  Develop design of  machined, stamped, formed & molded components  including secondary  processing ( heat treatments, surface finishes ) with knowledge of  manufacturing processes . Basic  manufacturing processes of mechanical assemblies, tooling & fixturing design for assembly of  product.  Get involved in the manufacturing process & identify improvements to simplify assembly  process & work cross functionally with different functions to enable business & growth.  This position will be responsible for designing & developing new products as per the product  road map.  Specific markets may include  Surgical Hand Tools ,  Robotics Applications  in Medical, Aerospace & Defense. Education & Experience:  Bachelor?? degree in Mechanical Engineering (Mandatory)  with 3 to 6 years of experience  Duties & Responsibilities:  Product Design & Development  Experience designing complex electro-mechanical assemblies with Engineering principles  with understanding of failure Modes & its effects on design reliability  Develop design of machined, stamped, formed & molded components including  secondary processing (heat treatments, surface finishes) with knowledge of  manufacturing processes  Basic manufacturing processes of mechanical assemblies  Proficient in CAD modelling using  SolarEdge/Fusion360  & able to prepare  3D layouts &    2D drawings   Quick POC to evaluate the motor performance & analysis  Updated with latest trends in  mechanical/bio tech engineering , customers & suppliers  In addition to the tasks mentioned earlier, additional responsibilities may be allocated as needed  Functional Competencies:  Ability to benchmark client?? products with competitor products  Ability to understand customer application requirement & expectations from company  perspective  Ability to provide multiple solutions to serve customer requirements  Able to understand & drive collaboration within & across teams as required to drive  results  Should be able to quickly provide multiple solutions to serve customer requirements  Develop & execute design verification & validation test plans - both internal & to  simulate customer applications  Ability to read, analyze, & interpret technical periodicals, professional journals,  technical procedures, or governmental regulations.  Ability to write reports & technical (product development) plans. Ability to effectively present information & respond to  questions from groups of managers, clients, customers, & the public.  Must be able to work closely with Manufacturing & Quality teams  Proficient in Microsoft Office tools (PowerPoint, Outlook, Word, Excel)  Relationships:  Internal:  Interacts frequently with a variety of personnel; such as Sales, Marketing Managers,  General Managers, Business Unit Managers, Product Marketing Managers, Sales Administrators,  Application Engineers, etc. Work closely with sales, marketing & product managers,  Procurement, Materials, Engineering as well as individual project-based engineering personnel.  External:  Work closely with sales, marketing & product managers & represent the company  when required at customer site & on calls.  Persona: Excellent communication skills  ??written & spoken as job requires communication  with internal & external teams.  Alertness & high sense of urgency to resolve issues & communicate feedback to  customers.  Adaptability to change  Ability to set & achieve goals  Strong planning & organization skills  Strong computer skills are required  Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment  Must be able to manage a flexible schedule  Must be able to develop relationships at all levels  Ability to travel 10%+ of time  Language Skills:  English - both verbal & written communication  Knowledge of Hindi & Marathi would be a plus  You are requested to E Mail updated Resume with the following details Current Location Pl. Confirm you are ready to work in Pune Total Experience in Mechanical  design & development of new products (In years) Relevant experience in design & development of  Medical Devices , Surgical Hand Tools ,  Robotics Applications , & Automation (If any) Relevant hands-on experience designing complex  Electro-Mechanical Assemblies  ,   Failure Modes  &  Design Reliability   (In years) Can you design &  Develop of  machined, stamped, formed & molded components  ?  Do you have knowledge of  heat treatments, surface finishes , manufacturing processes . of mechanical assemblies, tooling & fixturing design for assembly of  product.? Do you have knowledge of GD&T, tolerance stack up analysis, DFMEA, developing validation plans, material selection etc.? Are you Proficient in CAD modelling using  SolarEdge/Fusion360  & able to prepare  3D layouts &    2D drawings  ?  Have you developed & launched   from concept to production release?  Do you have knowledge of stage gate product development process & VAVE? Current Salary (Fixed + Variable) Expected Salary Minimum period required for Joining Can you speak & write Fluent English? Languages Known: Contact Details, Residence & Mobile No Skype ID / WhatsApp No Age / Birth date In case you are not interested, we would appreciate, if you can refer us, suitable matching profiles from your rich contacts. column2: Role     Radical is a platform connecting data, medicine and people -- through machine learning, and usable, performant products. Software has never been the strong suit of the medical industry -- and we are changing that. We believe that the same examples of stunning design that power our daily needs through millions of consumer applications -- be it your grocery, your food delivery or your movie tickets -- when applied to healthcare, has a massive potential to transform the industry, and positively impact lives of patients and doctors. Radical works with some of the largest hospitals and public health programmes in India, and has a growing footprint both inside the country and abroad.      As the Design Lead at Radical, you will:        Work closely with all stakeholders in the healthcare ecosystem - patients, doctors, paramedics and administrators - to conceptualise and bring to life the ideal set of products that add value to their time      Design and help bring into production in conjunction with the engineering team visual designs, product designs as well as workflows      Design systems which have an extraordinary emphasis on capturing data that can help build better experiences, engagement and usability          Expectations       You are a generalist with experience in writing working, well-documented and well-tested code in at least one or more of JavaScript (Node/React), Python and Go.      You have experience working in a Linux-like environment and are familiar with standard command line tools and shell scripting.      You have worked on at least 2 to 3 large projects in production, interacting with different SQL and NoSQL databases, as well as external tools and APIs.      You have at least some experience navigating AWS and leveraging appropriate technologies, rather than fully managed one-click solutions.      You have some experience with containerisation, orchestration and in building applications in a service oriented or microservice oriented architecture.      Bonus Points: Proficiency in TypeScript, Meaningful Open Source Contributions and Prior Experience of Deploying Large Production Systems            Expectations       You have a strong working knowledge of ReactJS and the surrounding ecosystem.      You are up to date with the most efficient and latest practices and standards, such as ES2015 and above, React 16.x and above, React Hooks, functional components and others.      You have the ability to write pixel-perfect CSS ensuring that the pipeline from design to production remains consistent. You are comfortable with css-grids, SCSS, Less and others.      You have experience interacting with GraphQL based and other APIs in the back-end.      You have performance and speed considerations when you write code, allowing your applications to be bundled lightly and without huge dependencies that slow them down.      Bonus Points: Proficiency in TypeScript or Elm, Meaningful Open Source Contributions and Prior Experience of Deploying Large Production Systems              Expectations       Were looking for candidates with a good grasp of Python, especially the Scientific Python ecosystem, with libraries such as NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, scikit, OpenCV, MPL, etc.      While we do not enforce any particular Deep Learning framework, knowledge of and experience with PyTorch will be a plus.      You ideally possess strong analytical skills, and have a mathematical background covering various topics such as calculus, linear algebra, probability, statistics, machine learning, etc.      You should also be familiar with classic computer vision techniques and algorithms.      Candidates must have strong familiarity and knowledge of the tools of the trade used in Deep Learning based computer vision; viz. SOTA models, training techniques, interpretability,      We love colleagues keep themselves abreast of the latest events and breakthroughs in the field, such as by following arXiv, Twitter, etc, and disseminate that knowledge through the organisation.      Bonus: You have previously deployed ML models in production, or have had strong showings in competitions on Kaggle and other platforms. Contributions to FOSS libraries in the ML ecosystem, and a keen interest in topics such as automatic differentiation, CUDA kernels etc, and interest in new libraries such as Jax, and new languages such as Julia.                Expectations       You will be expected to work primarily on handwritten and digitised free form text, electronic medical records, and other such clinical documents from our in-house datasets.      Were looking for candidates with a good grasp of Python, especially the Scientific Python ecosystem, with libraries such as NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, scikit, OpenCV, MPL, etc.      While we do not enforce any particular Deep Learning framework, knowledge of and experience with PyTorch will be a plus.      Candidates should also be familiar not just with classic NLP methods (TF-IDF, etc.) and also understand the various cleaning and preprocessing steps involved in an NLP pipeline.      Candidates must have strong familiarity and knowledge of the tools of the trade used in Deep Learning based computer vision; viz. SOTA models, training techniques, interpretability, and various tricks used to improve performance.      You ideally possess strong analytical skills, and have a mathematical background covering various topics such as calculus, linear algebra, probability, statistics, machine learning, etc.      We love colleagues keep themselves abreast of the latest events and breakthroughs in the field, such as by following arXiv, Twitter, etc, and disseminate that knowledge through the organisation.      Bonus: You have previously deployed ML models in production, or have had strong showings in competitions on Kaggle and other platforms. Contributions to FOSS libraries in the ML ecosystem, and a keen interest in topics such as automatic differentiation, CUDA kernels etc, and interest in new libraries such as Jax, and new languages such as Julia.            Expectations       You are required to have hands-on experience with the AWS ecosystem, preferably with advanced certifications.      You should be very familiar with the Linux command line and standard tools. You should be comfortable writing shell scripts for automating jobs.      You should be comfortable using Python for quick data munging and analysis, and can write code to call external services, interact with AWS boto, etc.      You have previously worked on a project with a fast release philosophy; you have experience in setting up and managing production environments, microservices, container orchestration, automated deployments, CI/CD pipelines, GitHub integrations, etc.      You have hand on experience maintaining Infrastructure-as-Code; you can write scripts using CloudFormation and Terraform to provision and manage resources.      Bonus: Some experience in designing dashboards, and real time charts for internal, operations use.      Strong recommendation from the ophthalmology community      Clinical experience of at least 2 to 3 years in a vitreoretina clinic      Strong orientation towards cutting-edge technologies and improvement of patient care.      Prior exposure to technology companies in healthcare a strong positive.      Bonus Points: Some programming experience or operational program design experience.      Understanding of healthcare setups, particularly public hospitals and their operational/cultural aspects.      Flexibility to travel and stay on location as the project covers multiple sites.      Excellent data analytics skills and understanding of complex patient healthcare data/parameters      Excellent communication skills, preferably English, Hindi and Marathi.      Tech-savvy with an understanding of tech-first healthcare delivery in a fast moving startup.      Ability to manage programs within budget, prepare reports and monitor and evaluate KRAs on regular basis      Self-motivated and entrepreneurial; ability to fail fast and learn fast; ability to motivate your team      Familiarity and experience with creating consumer or enterprise software designs across form factors      Familiarity with Web Accessibility Guidelines and designing for fast, light web experiences      Experience conducting user interviews and research      With an ambition to start, build and scale the entire design team at Radical      Bonus: Experience with front-end technologies such as React and proficiency in methods and processes around split tests and other testing tools
column11: Linux, Architecture, Machine learning, Clinical trials, Javascript, Healthcare, Public health, SQL, Python, Recruitment
